ISSN 2682-9193","identifier":"http:\/\/ir.uitm.edu.my\/id\/eprint\/29390\/; http:\/\/www.ejoms.com; http:\/\/ir.uitm.edu.my\/id\/eprint\/29390\/1\/29390.pdf","title":"Model of the antecedent and consequences of digital inclusion: a study among entreprenuership \/ Faradillah Iqmar Omar, Nur Ajeerah Othman and Nor Hafizah Abdullah","paper_abstract":"The study aims to develop a model of digital inclusion among entrepreneurs (SMEs) in Malaysia. The existing digital gap instrument is geared towards access, skills and motivational aspects of using ICT and looking at the issue of usage gaps, whereas digital inclusion is about how users benefit from the use of ICT as well as prevent the occurrence of digital imperfections. Digital inclusion is a holistic approach that a) measures the impact of ICT on economic and social (new skills), b) an environment that can help the economic and society capabilities benefit from ICT (innovation and entrepreneurship), c) Clear policy and identify opportunities for public-private collaboration (robust legislation and law). Hence, the formation of antecedent and digital inclusion model is a new lead in measuring individual and community development. The objective of the study is to determine the re-concept of digital inclusion and to test the identified digital domain domains such as communication networks, entertainment, and search for business information, e-commerce, creating business sites, advertising and product marketing. Subsequently, the expected outcome of the study is to introduce a new digital inclusiveness instrument among entrepreneurs (SMEs) in Malaysia based on a number of domains that have been tested and identified.","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Entrepreneurship. Risk and uncertainty; Malaysia; Electronic commerce","subject":"Entrepreneurship; Risk and uncertainty; Malaysia; Electronic commerce","authors":"Omar, Faradillah Iqmar; Othman, Nur Ajeerah; Abdullah, Nor Hafizah","link":"http:\/\/ir.uitm.edu.my\/id\/eprint\/29390\/","oa_state":"2","url":"198af29563d789d3d433346eee12817e25da0e55a4c3466baeaa823442d5a695","relevance":120},{"id":"e3fd8c31905e365c4215b8cb3aba5738dad477734c2c457eded1fa6ef04c91a4","relation":"http:\/\/ejurnal.teknokrat.ac.id\/index.php\/teknokompak\/article\/view\/532\/365; http:\/\/ejurnal.teknokrat.ac.id\/index.php\/teknokompak\/article\/view\/532; doi:10.33365\/jtk.v14i1.532","identifier":"http:\/\/ejurnal.teknokrat.ac.id\/index.php\/teknokompak\/article\/view\/532; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.33365\/jtk.v14i1.532","title":"DINAMIKA UMKM DI GRESIK - JAWA TIMUR PADA PERKEMBANGAN ERA DIGITAL DENGAN PENDEKATAN SISTEM DINAMIK","paper_abstract":"Perkembangan UMKM ini juga harus bisa mengimbangi globalisasi pasar yang menuntut peningkatan daya saing dan strategi bisnis yang saat ini tengah beralih ke era digital. Dari survey yang dilakukan BPS (2016) 67% UMKM mengalami kendala. Kendala yang sering dihadapi salah satunya adalah pemasaran (31%). Berdasarkan hasil yang ada, tidak semua UMKM yang ada melakukan implementasi digital didalam membantu kegiatan marketing. Oleh karena itu penelitian kali ini akan dibahas dinamika perubahan permintaan khususnya UMKM makanan perkembangan era digital dengan menggunakan metode pendekatan sistem dinamik. Melalui penggambaran model simuasi akan digambarkan faktor eksternal pelanggan dan faktor internal penjual. Penggambaran model akan dapat diketahui perubahan permintaan sebelum dilakukan implementasi marketing didalam proses bisnis dan saat dilakukan implementasi.","published_in":"Jurnal Tekno Kompak; Vol 14, No 1 (2020): Februari; 17-21 ; 2656-3525 ; 1412-9663 ; 10.33365\/jtk.v14i1","year":"2020-02-16","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Amelia, Putri; Miftahurrohmah, Brina","link":"http:\/\/ejurnal.teknokrat.ac.id\/index.php\/teknokompak\/article\/view\/532","oa_state":"1","url":"e3fd8c31905e365c4215b8cb3aba5738dad477734c2c457eded1fa6ef04c91a4","relevance":119},{"id":"da6f5bc72f4d488c274bf8707d8321589a963690b586ccf18da4c3489008429a","relation":"http:\/\/www.amptajurnal.ac.id\/index.php\/MWS\/article\/view\/326\/pdf; http:\/\/www.amptajurnal.ac.id\/index.php\/MWS\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/326\/7; 10.36276\/mws.v18i1.326.s7; http:\/\/www.amptajurnal.ac.id\/index.php\/MWS\/article\/view\/326; doi:10.36276\/mws.v18i1.326","identifier":"http:\/\/www.amptajurnal.ac.id\/index.php\/MWS\/article\/view\/326; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.36276\/mws.v18i1.326","title":"Smart Tourism: Aksentuasi Kesiapan Homestay di Kawasan Ekonomi Khusus Tanjung Lesung, Pandeglang-Banten","paper_abstract":"This study intends to obtain comprehensive information about Homestay facilities readiness within the Smart Tourism development framework in Tanjung Lesung Pandeglang, Banten. This study uses a qualitative research design with a phenomenographic approach. Data collection was carried out by interviewing existing stakeholders, observing homestays in the study area and studying documents related to the Homestay program and tourism digitizing. The results of the study show that 1) The homestay program within smart tourism framework in Tanjung Lesung is based on driving the economy and welfare of the host community; 2) Implementation of the homestay facilities development within smart tourism framework in Tanjung Lesung is carried out in four stages: conversion, renovation, revitalization, and new development; 3) The application of smart tourism in Tanjung Lesung is done with information technology through marketing programs such as online market places; Pokdarwis and 10 pilot tourism villages in the Indonesia Tourism Exchange Program (ITX).","published_in":"Media Wisata; Vol 18, No 1 (2020): Media Wisata; 101-112 ; JURNAL MEDIA WISATA: Wahana Informasi Pariwisata; Vol 18, No 1 (2020): Media Wisata; 101-112 ; 2685 8436 ; 1693 5969","year":"2020-05-06","subject_orig":"Smart Tourism; Smart Destination; Digital Tourism; Tourism 4.0; Homestay","subject":"Smart Tourism; Smart Destination; Digital Tourism; ; 0; Homestay","authors":"Hidayah, Nurdin; Suherlan, Herlan","link":"http:\/\/www.amptajurnal.ac.id\/index.php\/MWS\/article\/view\/326","oa_state":"1","url":"da6f5bc72f4d488c274bf8707d8321589a963690b586ccf18da4c3489008429a","relevance":118},{"id":"0dc1edf927dd2da9b068551e4cbf0b5f972ba43ce9c21914ecd3934f6aeea4f4","relation":"1555-4139; 1555-4120; Games and culture: a journal of interactive media; 10.1177\/1555412019898305; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1177\/1555412019898305; https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10686; URN:NBN:fi-fe202003259310","identifier":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10686","title":"CryptoKitties and the new ludic economy : how blockchain introduces value, ownership, and scarcity in digital gaming","paper_abstract":"This article analyzes specific characteristics of value created through digital scarcity and blockchain-proven ownership in cryptogames. Our object of study is CryptoKitties, the first instance of a blockchain-based game that has garnered media recognition and financial interest. The objective of this article is to demonstrate the limits of scarcity in value construction for owners of CryptoKitties tokens, manifested as breedable virtual cats. Our work extends the trends set out by earlier cryptocurrency studies from the perspective of cultural studies. For the purpose of this article, we rely on open blockchain analytics such as DappRadar and Etherscan, as well as player-created analytics, backed by a one-year-long participant observation period in the said game for research material. Combining theoretical cryptocurrency and Bitcoin studies, open data analysis, and virtual ethnography enables a grounded discussion on blockchain-based game design and play. ; fi=vertaisarvioitu|en=peerReviewed|","published_in":"","year":"2020-02-20","subject_orig":"cryptogames; blockchain; CryptoKitties; value; scarcity; game economy; Ethereum; Internet; digital games; electronic money; virtual currency; blockchains; games; new economy; value creation; economic effects; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","subject":"cryptogames; blockchain; CryptoKitties; value; scarcity; game economy; Ethereum; Internet; digital games; electronic money; virtual currency; blockchains; games; new economy; value creation; economic effects; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","authors":"Serada, Alesja; Sihvonen, Tanja; Harviainen, J. Theory, Culture & Society 31, 125-150. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1177\/0263276414537318; https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67727; doi:10.5209\/esmp.67727","identifier":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67727; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5209\/esmp.67727","title":"Social TV activation strategies on Twitter of the most popular shows on European general-interest television ; Estrategias de activaci\u00f3n de la audiencia social en Twitter de los programas m\u00e1s populares de la televisi\u00f3n generalista en Europa","paper_abstract":"The main objective of this research focuses on the interaction between the traditional television industry with its social audience through Twitter. For this purpose, we present a content analysis of the official Twitter accounts from the programmes with the highest audience belonging to 26 open general-interest channels in the five largest European markets (Germany, Italy, UK, France and Spain). Tweets published in the official accounts of the TV programs that make our sample were collected through API access and specific software. The specific objectives of the study involve the knowledge of the forms, social tv activation strategies, content and typologies of the publications in the accounts of these programmes belonging to the three main pillars of television schedules (fiction, info-show and information) and also in the divergences and similarities that exist between the general-interest channels depending on the country, the ownership and the genre. From our results, we conclude that there is a low level of interest, albeit unequal among countries, by the most popular programmes to interact with their social audience on Twitter. ; El objetivo principal de esta investigaci\u00f3n se centra en la interacci\u00f3n de la industria televisiva en abierto con su audiencia social a trav\u00e9s de Twitter. Con este prop\u00f3sito, presentamos los resultados del an\u00e1lisis de contenido de las cuentas oficiales de los programas de mayor audiencia de un total de 26 canales generalistas en abierto en los cinco mayores mercados europeos (Alemania, Italia, UK, Francia y Espa\u00f1a). Los tuits publicados en las cuentas de dichos programas televisivos han sido recopilados a trav\u00e9s del API y software espec\u00edfico. Los objetivos del estudio se concretan en el conocimiento de las formas, contenido, estrategias de activaci\u00f3n de la audiencia social y tipolog\u00edas de las publicaciones en las cuentas de estos programas pertenecientes a los tres principales pilares de la programaci\u00f3n televisiva (ficci\u00f3n, info-show e informaci\u00f3n) y tambi\u00e9n en las divergencias y similitudes que existen entre las televisiones generalistas en funci\u00f3n del pa\u00eds, la titularidad de las cadenas y el g\u00e9nero program\u00e1tico. De nuestros resultados se desprende un inter\u00e9s bajo, aunque desigual entre pa\u00edses, por parte de los programas m\u00e1s populares por interactuar con su audiencia social en Twitter.","published_in":"Estudios sobre el Mensaje Period\u00edstico; Vol. 26 N\u00fam. 2 (2020): Monogr\u00e1fico: Programaci\u00f3n y programas de televisi\u00f3n en Espa\u00f1a desde la desregulaci\u00f3n: 1990-2020; 473-482 ; 1988-2696 ; 1134-1629","year":"2020-04-04","subject_orig":"General-Interest TV; Europe; Twitter; Social Audience; TV Genres; Televisi\u00f3n generalista; Europa; Audiencia Social; Generos Televisivos","subject":"General-Interest TV; Europe; Twitter; Social Audience; TV Genres; Televisi\u00f3n generalista; Europa; Audiencia Social; Generos Televisivos","authors":"Coromina Rodr\u00edguez, \u00d2scar; Delgado, Matilde; Prado, Emili; Garc\u00eda-Mu\u00f1oz, N\u00faria","link":"https:\/\/revistas.ucm.es\/index.php\/ESMP\/article\/view\/67727","oa_state":"1","url":"045e7833f1d21c92df3894d28606b90ea10df8459a1ac05764dd741aa8891a33","relevance":116},{"id":"10391a02e319f0a6774b0106f62915066d846a34bf9721bef7ea9f1821408cd6","relation":"Sousa B., Silva A., Malheiro A. (2020) Differentiation and Market Loyalty: An Approach to Cultural Tourism in Northern Portugal. In: Rocha \u00c1., Abreu A., de Carvalho J., Liberato D., Gonz\u00e1lez E., Liberato P. (eds) Advances in Tourism, Technology and Smart Systems. Smart Innovation, Systems and Technologies, vol 171. pp. 681-690, Springer, Singapore https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1007\/978-981-15-2024-2_58; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11110\/1795","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11110\/1795","title":"Differentiation and Market Loyalty: An Approach to Cultural Tourism in Northern Portugal","paper_abstract":"Considering the current dynamics of cultural touring and the growing importance of branding, the present study aims to understand the importance of cultural marketing in customer relationship management and customer loyalty, namely, how relationships between the various stakeholders are established, how important marketing is digital in the dissemination of cultural activities and what actions developed by cultural organizations to raise and retain public. The methodology used is based on the case study, where quantitative methods are used, based on the collection of surveys on cultural habits in the north of Portugal. The results seem to show that the general principles of marketing are currently adopted by cultural organizations, and their role is increasingly relevant. Attracting and retaining publics is one of the main objectives of cultural organizations, for the various advantages that come from it, namely, to promote the formation of audiences, because it is a potential source of financing and for contributing to the valorization of the brand. As a limitation, this case study focuses only on cultural equipment of performing arts, not covering other cultural areas of artistic production. Considering the deepening of the study and the potential comparison of results, it is suggested that the study be extended to other areas of culture (eg museological sector), where loyalty cards are used. Jenis penelitian ini merupakan penelitian kualitatif dengan teknik pengumpulan data menggunakan studi literatur. https:\/\/journal.trunojoyo.ac.id\/kompetensi\/article\/view\/6829; doi:10.21107\/kompetensi.v13i2.6829","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.trunojoyo.ac.id\/kompetensi\/article\/view\/6829; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.21107\/kompetensi.v13i2.6829","title":"DIGITAL MARKETING AS AN INTEGRATED MARKETING COMMUNICATION STRATEGY IN BADAN USAHA MILIK DESA (BUMDesa) IN EAST JAVA","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this study is how the marketing communication strategy through digital marketing is carried out by BUMDesa businesses as a driver of the village economy in order to prosper the Village Communities in East Java in marketing their products. This research is focused on the online media such as Instagram Business, Facebook Business and Whatshapp Business.This study used qualitative research methods to provide data and facts about the application of digital marketing in Badan Usaha Milik Desa (BUMDesa). Interviews, documentation, and observation used as data collection techniques. Data is analyzed with a grounded theory approach that provides development of the field of research studies. The analysis techniques consisted of data reduction, data presentation and conclusion.The research findings show that in marketing BUMDesa products, marketing trends are shifting from conventional (offline) to digital (online). The concept of digital marketing for BUMDesa businesses is to be able to market their products from anywhere and anytime through the internet \/ online media. So the communication strategy is done through digital marketing are the submission of positioning statements in each post on online media (Instagram Bisnis, Facebook Bisnis and Whatshap Bisnis) and the speed of response to online reviews of online media. In 2015, Indonesia was the first warning of interactions regarding halal lifestyle, this has a good potential to increase the development of halal tourism in Indonesia. The digital age has become an important part in the development of halal tourism because it has now entered the era of the industrial revolution 4.0. In 2018, internet users in Indonesia are around 64.8% and the main reason for using the internet is to communicate. Social Media as the most chosen platform for communication.This study aims to determine the effect of social media marketing on Muslim tourist interest in halal tourist destinations. This research uses a quantitative approach with SEM analysis which is processed through Lisrel. The survey was conducted on 304 respondents. The exogenous variables used are Social Media Marketing, Sharia Compliance in Social Media Marketing, and Sharia Compliance in Destination, while the endogenous variables used are Attitude Towards Destination and Intention to Visit. The results obtained, social media marketing and sharia compliance in destination have a positive relationship on attitude, and attitude has a significant effect on intention, while sharia compliance in social media marketing has no significant effect on attitude. Based on these results, many factors that cause social media complicity with sharia rules are not significant to tourist attitudes. The way to do this is to develop social media that specifically addresses halal tourism.","published_in":"AGHNIYA : Jurnal Ekonomi Islam; Vol 2, No 2 (2020): Jurnal Ekonomi Islam","year":"2020-06-29","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Priliana, Velly","link":"http:\/\/jurnal.umsu.ac.id\/index.php\/AGHNIYA\/article\/view\/4842","oa_state":"1","url":"4822443acc3a7695487db4bd616e59a6fa6b5ab7096c3acd9908d1a256f3b764","relevance":111},{"id":"57133a977bc0e181b7ddd4ab05bd0eeb87949b0e66615a41a01aafbcc96cfc29","relation":"29;4; International Journal of Advanced Science and Technology, 29(4): 1113-1120.; 2207-6360; 2005-4238; http:\/\/sersc.org\/journals\/index.php\/IJAST\/article\/view\/4816\/3098; http:\/\/ir.lib.seu.ac.lk\/handle\/123456789\/4351","identifier":"http:\/\/sersc.org\/journals\/index.php\/IJAST\/article\/view\/4816\/3098; http:\/\/ir.lib.seu.ac.lk\/handle\/123456789\/4351","title":"Impact of digital marketing on purchase intention","paper_abstract":"Digital marketing is one of the most popular marketing approaches used by companies specifically through social media and email marketing. On top of their ease of use and robustness, social media and email marketing have been found to be highly effective in building customer engagement, an element that determines the prevalence of customers\u2019 purchase intention. Generally, digital marketing tools enable companies to promote their products with ease as well as build customer relationships at lower costs, leading to increased sales volume. This study aims to determine the relationship between social media, email marketing, customer engagement and purchase intention in ICT company named CoderFirst Sri Lanka. It intends to attain a theoretical confirmation about the relationship between the variables and determine the suitable implications to maximize the research findings for long-term use. This study used an online questionnaire as the research instrument that was responded completely by 363 participants made up of the potential customers of CoderFirst. The PLS- SEM method was used to determine the effect and correlation of each variable, calculated using SmartPLS software. This research primarily aims to determine the impact of digital marketing specifically social media and email marketing on customer engagement and purchase intention.","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Digital Marketing; Social Media; Email Marketing; Customer Engagement; Purchase Intention","subject":"Digital Marketing; Social Media; Email Marketing; Customer Engagement; Purchase Intention","authors":"Samsudeen, S. Plano de Marketing: Influenciadores na divulga\u00e7\u00e3o de produtos e servi\u00e7os \/ The credibility behind the identity! Marketing Plan: Influencers in the dissemination of products and services","paper_abstract":"O mundo globalizado, incita uma evolu\u00e7\u00e3o cotidiana rotineira, onde a busca de novos instrumentos se faz necess\u00e1ria para o andamento c\u00e9lere de uma sociedade capitalista. O Marketing, nesse campo, requer extens\u00e3o de suas pr\u00e1ticas, objetivando o alcance das inova\u00e7\u00f5es provenientes do avan\u00e7o tecnol\u00f3gico. As novas formas de atingir o cliente e proliferar marcas e produtos nas m\u00eddias digitais, requer habilidade na condu\u00e7\u00e3o. Com o aumento significativo da utiliza\u00e7\u00e3o das plataformas digitais (Facebook, Youtube, Instagram entre outras), o surgimento da modalidade Influenciador, passa a ter posi\u00e7\u00e3o de destaque. Estes s\u00e3o pessoas que, em utiliza\u00e7\u00e3o dos princ\u00edpios os quais norteiam o marketing pessoal e digital, promovem, atrav\u00e9s de seus perfis, a capacidade de interagir com milh\u00f5es de pessoas mediante coment\u00e1rios, fotos ou v\u00eddeo. O Youtube foi a plataforma que alavancou os influenciadores digitais, passando a denomina\u00e7\u00e3o de Youtubers. Ao cadastrar-se nesse site de compartilhamento, mediante conta Gmail, cria-se um canal, objetivando a intera\u00e7\u00e3o social mediante a propaga\u00e7\u00e3o de v\u00eddeos. Em detrimento desse avan\u00e7o, a contrapartida fica por conta da credibilidade que assiste essa fun\u00e7\u00e3o. Assim sendo, como se audita a credibilidade dos influenciadores digitais ou youtubers? O objetivo geral versa a identifica\u00e7\u00e3o da real influ\u00eancia deste novo ramo profissional, para tanto, onde se estabelece a confiabilidade das marcas as quais divulgam? A problem\u00e1tica necessita da identifica\u00e7\u00e3o de um Youtuber em sua relev\u00e2ncia, para atingir seus seguidores ou o p\u00fablico geral. A visualiza\u00e7\u00e3o da plataforma que ele se utiliza, e da marca de sua maior divulga\u00e7\u00e3o, prop\u00f5e a composi\u00e7\u00e3o do v\u00ednculo interativo, fazendo-se necess\u00e1rio tra\u00e7ar o perfil dos quais compartilham seus v\u00eddeos, fotos e coment\u00e1rios. A ideia do presente estudo, justifica-se no fato do crescimento significativo no n\u00famero de YouTubers existentes nos mais diversos ramos consumeristas.","published_in":"Brazilian Journal of Business; v. 2, n. 2 (2020); 1673-1690 ; 2596-1934","year":"2020-06-19","subject_orig":"Marketing; Plataforma Digital; Influenciador Digital; Youtuber","subject":"Marketing; Plataforma Digital; Influenciador Digital; Youtuber","authors":"Cosenza, Harvey Jos\u00e9 Santos Ribeiro; Moura, Luis Claudio Bernardo","link":"http:\/\/www.brazilianjournals.com\/index.php\/BJB\/article\/view\/11944","oa_state":"1","url":"f1c8651c52a2d6122ebdd3664a7ad9495242dc5d6f46b52af6fa22d12c7fd61b","relevance":109},{"id":"a0ce420780e96fcd3b04858c332775ef32a622a1962c465a8e5d8ecc855c41b4","relation":"https:\/\/sistemas.uft.edu.br\/periodicos\/index.php\/atura\/article\/view\/9684\/16894; https:\/\/sistemas.uft.edu.br\/periodicos\/index.php\/atura\/article\/view\/9684; doi:10.20873\/uft.2526-8031.2020v4n1p140","identifier":"https:\/\/sistemas.uft.edu.br\/periodicos\/index.php\/atura\/article\/view\/9684; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.20873\/uft.2526-8031.2020v4n1p140","title":"YOUTUBER MIRIM EM BEL\u00c9M: o consumo que encanta","paper_abstract":"O objetivo deste trabalho \u00e9 pensar como se d\u00e3o as produ\u00e7\u00f5es e intera\u00e7\u00f5es das crian\u00e7as com a plataforma digital YouTube, em an\u00e1lise sobretudo os que dizem respeito as rela\u00e7\u00f5es mercadol\u00f3gicas e comunicacionais deste \u201ceu\u201d no mundo digital. Assim, este artigo analisa a crian\u00e7a enquanto sujeito social e sua rela\u00e7\u00e3o com a m\u00eddia YouTube. A an\u00e1lise foi feita a partir da revis\u00e3o bibliogr\u00e1fica para se entender o YouTube e o consumo digital e a partir do conte\u00fado de canais foi poss\u00edvel entender a din\u00e2mica da linguagem espetacular produzida por eles, para cativar suas audi\u00eancias, a fim de compreender a import\u00e2ncia do lugar que a inf\u00e2ncia ocupa na contemporaneidade digital. PALAVRAS-CHAVE: Inf\u00e2ncia; YouTuber mirim; Consumo; Espet\u00e1culo; Digital ABSTRACT This study aims to think how children productions and interactions happen in the YouTube digital platform, especially those concerning the marketing and communicational relations about this \u201cself\u201d in the digital world. Thus, this study analyzes the child as a social subject and his relationship with YouTube platform. The analysis is made with the literature review to understand YouTube and digital consumption and starting from the channels content it was possible to understand the dynamics of the spectacular language produced by them, to captivate their audiences, in order to understand the importance of the childhood role occupies in the digital contemporary. KEYWORDS: Childhood; Child YouTuber; Consumption; Spectacle; Digital RESUMEN El objetivo de este art\u00edculo es pensar en c\u00f3mo las producciones e interacciones de los ni\u00f1os con la plataforma digital YouTube, especialmente aquellas relacionadas con las relaciones de marketing y comunicaci\u00f3n de este yo en el mundo digital. Por lo tanto, este art\u00edculo analiza al ni\u00f1o como sujeto social y su relaci\u00f3n con los medios de YouTube. El an\u00e1lisis se realiz\u00f3 a partir de la revisi\u00f3n de la literatura para comprender YouTube y el consumo digital, y del contenido de los canales fue posible comprender la din\u00e1mica del lenguaje espectacular producido por ellos, cautivar a sus audiencias para comprender la importancia del lugar. que la infancia ocupa en lo digital contempor\u00e1neo. This trend has opened the doors to new approaches to data understanding and decision-making. On the one hand, companies need to follow data analytic methodologies to manage large volumes of information with big data tools. On the other hand, there are non-profit small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) that make efforts to address data analytics according to their different sources and types. They find challenges such as lack of knowledge in methodological and software tools, which allow timely deployment for decision-making. In this paper, we propose a data analytics methodology for non-profit SMEs. 9780999344361; 24146390; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11407\/5807; doi:10.18687\/LACCEI2019.1.1.43","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11407\/5807; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18687\/LACCEI2019.1.1.43","title":"Foresight of the agroindustrial engineering to 2035 - Application of the delphi method as a dynamizer of curricular changes [Prospectiva de la ingenier\u00eda agroindustrial a 2035 - Aplicaci\u00f3n del m\u00e9todo Delphi como dinamizador de cambios curriculares]","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this article is to present the results of the application of the first Delphi round for Faculties of Agroindustrial Engineering in the framework of a prospective project, the objective was to establish research priorities, technology and areas of curricular interest for Faculties of Agroindustrial Engineering and related to the year 2035, for this purpose a survey was conducted to more than 200 national and international stakeholders related to Agroindustrial Engineering, which contained 293 variables related to the core aspects of agro-industry, that is, management, production, transformation and marketing as well as four complementary thematic groups: CIT's, sustainability, agroindustrial residues and biotechnology. On this questionnaire responses were obtained in Likert scale, which were treated through the calculation of the mode, modal frequency and percentage of consensus, among the most important results the participation of 53 experts from countries such as Spain, Peru, Mexico, Chile and Argentina, from Universities, companies and public institutions is highlighted, some of the technologies with the highest percentage of consensus were, big data, Internet of Things (digital interconnection of daily objects), sustainable agriculture, sustainable constructions, Genetically Modified Organisms, biofuels, carbon capture, use and storage (CCUS), Collaborative Learning in Virtual Worlds (Second Life), Innovation Capabilities, among others. It was observed the existence of new topics and technologies that can be taken into account for the restructuring of the curriculum of the Faculties of Agroindustrial Engineering, as well as for the prioritization of topics, technologies and innovations in terms of training experiences or training courses, extension programs, new lines of research and creation of new graduate programs. \u00a9 2019 Latin American and Caribbean Consortium of Engineering Institutions. 9780999855126; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11407\/5770","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11407\/5770","title":"Analyzing the impact of the digital divide on e-commerce in Colombia","paper_abstract":"The aim of this study is to examine whether the digital divide has a moderating effect on the technological factors that affect the adoption of electronic commerce. This study propose an exploratory empirical model that integrates the basic variables of e-commerce adoption through the use of the technology adoption model (TAM), making an extension with the facilitating conditions and the digital divide as a moderating variable. A digital survey was randomly distributed in Colombia, reaching a final sample of 745 electronic buyers. The explanatory result validates that the perception of the digital divide negatively moderates the influence of the variables related to internet technology on the use of e-commerce. This is one of the first studies that analyzes the effect of the digital divide on the adoption of e-commerce. \u00a9 2019 International Business Information Management Association (IBIMA).","published_in":"Proceedings of the 33rd International Business Information Management Association Conference, IBIMA 2019: Education Excellence and Innovation Management through Vision 2020 ; Agudo Peregrina, \u00c3?.F., (2014) An\u00c3\u00a1lisis de Los Factores de Adopci\u00c3\u00b3n de Comercio Electr\u00c3\u00b3nico En Segmentos de Consumidores Finales, , aplicaci\u00c3\u00b3n al caso espa\u00c3\u00b1ol. HICSS '06, 6, p. 137a.; https:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rcin\/article\/view\/11; doi:10.18359\/rcin.11; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33066","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33066; https:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rcin\/article\/view\/11; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18359\/rcin.11","title":"Conceptual model for pervasive advertising supported on a Smart TV- SmartPhone cooperation framework. ; Modelo conceptual para el despliegue de publicidad ubicua soportado en un esquema de cooperaci\u00f3n Smart TV- SmartPhone.","paper_abstract":"Advertising has been one of the most valuable marketing tools for years by means of a massive, wide-ranging and vertical approach between customers and advertisers. However, a new tendency known as pervasive advertising suggests an evolution of the classical concept towards a more interactive, customized, and horizontal environment that seeks to improve the impact and efficiency of conventional advertising. As a result of the support of emerging technologies related to the development of smartphones and smart TVs, there are no doubts about pervasive advertising potential and its value as a rich research field. This article introduces a conceptual model, which compiles the most relevant research areas related to pervasive computing applied to advertising supported on a smart TV \u2013 smartphone cooperation framework. ; La publicidad ha sido durante a\u00f1os una de las herramientas m\u00e1s valiosas del mercadeo a trav\u00e9s de un enfoque principalmente masivo, generalizado y vertical entre clientes y anunciantes. No obstante, una nueva corriente conocida como publicidad ubicua marca una evoluci\u00f3n en el concepto cl\u00e1sico hacia entornos m\u00e1s interactivos, personalizados y horizontales que busca mejorar la eficiencia y el impacto de la publicidad convencional. Gracias al apoyo de tecnolog\u00edas emergentes que se sustentan en la evoluci\u00f3n de los smartphones y los smart TV, el potencial de la publicidad ubicua es indudable, lo cual la ha convertido en un terreno f\u00e9rtil de investigaci\u00f3n. El presente art\u00edculo presenta un modelo conceptual que condensa las \u00e1reas de investigaci\u00f3n m\u00e1s relevantes relacionadas con el despliegue de publicidad en entornos de computaci\u00f3n ubicua soportados en esquemas de cooperaci\u00f3n smart TV \u2013 smartphone.","published_in":"Ciencia e Ingenieria Neogranadina; Vol 24 No 1 (2014); 116-142 ; Ciencia e Ingenier\u00eda Neogranadina; Vol. 24 N\u00fam. 1 (2014); 116-142 ; Ciencia e Ingenier\u00eda Neogranadina; v. 24 n. 1 (2014); 116-142 ; 1909-7735 ; 0124-8170","year":"2020-01-08T19:04:26Z","subject_orig":"Pervasive advertising; smart TV; smartphone; Publicidad ubicua","subject":"Pervasive advertising; smart TV; smartphone; Publicidad ubicua","authors":"Martinez-Pavon, Francisco; Ramirez Gonzalez, Gustavo; Chantre-Astaiza, \u00c1ngela","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33066","oa_state":"1","url":"33be401389643289d28e41b0eb30afe85910757aa015308cbb8962ac86bdde2d","relevance":104},{"id":"5567c47f8bf944fa0e7c567fe137c1eee4819d191ad1898f0a66f3ece75ed1cf","relation":"http:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rfce\/article\/view\/3143\/2675; http:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rfce\/article\/view\/3143\/2715; Akehurst, G. Journal of Marketing, 74(2), 133-148. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1509\/jmkg.74.2.133; http:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rfce\/article\/view\/3143; doi:10.18359\/rfce.3143; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/34019","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/34019; http:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rfce\/article\/view\/3143; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18359\/rfce.3143","title":"Impact of social networks on hotels\u00b4 incomes in Colombia, Ecuador and Peru ; Impacto de las redes sociales en los ingresos de los hoteles en Colombia, Ecuador y Per\u00fa ; Impacto das redes sociais nos rendimentos dos hot\u00e9is na Col\u00f4mbia, no Equador e no Peru","paper_abstract":"The objective of this research is to analyze the influence of hotel ratings on social networks and how they affect hotel revenues. From 48 hotels\u00b4 monthly data (between August 2014 and July 2015) of Colombia, Ecuador and Peru, the following variables were analyzed: GRI (Global Review Index), Offer, Demand, Sale, RevPAR (Revenue Per Available Room) and Location; by conglomerates analysis and a linear model. It was found that a better GRI favors a better ratio between sales and supply. Specifically, we observe that when the GRI increases by one unit, the RevPAR grows by 0.49%, keeping the rest of the variables constant. It is the first research conducted in South America to analyze the incidence of social networks on hotel revenues. ; El objetivo de la presente investigaci\u00f3n es analizar la influencia de las valoraciones de los hoteles en las redes sociales y c\u00f3mo estas afectan los ingresos de los hoteles. A partir de los datos mensuales (entre agosto de 2014 y julio de 2015) de 48 hoteles de Colombia, Ecuador y Per\u00fa se analizaron principalmente las variables: GRI (Global Review Index), Oferta, Demanda, Venta, RevPAR (Revenue Per Avalable Room) y Ubicaci\u00f3n; mediante an\u00e1lisis de conglomerados y un modelo lineal. Se encontr\u00f3 que un mejor GRI favorece a una mejor ratio entre las ventas y la oferta. En concreto, observamos que cuando el GRI se incrementa en una unidad, el RevPAR crece en 0,49%, manteniendo el resto de variables constantes. Es la primera investigaci\u00f3n realizada en Sudam\u00e9rica para analizar la incidencia de las redes sociales en los ingresos de los hoteles. ; O objetivo da presente pesquisa \u00e9 analisar a influ\u00eancia das avalia\u00e7\u00f5es dos hot\u00e9is nas redes sociais e como estas afetam seus rendimentos. A partir de dados mensais (entre agosto de 2014 e julho de 2015) de 48 hot\u00e9is da Col\u00f4mbia, do Equador e do Peru, analisaram-se principalmente as vari\u00e1veis: GRI (Global Review Index), oferta, demanda, venda, RevPAR (Revenue Per Avalable Room) e localiza\u00e7\u00e3o, mediante an\u00e1lise de conglomerados e um modelo linear. Encontrou-se que um melhor GRI favorece a uma melhor ratio entre as vendas e a oferta. Mais especificamente, observamos que quando o GRI se incrementa em uma unidade, o RevPAR cresce em 0,49%, mantendo o resto de vari\u00e1veis constantes. \u00c9 a primeira pesquisa realizada na Am\u00e9rica do Sul para analisar a incid\u00eancia das redes sociais nos rendimentos dos hot\u00e9is.","published_in":"Revista Facultad de Ciencias Econ\u00f3micas; Vol. 26 N\u00fam. 1 (2018); 147-162 ; 1909-7719 ; 0121-6805","year":"2020-01-08T19:29:30Z","subject_orig":"Social networks; online reputation; guest satisfaction; tourism; RevPAR; Redes sociales; reputaci\u00f3n online; satisfacci\u00f3n del hu\u00e9sped; turismo; Reputa\u00e7\u00e3o on-line; satisfa\u00e7\u00e3o do h\u00f3spede","subject":"Social networks; online reputation; guest satisfaction; tourism; RevPAR; Redes sociales; reputaci\u00f3n online; satisfacci\u00f3n del hu\u00e9sped; turismo; Reputa\u00e7\u00e3o on-line; satisfa\u00e7\u00e3o do h\u00f3spede","authors":"Maj\u00f3, Joaquim; Moya, Daissy; Vall-llosera, Laura","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/34019","oa_state":"1","url":"5567c47f8bf944fa0e7c567fe137c1eee4819d191ad1898f0a66f3ece75ed1cf","relevance":103},{"id":"2946e015dde25646bae5ad9a98feff0e9d51fd26f5b516a3c13de62bea1d4d49","relation":"http:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/rfce\/article\/view\/2275\/1995; Asociaci\u00f3n Colombiana de Universidades - ASCUN (2007). Additionally, the importance of using tools such as marketing research and marketing plan in these organizations is shown with the purpose to collect information on trends in higher education, the viability in the offer of academic programs, institutional perception and satisfaction level of students, teachers, researchers and administrative staff. This concept of educational marketing in MIGME model proposal should make possible to improve institutions' academic offer, in order to adjust better to society and productive sector needs. Various secondary information sources were consulted to develop this document, such as sector studies, statistics and specialized articles. ; El presente art\u00edculo aborda el tema del mercadeo en organizaciones de servicio describiendo su desarrollo hist\u00f3rico, situaci\u00f3n actual y futuro y enfatizando en la gesti\u00f3n del Mercadeo Educativo en las organizaciones de educaci\u00f3n superior, espec\u00edficamente para el caso de Colombia. Adicionalmente, se muestra la importancia de usar herramientas como la investigaci\u00f3n de mercados y el plan de mercadeo en estas organizaciones con el prop\u00f3sito de recopilar valiosa informaci\u00f3n sobre las tendencias en educaci\u00f3n superior, la viabilidad en la oferta de programas acad\u00e9micos, la percepci\u00f3n institucional y el nivel de satisfacci\u00f3n de los estudiantes, docentes, investigadores y administrativos. Este concepto de mercadeo educativo en la propuesta del modelo MIGME, debe posibilitar la mejora de la oferta acad\u00e9mica de las instituciones de manera que se ajuste mejor a las necesidades de la sociedad y del sector productivo. Para la elaboraci\u00f3n del documento se consultaron diversas fuentes de informaci\u00f3n secundaria tales como estudios sectoriales, estad\u00edsticas y art\u00edculos especializados. ; Neste artigose discute o marketing das organiza\u00e7\u00f5es de servi\u00e7os. De creve-se seu desenvolvimento hist\u00f3rico, sua situa\u00e7\u00e3o atual e futura, com \u00eanfase na gest\u00e3o de marketing educacional em organiza\u00e7\u00f5es de ensino superior no caso da Col\u00f4mbia. Al\u00e9m disso, mostra a import\u00e2ncia de usar algumas ferramentas; por exemplo, pesquisa de mercado e plano de marketing nessas organiza\u00e7\u00f5es a fim de coletar informa\u00e7\u00e3o valiosa sobre as tend\u00eancias no ensino superior, a viabilidade da oferta de programas acad\u00eamicos, a percep\u00e7\u00e3o ins tucional e o n\u00edvel de satisfa\u00e7\u00e3o dos alunos, professores, pesquisadores e administradores. No modelo MIGME, este conceito de marketing educacional dever\u00e1 conduzir a melhorar a oferta acad\u00eamica das institui\u00e7\u00f5es para atender \u00e0s necessidades da sociedade e do setor produtivo. Recuperado de http:\/\/public.centrodeestudiosandaluces.es\/pdfs\/S200105.pdf; https:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/ravi\/article\/view\/2682; doi:10.18359\/ravi.2682; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33046","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33046; https:\/\/revistas.unimilitar.edu.co\/index.php\/ravi\/article\/view\/2682; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18359\/ravi.2682","title":"Nuevas funciones docentes para la gesti\u00f3n del conocimiento en la Web Social","paper_abstract":"El docente en la actual sociedad de la informaci\u00f3n ha tenido que cambiar su rol debido a la incidencia de las tecnolog\u00edas de la informaci\u00f3n y la comunicaci\u00f3n en el contexto de la educaci\u00f3n superior. En ese sentido, su quehacer pedag\u00f3gico y did\u00e1ctico se ha ido transformando en relaci\u00f3n con din\u00e1micas mucho m\u00e1s colaborativas con sus educandos. As\u00ed, para indagar estas pr\u00e1cticas colaborativas enmarcadas en el concepto de docente-prosumidor, se hace uso de una metodolog\u00eda de corte cualitativo \u2013basado en la teor\u00eda fundamentada en el marco met\u00f3dico axial y selectivo\u2013 orientada hacia una reflexi\u00f3n de las implicaciones comunicativas y colaborativas del docente en la web 2.0 dentro del escenario educativo. De igual modo, el resultado del manuscrito se traduce en la caracterizaci\u00f3n y ejemplificaci\u00f3n de este rol del docente-prosumidor, al analizar a modo de discusi\u00f3n la necesidad de un proceso formativo con el fin de desarrollar pedag\u00f3gica y cr\u00edticamente este papel en la educaci\u00f3n superior.","published_in":"Academia y Virtualidad; Vol 10 No 1 (2017) ; Academia y Virtualidad; Vol. 10 N\u00fam. 1 (2017) ; 2011-0731","year":"2020-01-08T19:02:24Z","subject_orig":"caracter\u00edsticas del prosumidor; docente-prosumidor; educaci\u00f3n superior; empoderamiento; web 2.0","subject":"caracter\u00edsticas del prosumidor; docente-prosumidor; educaci\u00f3n superior; empoderamiento; ; 0","authors":"Contreras Bravo, Leonardo Emiro; Gonzalez Guerrero, Karolina","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10654\/33046","oa_state":"1","url":"1a9f81fc354b0df0df58e0dca02d89a991afa092cd8ede4fe81ea45ec44a6b8f","relevance":101},{"id":"c1fa5e39ed17303d03757453a6f5bb22fe010a8f6f101de4cfbfbef638db96f9","relation":"https:\/\/portalrevistas.ucb.br\/index.php\/RCEUCB\/article\/view\/10253\/6815; https:\/\/portalrevistas.ucb.br\/index.php\/RCEUCB\/article\/view\/10253; doi:10.24860\/comunicologia.v12i2.10253","identifier":"https:\/\/portalrevistas.ucb.br\/index.php\/RCEUCB\/article\/view\/10253; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.24860\/comunicologia.v12i2.10253","title":"ERA P\u00d3S-DIGITAL: ATRA\u00c7\u00c3O DE CLIENTES COM ESTRAT\u00c9GIAS DE MARKETING NA AMBI\u00caNCIA DA INTERNET","paper_abstract":"O objetivo deste artigo \u00e9 analisar as estrat\u00e9gias de marketing digital utilizadas para atra\u00e7\u00e3o de clientes na era p\u00f3s-digital, por meio de um estudo de caso da empresa Marketing Com Digital. Como objetivos espec\u00edficos, pretende-se: mapear as estrat\u00e9gias de marketing utilizadas para atrair novos clientes a partir do cadastro em uma campanha espec\u00edfica; descrever os esfor\u00e7os de e-mail marketing da empresa para transformar leads em consumidores efetivos e compreender a import\u00e2ncia do marketing de conte\u00fado durante esse processo. A pesquisa tem natureza qualitativa e utiliza as seguintes t\u00e9cnicas: observa\u00e7\u00e3o encoberta e n\u00e3o participativa, an\u00e1lise de conte\u00fado e an\u00e1lise documental. Os resultados demonstraram que as estrat\u00e9gias utilizadas pela empresa objetivam transformar um n\u00e3o conhecedor da marca em um cliente, no menor tempo poss\u00edvel, com o constante envio de e-mails a partir do cadastro em campanhas espec\u00edficas. Contudo, para que tal abordagem ocorra de forma positiva, \u00e9 preciso controlar a atua\u00e7\u00e3o da empresa para que esta n\u00e3o transforme a comunica\u00e7\u00e3o constante em spam, e, prejudique a sua visibilidade e reputa\u00e7\u00e3o na internet.","published_in":"Comunicologia - Revista de Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o da Universidade Cat\u00f3lica de Bras\u00edlia; V. 12, N. 2, JUL.\/DEZ., 2019; 79-104 ; 1981-2132","year":"2020-04-16","subject_orig":"Comunica\u00e7\u00e3o; Era p\u00f3s-digital. From decades ago up to now, economic turmoil to the technological leaps from vinyl, cassettes, to CDs, to the Internet and the related peer-to-peer (P2P) file streaming technologies, the Thai music industry has been challenged and continues to witness tumultuous times. More recently, broadband and Internet enabled smartphones have exacerbated the issues swirling around digital music piracy and the loss of revenue to both the music label houses and their artists, while Y-Generation as digital music consumers are also the largest owners of smart phones within the population, yet one of the largest digital consumer segments with a lifetime spending potential. This study is therefore focused on the variables that contribute to factors influencing piracy leading further to understand users\u2019 behaviours and how to solve the aforementioned issue. Quantitative data surveyed from a sample of 300 Y-generation music users who have experienced illegally online music access or download. Partial Least Square (SmartPLS) software was conducted to analyse Structural Equation Model (SEM). Perceived risk, perceived benefit and attitudes are variables affecting the music piracy behavior directly and indirectly. Thus, Music labels and artists need to understand the motives that cause Y-generation willingness to embrace illegal downloading, developing methods and marketing strategies to encounter this unsustainable act. ; Machine translation, handwriting recognition, speech recognition are changing our reality. The work of creating unmanned vehicles, voice assistants and other devices using these technologies is in an active process. The article examines the historical context of the artificial intelligence development, it evaluates the possibilities of its introduction into cyber games, as a safe and effective platform for testing new methods of machine learning. The promotion of such projects can increase the reputation of development companies, ensure increased user confidence in other products and, with a competent marketing strategy, cause a significant public resonance among video game fans, providing the developer with economic profit.","published_in":"Amazonia Investiga; Vol 9 No 28 (2020); 123-129 ; Amazonia Investiga; Vol. 9 N\u00fam. 28 (2020); 123-129 ; Amazonia Investiga; v. 9 n. 28 (2020); 123-129 ; 2322-6307 ; 10.34069\/AI\/2020.28.04","year":"2020-04-21","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Eliseeva, D. K.","link":"https:\/\/www.amazoniainvestiga.info\/index.php\/amazonia\/article\/view\/1043","oa_state":"1","url":"2171a35be452f44e2e9387f5d51ab364cbdfef8e5e9809609d8ef869a6bab482","relevance":98},{"id":"21ff556ebd15401e06bc5ee5dc239ec2eee744ea0944d95f7bf83b3d3a9464f2","relation":"https:\/\/fatecpg.edu.br\/revista\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/35\/28; https:\/\/fatecpg.edu.br\/revista\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/35","identifier":"https:\/\/fatecpg.edu.br\/revista\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/35","title":"The importance of pilotage service for port: a study of its practice in port of santos ; O potencial exportador do cinema brasileiro: uma an\u00e1lise da cadeia produtiva do setor","paper_abstract":"The growing use of digital platforms has brought the ease of marketing of products and services worldwide. In relation to cultural goods, we now have the possibility of watching a cinematographic work wherever we want and at any time, besides acquiring and marketing it. A film work takes to other countries the national identity of its production as well as its cultural values, but it is necessary to watch the process of production, distribution and exhibition of certain audiovisual content. Exportation is known to be important to a country's trade balance and the audiovisual sector is responsible for a significant part of the trade agenda of many countries. In Brazil, this segment has a growth potential above the other sectors of the economy mind, this article intends to discuss the functioning of the productive chain of the sector, the feasibility of Brazilian cinematographic exportations, as well as show the main means of a finished film export. It also aims to understand how the Brazilian cinematographic sector can be leveraged in order to conquer the international market, becoming competitive in the agenda of our exportations. Finally, it should be pointed out that in order to ensure fairness between importation and exportation of audiovisual goods and services, it is necessary for Brazilian producers to be able to produce and distribute digital content for its integration into the global chain, and also for consumers to have effective means of accessing such content. ; A crescente utiliza\u00e7\u00e3o de plataformas digitais trouxe a facilidade de comercializa\u00e7\u00e3o de produtos e servi\u00e7os no mundo todo. Em rela\u00e7\u00e3o aos bens culturais, temos hoje a possibilidade de assistir a uma obra cinematogr\u00e1fica de onde quisermos e a qualquer momento, al\u00e9m de adquiri-la e comercializ\u00e1-la. Uma obra f\u00edlmica leva para outros pa\u00edses a identidade nacional de sua produ\u00e7\u00e3o bem como seus valores culturais, mas faz-se necess\u00e1rio atentar ao processo de produ\u00e7\u00e3o, distribui\u00e7\u00e3o e exibi\u00e7\u00e3o de determinado conte\u00fado audiovisual. Sabe-se que a exporta\u00e7\u00e3o \u00e9 fundamental para a balan\u00e7a comercial de um pa\u00eds e o setor audiovisual \u00e9 respons\u00e1vel por parte significativa da pauta comercial de muitos pa\u00edses. No Brasil, esse segmento apresenta um potencial de crescimento acima dos outros setores da economia por estar associado ao entretenimento, campo com alto potencial valorativo. Pensando nisso, este artigo pretende discorrer acerca do funcionamento da cadeia produtiva do setor, da viabilidade das exporta\u00e7\u00f5es cinematogr\u00e1ficas brasileiras, bem como mostrar os principais meios de uma exporta\u00e7\u00e3o f\u00edlmica j\u00e1 acabada. Objetiva-se ainda compreender de que forma o setor cinematogr\u00e1fico brasileiro pode ser alavancado a fim de conquistar o mercado internacional, tornando-se competitivo na pauta de nossas exporta\u00e7\u00f5es. Destaca-se que para haver equidade entre importa\u00e7\u00e3o e exporta\u00e7\u00e3o de bens e servi\u00e7os audiovisuais \u00e9 preciso que os produtores brasileiros sejam capazes de produzir e distribuir conte\u00fado digital para sua integra\u00e7\u00e3o em cadeia global e tamb\u00e9m que os consumidores possuam meios eficazes para acessar esse conte\u00fado.","published_in":"Revista Processando o Saber; http:\/\/journalprosciences.com\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/237","identifier":"http:\/\/journalprosciences.com\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/237","title":"Estrategias de comunicaci\u00f3n digital para el Gobierno Aut\u00f3nomo Descentralizado Municipal del Cant\u00f3n Chimbo, Provincia de Bol\u00edvar","paper_abstract":"Las estrategias de comunicaci\u00f3n digital est\u00e1n direccionadas y estructuradas a proporcionar medios, instrumentos, p\u00e1ginas sociales que permitan emitir informaci\u00f3n veraz, aut\u00e9ntica, oportuna, garantizando al p\u00fablico interno y externo del GADM del Cant\u00f3n Chimbo eficiencia y credibilidad en la comunicaci\u00f3n por ser una instituci\u00f3n p\u00fablica, que busca constantemente el mejoramiento, satisfacci\u00f3n, transparencia en ideas, im\u00e1genes, noticias, comentarios, sugerencias y mensajes a transmitir. La intenci\u00f3n del trabajo fue analizar el estado actual de los medios de comunicaci\u00f3n tradicionales que se maneja en la instituci\u00f3n y su soluci\u00f3n, estudiando la evoluci\u00f3n de h\u00e1bitos de consumo de informaci\u00f3n digital respecto a lo habitual. Para el desarrollo de la investigaci\u00f3n se realiz\u00f3 un diagn\u00f3stico situacional del Municipio a trav\u00e9s del trabajo de campo, adicionalmente se aplic\u00f3 entrevistas al alcalde, concejales, jefes departamentales, apoyado de un Focus Group a los habitantes del cant\u00f3n, lo que permiti\u00f3 definir procesos y estrategias de soluci\u00f3n al problema, se demostr\u00f3 que tanto directivos, empleados, manejan informaci\u00f3n de manera informal, desconocen en su mayor\u00eda sobre herramientas digitales de comunicaci\u00f3n, los p\u00fablicos externos no son comunicados oportunamente a participar en eventos, actividades desarrolladas por la instituci\u00f3n. Una de las estrategias establecidas fue el Social Media Marketing, facilitando a ser proactivos debido a los m\u00faltiples beneficios que brinda a diferentes campos sociales, logrando conectarse e interactuar con ideas, productos, servicios que la instituci\u00f3n quiere comunicar; adem\u00e1s es fortalecida por su eminente orientaci\u00f3n hacia el usuario y sus actividades sociales en la web, reduciendo costes, tiempo, espacio de manera directa y oportuna.","published_in":"Pro Sciences; Vol. 4 No. 32 (2020): Marzo; 25-33 ; Pro Sciences: Revista de Producci\u00f3n, Ciencias e Investigaci\u00f3n; Vol. 4 N\u00fam. 32 (2020): Marzo; 25-33 ; 2588-1000","year":"2020-03-31","subject_orig":"comunicaci\u00f3n digital; estrategias; social media marketing; servicios","subject":"comunicaci\u00f3n digital; estrategias; social media marketing; servicios","authors":"Garc\u00eda Garc\u00eda, Ver\u00f3nica Tatiana; Moyano Aguay, M\u00f3nica Fernanda; Viscarra Armjos, Charles Pa\u00fal; Barreto Bonilla, Jessica Andrea","link":"http:\/\/journalprosciences.com\/index.php\/ps\/article\/view\/237","oa_state":"1","url":"c72ecaad6ff4c7d85a44299bea4aa83a460406fe4ece53d19819fa2be9720d89","relevance":96},{"id":"9af183b0624fe8d54eada49951436be6956d3dd0464ce67e6aca79f906af0c9a","relation":"https:\/\/journal.ilininstitute.com\/index.php\/caradde\/article\/view\/344\/245; https:\/\/journal.ilininstitute.com\/index.php\/caradde\/article\/view\/344","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.ilininstitute.com\/index.php\/caradde\/article\/view\/344","title":"Penggunaan Pemasaran Digital (Digital Marketing) Sebagai Pendukung Pengembangan Usaha Pada Kelompok Pengrajin Anoa Art","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this PKM is to overcome the problems of partners by implementing digital marketing and fostering innovation in economic value products so that their craft products can reach a broad target market. Through a participatory approach, the implementation of activities in the group of craftsmen together collaborate to find solutions using digital marketing methods of craft products. Collaboration uses multi-stakeholder campuses, partner groups, professionals, and the government in formulating and finding solutions to the problems of craftsmen groups in the village of Pangan Jaya. As a result, using online marketing through the website, whatsapp messaging applications, facebook and Instagram products sold significantly increased and marketing of craft products has reached a wider market.","published_in":"CARADDE: Jurnal Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat; Vol. 2 No. 2 (2020): Februari; 345-352 ; 2621-7910 ; 2621-7961 ; 10.31960\/caradde.v2i2","year":"2020-02-08","subject_orig":"Pemasaran digital; ekonomi kreatif; limbah kayu","subject":"Pemasaran digital; ekonomi kreatif; limbah kayu","authors":"Asis, Patta Hindi; Marjani, Marjani; Ma\u2019ruf, Andi Awaluddin","link":"https:\/\/journal.ilininstitute.com\/index.php\/caradde\/article\/view\/344","oa_state":"1","url":"9af183b0624fe8d54eada49951436be6956d3dd0464ce67e6aca79f906af0c9a","relevance":95},{"id":"24cadb7b9a3a0853f19c4156c4d95cf856a6a0c1465af86aa31148fd33854b0f","relation":"http:\/\/komunikasi.fisip.unila.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/metakom\/article\/view\/66\/54; http:\/\/komunikasi.fisip.unila.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/metakom\/article\/view\/66; doi:10.23960\/metakom.v4i1.66","identifier":"http:\/\/komunikasi.fisip.unila.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/metakom\/article\/view\/66; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.23960\/metakom.v4i1.66","title":"TOURISM PROMOTION STRATEGY OF PUNCAK MAS BANDAR LAMPUNG CITY","paper_abstract":"Puncak Mas is one of the leading tourist attractions in the city of Bandar Lampung. This can be seen from the enthusiasm of the community to come to visit Puncak Mas. The achievement of Puncak Mas in attracting public visits, was recorded at 6,000 to 7,000 on holiday weekends. This study is intended to find out how the promotion strategy carried out by the management of Puncak Mas. This study uses Muncak marine binoculars as a comparison. The data in this study were obtained by conducting interviews with the manager of Puncak Mas and a little with Muncak marine binoculars. Observations and documentation carried out for field verification. Visitors who were interviewed only to crosscheck data from interviews with managers. The results of this study found that the promotion strategy undertaken by Puncak mas was in accordance with the marketing mix concept, by combining 4 elements of P, namely product, price, place and promotions. https:\/\/bibliotekovedenie.rsl.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/1487; doi:10.25281\/0869-608X-2020-69-2-135-146","identifier":"https:\/\/bibliotekovedenie.rsl.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/1487; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25281\/0869-608X-2020-69-2-135-146","title":"Global Trends in Marketing Technologies to Promote Library Websites ; \u041c\u0438\u0440\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0435 \u0442\u0435\u043d\u0434\u0435\u043d\u0446\u0438\u0438 \u043c\u0430\u0440\u043a\u0435\u0442\u0438\u043d\u0433\u043e\u0432\u044b\u0445 \u0442\u0435\u0445\u043d\u043e\u043b\u043e\u0433\u0438\u0439 \u043f\u0440\u043e\u0434\u0432\u0438\u0436\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f \u0431\u0438\u0431\u043b\u0438\u043e\u0442\u0435\u0447\u043d\u044b\u0445 \u0441\u0430\u0439\u0442\u043e\u0432","paper_abstract":"In recent decades, the scope of library activities has changed. In addition to providing traditional resources and services, today libraries themselves are becoming developers of digital content and providers of access to electronic content. The user base of libraries is also undergoing significant changes: there are changing the user generations, employment trends, areas of interest and habits. Realizing that marketing activities can increase user loyalty, form public opinion about both \u2014 a particular institution and libraries in general, increase the visibility of library resources and enlarge market share, the most active specialists are adapting marketing to the conditions of libraries operation. In 2019, there was organized the study on the websites of libraries in Russia, Australia, the United States and Canada, Western and Eastern Europe, Latin America, as well as in a number of countries in South and South-East Asia in order to identify the main trends in the organization of library promotion in the Internet environment. There were considered the websites of public, national, University and academic libraries. Library websites were analysed for the use of 10 most common tools in Internet marketing, such as: the transition to a modern web site design, effective linking with social networks, marketing in social networks (Social Media Marketing, SMM), the use of banner advertising, the availability of subscription to e-mailing, the publication of press and post releases, the presence of a blog in the library domain, the availability of content evaluation and sharing tools in social networks. The study conclusion was the identification of trends in the development of library sites over a large area and the compilation of heat maps, which clearly demonstrate such trends, where the libraries of the countries of North America, Australia and Northern Europe showed greater consistency with the parameters selected for the study; Central and Southern Europe, Russia and part of the countries of Latin America are in the transition zone, and the least compliance are found in the countries of South Asia. The most common means of promotion is the publication of press and post releases. Among the least used marketing technologies are blogs in the library domain, embedded video and Internet broadcasts, as well as work on optimizing sites for an audience from social networks. ; \u0412 http:\/\/siba-ese.unile.it\/index.php\/linguelinguaggi\/article\/view\/21330","identifier":"http:\/\/siba-ese.unile.it\/index.php\/linguelinguaggi\/article\/view\/21330","title":"\u201cIn fair Verona, where we lay our scene\u201d. A multimodal analysis of the tourist gaze on Verona in travel blogs","paper_abstract":"The increasing presence and popularity of online travel blogs has recently added another layer to tourism discourse studies and to destination marketing, eliciting interest in research on user-generated content in tourism. Such blogs have been recognized as valuable sources of information as they are based on actual travel experiences; as a consequence, they can generate digital word-of-mouth communication to prospective visitors, potentially influencing their destination choices. This paper aims to investigate tourist perceptions and representations of Verona from a multimodal perspective, in order to explore the tourist gaze (Urry 1990) on the city, with an additional focus on its relation to the popular imagery of Shakespeare\u2019s Romeo and Juliet. To this purpose, a number of blog entries about Verona from two travel blog platforms (TravelBlog, Travellerspoint) and individual non-professional blogs were analyzed, for a total of 100 entries published from 2010 to 2018. A quantitative-qualitative mixed approach will be adopted to analyze the language used in the blogs as well as the accompanying images, also drawing on Kress and van Leeuwen\u2019s visual grammar model (2006).","published_in":"Lingue e Linguaggi; Volume 36 (2020); 59-75","year":"2020-07-27","subject_orig":"L-LIN12; language of tourism; blogging; multimodal analysis; tourist gaze; Verona","subject":"L-LIN language of tourism; blogging; multimodal analysis; tourist gaze; Verona","authors":"Franceschi, Valeria","link":"http:\/\/siba-ese.unile.it\/index.php\/linguelinguaggi\/article\/view\/21330","oa_state":"1","url":"1de15e607f3923f245b184ef3081ba3ab3fad3c497d94c9f870a995787b1a3a2","relevance":92},{"id":"994518c3e9de852a041f06e4e6a56acc5888b4d4c4d80ac400660c845c0ef9bc","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7498405; (Revista) ISSN 2007-0934","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7498405","title":"An\u00e1lisis de la competitividad y comercializaci\u00f3n de nuez pecanera mexicana en el mercado internacional","paper_abstract":"The production, process and industrialization of the Mexican walnut are a topic of great importance for the economy and development of the country (particularly for the producing states), as well as the commercialization and behavior of the market, local and international. Given the above, the main objective of this document is to analyze various aspects of the pecan nut (hereinafter it will be referred to with the generic term: walnut) in the international market, such as competitiveness, production and marketing. Using data from theFood and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), the Agri-Food and Fisheries Information Service (SIAP), the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) and the National Institute of Statistics and Geography (INEGI), relevant results were obtained where it was identified that the largest buyers and trading partners of this product are Mexico, the United States of America and China, the latter being the main competitor of pecan nuts in the international market, despite the fact that Mexico's competitiveness It has increased in recent years ; La producci\u00f3n, el proceso y la industrializaci\u00f3n de la nuez mexicana son un tema de gran importancia para la econom\u00eda y el desarrollo del pa\u00eds (particularmente para los estados productores), as\u00ed como tambi\u00e9n la comercializaci\u00f3n y el comportamiento del mercado, local e internacional. Dado lo anterior, el principal objetivo de este documento es analizar diversos aspectos de la nuez pecanera (en adelante se referir\u00e1 a \u00e9sta con el t\u00e9rmino gen\u00e9rico: nuez) en el mercado internacional como lo son la competitividad, producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n. Utilizando datos de la Organizaci\u00f3n de las Naciones Unidas para la Alimentaci\u00f3n y la Agricultura (FAO), del Servicio de Informaci\u00f3n Agroalimentaria y Pesquera (SIAP), la United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) y el Instituto Nacional de Estad\u00edstica y Geograf\u00eda (INEGI), se obtuvieron resultados relevantes donde se identific\u00f3 que los mayores compradores y socios comerciales de este producto son M\u00e9xico, Estados Unidos de Am\u00e9rica y China, siendo \u00e9ste \u00faltimo el principal competidor de nuez pecanera en el mercado internacional, a pesar de que la competitividad de M\u00e9xico ha aumentado en los \u00faltimos a\u00f1os.","published_in":"Revista mexicana de ciencias agr\u00edcolas, ISSN 2007-0934, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 4, 2020, pags. 895-904","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Competitividad; nuez; producci\u00f3n; Competitiveness; production; walnut","subject":"Competitividad; nuez; producci\u00f3n; Competitiveness; production; walnut","authors":"\u00c1vila Arce, Adanelly; Gonz\u00e1lez Mil\u00e1n, David de Jes\u00fas; Monta\u00f1o M\u00e9ndez, Ileana; Vizca\u00edno Villareal, Luis Alberto","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7498405","oa_state":"2","url":"994518c3e9de852a041f06e4e6a56acc5888b4d4c4d80ac400660c845c0ef9bc","relevance":91},{"id":"66fe376567dfda6ca601241d3df12b301cd463dce2e5581c3ecb4c30d5f52ea0","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7510887; (Revista) ISSN 1390-9304","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7510887","title":"Influencia de la experiencia de marca en consumidores de compras online en la ciudad de cuenca-ecuador","paper_abstract":"Nowadays it is very common to use the term \"experience\" in marketing, to highlight the experience that a consumer has with a certain service or product. It can be noted that when experiences generate an emotional connection with a brand, it translates into a \"branding experience\". Based on the above, we seek to analyze the influence of brand experience on consumers of online shopping in the city of Cuenca \u2013 Ecuador. The research will carry out a documentary analysis of the main theories of \"experiential marketing\", reviewing the main bibliographic sources in order to delimit the referential framework that will constitute the theoretical bases of the study. It aims to generate a holistic vision of the influence of brand experience on consumer behavior of online shopping. It has been considered to start with the identification of lines of research focused on the analysis and study of consumer behaviour and the direct relationship that consumers have with the \"experiences\" generated by electronic stores. In addition, in order to carry out the research, a methodological approach is proposed that allows research to be framed in order to obtain results and with them to be able to provide an application orientation for the academic and professional sector. ; En la actualidad es muy habitual que dentro del Marketing se utilice el t\u00e9rmino \u201cexperiencia\u201d, para destacar la vivencia que tiene un consumidor con un determinado servicio o producto. Se puede se\u00f1alar que cuando las vivencias generan una conexi\u00f3n emocional con una marca, se traduce a una \u201cexperiencia de marca\u201d. A partir de lo expuesto, se busca analizar la influencia que tiene la experiencia de marca en los consumidores de compras on-line en la ciudad de Cuenca \u2013 Ecuador. En la investigaci\u00f3n parte de un an\u00e1lisis documental de las principales teor\u00edas del \u201cmarketing experiencial\u201d, analizando las principales fuentes bibliogr\u00e1ficas para ir delimitando el marco referencial que constituir\u00e1 las bases te\u00f3ricas del estudio. El cual pretende generar una visi\u00f3n hol\u00edstica de la influencia de la experiencia de marca en el comportamiento del consumidor de compras on-line. Se ha considerado iniciar con la identificaci\u00f3n de las l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n centradas en el an\u00e1lisis y estudio del comportamiento del consumidor y la relaci\u00f3n directa que \u00e9stos tienen con las \u201cexperiencias\u201d que generan las tiendas electr\u00f3nicas. Buah ini berasal dari Negara-negara Asia seperti Taiwan, Vietnam, Filipina, Indonesia dan Malaysia. Buah naga dianggap sebagai buah super tropis dan obat-obatan karena memiliki banyak manfaat. melimpahnya buah naga saat panen, membuat harga buah naga menjadi murah, bahkan ada petani buah naga yang membuang hasil panennya di sungai akibat jatuhnya harga buah naga. permasalahan ini kemudian dimanfaatkan oleh mahasiswa UNMUH Jember yang pernah KKN di desa Tembokrejo untuk membuat UMKM Stick Buah Naga yang nantinya dijalankan oleh ibu-ibu PKK yang dipimpin oleh ibu lina. UMKM Stick Buah Naga ini ternyata masih belum bisa berjalan optimal dkarenakan beberapa masalah, sehingga pengabdian ini bertujuan untuk 1. Memberikan pengetahuan tentang manajemen operasional, sehingga bisa bekerja secara efektif dan efisien, serta memberi beberapa peralatan yang menunjang sehingga UMKM bisa lebih produktif. 2.Memberikan pengetahuan tentang manajemen pemasaran yang baik, serta pemanfaatan media social untuk menunjang pemasaran digial (digital marketing). 3. Memberikan pengetahuan tentang pembuatan lapora laba rugi dan penghitungan HPP, sehingga bisa menggunakan modal lebih efisien.","published_in":"Jurnal Pengabdian Masyarakat Manage; Vol 1, No 1 (2020): Februari; 1 - 6 ; 2721-6608 ; 10.32528\/jpmm.v1i1","year":"2020-03-02","subject_orig":"UMKM; Stick Buah Naga; Pemasaran Online","subject":"UMKM; Stick Buah Naga; Pemasaran Online","authors":"Izzuddin, Ahmad; Hasanah, Maghfirotul","link":"http:\/\/jurnal.unmuhjember.ac.id\/index.php\/manage\/article\/view\/3287","oa_state":"1","url":"1a8c36d97802f8672fcdde7dbf0abe85134ba9197b896894543ccfa557b03ef3","relevance":89},{"id":"6f606778e4effbecdce4e9e94a14780dc4e27f12426715afe46d60d6f09eb626","relation":"http:\/\/ojs.correspondenciasyanalisis.com\/index.php\/Journalcya\/article\/view\/350\/451; http:\/\/ojs.correspondenciasyanalisis.com\/index.php\/Journalcya\/article\/view\/350\/463; Anson, R. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.24265\/cian.2020.n11.08","title":"Communication strategies of luxury fashion brands: Is sustainable a luxury? ; Estrategias de comunicaci\u00f3n de las marcas de moda de lujo: \u00bfEs lo sostenible un lujo?","paper_abstract":"The use and consumption of ecological and sustainable products imply a high cost due to the complexity of its supply chain, and luxury fashion is an industry that is increasingly influenced by the phenomenon of sustainability. \"Is sustainable luxury or sustainability a luxury?\" It is the main question that the current investigation seek to address through in-depth interviews with professionals in the luxury fashion sector, how do their production chains work, what strategies are used in their businesses and how do they promote ecological and sustainable values through an aesthetic expression such as Haute Couture garments. ; El uso y consumo de productos ecol\u00f3gicos y sostenibles con el medio ambiente implican un alto coste por la complejidad de su cadena de producci\u00f3n y, la moda de lujo es una industria que cada vez se ve m\u00e1s influenciada por el fen\u00f3meno de la sostenibilidad. \u201c\u00bfEs el lujo sostenible o lo sostenible es un lujo?\u201d Es la pregunta principal que se busca abordar a lo largo del estudio a trav\u00e9s de entrevistas en profundidad a profesionales del sector de la moda de lujo c\u00f3mo trabajan sus cadenas de producci\u00f3n, qu\u00e9 estrategias emplean en sus negocios y c\u00f3mo fomentan valores ecol\u00f3gicos y sostenibles a trav\u00e9s de una expresi\u00f3n est\u00e9tica como son sus prendas de alta costura.","published_in":"Correspondences & Analysis;
