Dengan batik dan religiusitas di kota Pekalongan menggerakkan Asosiasi Aksi Muda dalam pemberdayakan umat melalui kegiatan kewirausahaan, salah satu bentuk wirausahanya adalah membuat kaligrafi. Akan tetapi perkembangan kaligrafi ini mengalami beberapa kendala diantaranya 1) Belum diterapkannya praktik bisnis Islam, 2) Belum adanya produk ciri khas kaligrafi, 3) Rendahnya produktifitas produksi dan 4) Perlunya manajemen pemasaran. Solusi yang ditawarkan adalah Batik dakwah project, yang diharapkan dapat membantu menyelesaikan permasalahan mitra tersebut. Metode pendekatan yang digunakan untuk pelaksanaan kegiatan pengabdian kepada masyarakat adalah metode pemberdayaan masyarakat partisipatif atau Participatory Rural Apraissal (PRA). Dengan kondisi seperti tersebut diatas, maka program yang kami usulkan adalah, Program kreatifitas batik, dengan judul tema PKM Batik Dakwah berupa: Kelas project 1 yang menanamkan keilmuwan dan praktek etika bisnis Islam. Kelas project 2 menumbuhkan kecintaan kepada motif batik pekalongan Kelas project 3 menciptakan inovasi produk yang belum pernah ada dengan mengedepankan keberkahan produk Kelas project 4 pemahaman tentang persaingan usaha dan pembuatan digital marketing berupa instagram. Produk yang dihasilkan berupa Kaligrafi yang dipadukan dengan ukiran batik khas pekalongan, dan terdapat peningkatan omset bagi mitra binaan.","published_in":"Jurnal Abdimas PHB : Jurnal Pengabdian Masyarakat Progresif Humanis Brainstorming; Vol 3, No 1 (2020): Jurnal Abdimas PHB : Jurnal Pengabdian Masyarakat Progresif Humanis Brainstorming; 1-8 ; 2614-056X ; 2598-9030 ; 10.30591\/japhb.v3i1","year":"2020-01-15","subject_orig":"Kaligrafi; Batik dakwah; Pemasaran dan Produksi","subject":"Kaligrafi; Batik dakwah; Pemasaran dan Produksi","authors":"Saebani, Saebani; Purwanto, Teguh; Wirawan, Bayu","link":"http:\/\/ejournal.poltektegal.ac.id\/index.php\/abdimas\/article\/view\/1659","oa_state":"1","url":"b7a5ce38f3cd9fe489c28a264078a81e80e29504d2f9d49d3cad62a737539cd6","relevance":68},{"id":"35755ef326482bc3751ea8e535fa790e7c5d56a9497fde8dcbaeaea2f6d62825","relation":"info:eu-repo\/semantics\/altIdentifier\/hdl\/11580\/76637; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11580\/76637","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11580\/76637","title":"Investigating the links between the use of the internet, value co-creation, and customer satisfaction in the banking sector","paper_abstract":"Purpose of the paper: Because of the 2007 financial crisis, the necessity for banks to (re)build a strong dialogue with customers and improve their satisfaction has been particularly felt. Marketing scholars respond to this challenge by encouraging value co-creation initiatives. The aim of this paper is to analyse the role of Internet banking in stimulating value co-creation processes and the consequent effects on customer satisfaction. Methodology: Based on a review of literature on Internet banking, value co-creation, and customer satisfaction in the banking sector, the links between these variables are theoretically outlined and tested through an empirical investigation. Results are analysed with a regression analysis. Results: The results show how, by leveraging digital channels, real-time interactions and advanced advisory services can be implemented in order to encourage clients to participate in the process and meet their own needs, thus increasing their satisfaction. Practical implications: To practitioners, the study provides suggestions on how to improve customer satisfaction by offering opportunities for clients to access services and products through Internet technologies and encouraging them to become increasingly active in the co-creation process. Originality and value: Although the literature on banking management is prolific with regard to studies on Internet banking, value co-creation, and customer satisfaction, these dimensions are often studied separately. This work is the first useful attempt to investigate the links between these dimensions and to test them with an empirical analysis.","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"internet banking; value co-creation; customer satisfaction; banking sector; regression analysis","subject":"internet banking; value co-creation; customer satisfaction; banking sector; regression analysis","authors":"Formisano, Vincenzo; Moretta Tartaglione, Andrea; Fedele, Maria; Cavacece, Ylenia","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11580\/76637","oa_state":"2","url":"35755ef326482bc3751ea8e535fa790e7c5d56a9497fde8dcbaeaea2f6d62825","relevance":67},{"id":"b8a5d8ca4f66fe1b8adcac7480baa6422a92de68f63e0b8f6ee9b98cf65154bb","relation":"http:\/\/journal.feb.unmul.ac.id\/index.php\/JIMM\/article\/view\/3644; doi:10.29264\/jimm.v4i2.3644","identifier":"http:\/\/journal.feb.unmul.ac.id\/index.php\/JIMM\/article\/view\/3644; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.29264\/jimm.v4i2.3644","title":"PENGARUH CONTENT MARKETING DAN INTEGRATED DIGITAL MARKETING SERTA MOBILE MARKETING TERHADAP KEPUTUSAN PENGGUNAAN JASA GO-JEK ONLINE DI KOTA SAMARINDA","paper_abstract":"Fajar Rahmadi, Pengaruh Content Marketing dan Integrated Digital Marketing serta Mobile Marketing Terhadap Keputusan Penggunaan Jasa Go-Jek Online Di Kota Samarinda. Penelitian ini bertujuan untuk Membangun model yang menjelaskan proses Pengaruh Content Marketing Integrated Digital Marketing dan Mobile Marketing Terhadap Keputusan Penggunaan Jasa Go-Jek Online Di Kota Samarinda. Penelitian ini dilakukan pada wanita dan pria yang berusia 20-44 tahun dan yang menggunakan layanan GO-JEK di Kota Samarinda. Metode analisis yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini adalah Data kuantitatif dan kualitatif. Metode pengolahan data yang digunakan peneliti adalah analisis regresi linier berganda menggunakan SPSS. Sampel yang digunakan dalam penelitian ini sebanyak 100 responden. pada wanita dan pria yang berusia 20-44 tahun dan yang menggunakan layanan GO-JEK di Kota Samarinda. Metode pegambilan sampel dengan menggunakan metode purposive sampling. Data yang diperoleh merupakan data primer yang merupakan hasil dari jawaban responden atas kuesioner yang disebarkan. Hasil penelitian menunjukkan bahwa Content Marketing Integrated Digital Marketing dan Mobile Marketing berpengaruh positif terhadap keputusan penggunaan jasa GO-JEK online di kota samarinda.","published_in":"Jurnal Ilmu Manajemen Mulawarman (JIMM); Vol 4, No 2 (2019)","year":"2020-01-11","subject_orig":"Content Marketing; Integrated Digital Marketing; Mobile Marketing; dan keputusan pembelian","subject":"Content Marketing; Integrated Digital Marketing; Mobile Marketing; dan keputusan pembelian","authors":"rahmadi, fajar; Achmad, Gusti Noorlitaria; Wasil, Muhammad Muhammad","link":"http:\/\/journal.feb.unmul.ac.id\/index.php\/JIMM\/article\/view\/3644","oa_state":"1","url":"b8a5d8ca4f66fe1b8adcac7480baa6422a92de68f63e0b8f6ee9b98cf65154bb","relevance":66},{"id":"85160811c55e94b40b83fdce409efd825a1fb734cbfa7e20f7fcb8926669d897","relation":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/28867\/pdf; Alaminos, A. Recuperado de: https:\/\/www.sciencedirect.com\/science\/article\/pii\/S0360131509001882; https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/28867; doi:10.1344\/der.2020.37.323-342","identifier":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/28867; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1344\/der.2020.37.323-342","title":"Modelo para determinar acciones de calidad en la formaci\u00f3n virtual","paper_abstract":"En el presente estudio, resultado de un trabajo de investigaci\u00f3n, se propone un modelo de ecuaciones estructurales donde se recogen algunas de las variables que podr\u00e1n determinar acciones de calidad en la formaci\u00f3n virtual. Los datos se recogieron por medio de un cuestionario a una muestra de 640 docentes de la instituci\u00f3n superior de Chile. Entre los resultados se destaca la significaci\u00f3n que el dominio t\u00e9cnico y did\u00e1ctico del docente, tiene sobre su frecuencia de uso, as\u00ed como en la utilizaci\u00f3n de diferentes materiales que en ella se soporta y como, todo ello en interacci\u00f3n, repercute en las actividades y estrategias desarrolladas.","published_in":"Digital Education Review; No 37 (2020): Number 37 June 2020 [Monographic] Digital learning: distraction or default for the future; 323-342 ; 2013-9144","year":"2020-06-30","subject_orig":"Education;ICT; Training; LMS; competencias digitales docentes; competencias pedag\u00f3gicas; educaci\u00f3n superior","subject":"Education;ICT; Training; LMS; competencias digitales docentes; competencias pedag\u00f3gicas; educaci\u00f3n superior","authors":"Cabero Almenara, Juio; Del Prete, Annachiara; Arancibia, Maria Luisa","link":"https:\/\/revistes.ub.edu\/index.php\/der\/article\/view\/28867","oa_state":"2","url":"85160811c55e94b40b83fdce409efd825a1fb734cbfa7e20f7fcb8926669d897","relevance":65},{"id":"97825e0eb08e013fc07ac67a5e2df6f3dc18f0e2bc2977868984e39bb59a6e6c","relation":"S\u00e1nchez-N\u00fa\u00f1ez, P., de las Heras-Pedrosa, C. & Pel\u00e1ez, J.I., 2020. Opinion Mining and Sentiment Analysis in Marketing Communications: A Science Mapping Analysis in Web of Science (1998\u20132018). Social Sciences, 9(3), p.23. http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.3390\/socsci9030023.; https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10630\/19377; http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.3390\/socsci9030023","identifier":"https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10630\/19377; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3390\/socsci9030023","title":"Opinion mining and sentiment analysis in marketing communications: a science mapping analysis in Web of Science (1998\u20132018)","paper_abstract":"Opinion mining and sentiment analysis has become ubiquitous in our society, with applications in online searching, computer vision, image understanding, artificial intelligence and marketing communications (MarCom). Within this context, opinion mining and sentiment analysis in marketing communications (OMSAMC) has a strong role in the development of the field by allowing us to understand whether people are satisfied or dissatisfied with our service or product in order to subsequently analyze the strengths and weaknesses of those consumer experiences. To the best of our knowledge, there is no science mapping analysis covering the research about opinion mining and sentiment analysis in the MarCom ecosystem. In this study, we perform a science mapping analysis on the OMSAMC research, in order to provide an overview of the scientific work during the last two decades in this interdisciplinary area and to show trends that could be the basis for future developments in the field. This study was carried out using VOSviewer, CitNetExplorer and InCites based on results from Web of Science (WoS). The results of this analysis show the evolution of the field, by highlighting the most notable authors, institutions, keywords, publications, countries, categories and journals. ; The research was funded by Programa Operativo FEDER Andaluc\u00eda 2014\u20102020, grant number \u201cLa reputaci\u00f3n de las organizaciones en una sociedad digital. Elaboraci\u00f3n de una Plataforma Inteligente para la Localizaci\u00f3n, Identificaci\u00f3n y Clasificaci\u00f3n de Influenciadores en los Medios Sociales Digitales (UMA18\u2010 FEDERJA\u2010148)\u201d and The APC was funded by the same research grant","published_in":"","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Bibliometr\u00eda; Sentiment analysis; Opinion mining; Marketing; Communication; Science mapping analysis; Web of Science (WoS); Bibliometric indicators; Scientific collaboration","subject":"Bibliometr\u00eda; Sentiment analysis; Opinion mining; Marketing; Communication; Science mapping analysis; Web of Science (WoS); Bibliometric indicators; Scientific collaboration","authors":"S\u00e1nchez-N\u00fa\u00f1ez, Pablo; De las Heras-Pedrosa, Carlos; Pel\u00e1ez, Jos\u00e9 Ignacio","link":"https:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10630\/19377","oa_state":"1","url":"97825e0eb08e013fc07ac67a5e2df6f3dc18f0e2bc2977868984e39bb59a6e6c","relevance":64},{"id":"613b0752dc562c99b949f060dfa9d805c46353391065c0ccb2e73785e0211621","relation":"1795-6161; 1-2; WiderScreen; 21; http:\/\/widerscreen.fi\/numerot\/2019-1-2\/synching-and-performing-body-re-presentation-in-the-short-video-app-tiktok\/; https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10471; URN:NBN:fi-fe202002074858","identifier":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10471","title":"Synching and performing : body (re)-presentation in the short video app TikTok","paper_abstract":"The performance of the body via new media seems centered on negotiating stereotypes of the body image, mainly gendered images of masculinity and femininity, and perceived notions of beauty as an indicator of sexual appeal. This study seeks to analyze the role of social networks in shaping stereotypes that rely on body visibility. The article chooses the short video app TikTok as one of the recent social networking apps (SNAs) offering users the ability to upload, edit, and share short form videos. The research methodology offers a content analysis of sample videos focusing on self-representation. Such analysis examines the impact SNAs have on the formation and expression of users\u2019 notions of beauty and gender through their digital representations of the body. ; fi=vertaisarvioitu|en=peerReviewed|","published_in":"","year":"2020-01-16","subject_orig":"beauty; body image; gender performativity; self-representation; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","subject":"beauty; body image; gender performativity; self-representation; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","authors":"Khattab, Mona","link":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10471","oa_state":"2","url":"613b0752dc562c99b949f060dfa9d805c46353391065c0ccb2e73785e0211621","relevance":63},{"id":"83980cb9b79a4a9083fa30460494849d43c46d8964ce5255a488d876a7621d25","relation":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/375\/391; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/375\/392; 10.16997\/wpcc.375; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/375; doi:10.16997\/wpcc.375","identifier":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/375; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.16997\/wpcc.375","title":"How to Define \u2018Viral\u2019 for Media Studies?","paper_abstract":"In this editorial for WPCC\u2019s \u2018Viral Media\u2019 issue the author asks whether the metaphor of viral media has held up well since it was coined. Considering the debate she suggests a clear distinction \u2013 notwithstanding the major role of technology \u2013 of viral media, when compared to biological viruses, which is the role of emotions in driving virality. This is what \u2018distinguishes the biological \u201cvirus\u201d from its psychologically driven communication counterpart\u2019.\u2018Viral\u2019 is indeed an \u2018imperfect term for rapid spread of information\u2019 but viral media items still have the potential to deliver \u2018progressive ideas\u2019. This editorial notes how the contents of the issue plays host to a variety of fresh perspectives in its themes such as corrupted play, journalistic choice, viral politics, voice and nostalgia. It also notes, referring to the issue\u2019s interview with Kishonna Gray, the dangers of platforms simply standing aside to allow toxic viral messaging and racism. It may be impossible to counter \u2018morally ambivalent\u2019 memes with regulatory or any other kind of \u2018vaccines\u2019 though it might, the author concludes, \u2018be reasonable to limit the expanse of the viral flows and to question the algorithmic patterns of digital platforms\u2019 even as memes\u2019 popularity and resistance to total marketing control preserve their continuing (if somewhat tarnished) reputation as a \u2018digital darling\u2019.","published_in":"Westminster Papers in Communication and Culture; Vol 15, No 1: Viral Media; 1\u20134 ; 1744-6716 ; 1744-6708","year":"2020-03-17","subject_orig":"platforms; viral; algorithms; communications; emotions; virality","subject":"platforms; viral; algorithms; communications; emotions; virality","authors":"Denisova, Anastasia","link":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/375","oa_state":"1","url":"83980cb9b79a4a9083fa30460494849d43c46d8964ce5255a488d876a7621d25","relevance":62},{"id":"ea6caebaa51f091685ce0dfe2eea204f3482a9999a2ee63c1599a76372cf8bb1","relation":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/344\/445; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/344\/446; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/344\/183; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/344\/184; 10.16997\/wpcc.344; https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/344; doi:10.16997\/wpcc.344","identifier":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/344; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.16997\/wpcc.344","title":"Understanding Authenticity in Digital Cause-Related Advertising: Does Cause Involvement Moderate Intention to Purchase?","paper_abstract":"The paper provides a survey understanding of two dimensions of perceived authenticity in digital cause-related marketing (CRM) display advertising and models the impact on consumers\u2019 responses. It develops a model with a set of six hypotheses and tests them through a multivariate structural equation technique on quantitative data generated by a survey procedure on a UK-based consumer panel. The 465 online panel participants consisted of 60% males and 40% females between the ages of 18 and 35.The findings provide empirical evidence that the perceived donation amount and ad-context congruence are intertwined perspectives of authenticity in digital CRM display ads, and show that both of these dimensions provide input to conferring authenticity on the ads. However, the perceived donation amount accounts for a stronger effect than ad-context congruence. The paper finds firms\u2019 altruistic motives an influential antecedent to the mediating role of attitudes towards the ad (AaD) as a fundraising tool. This is due to the nature of the impact of authenticity on the link with intention to purchase. Contrarily to expectation, the level of firms\u2019 involvement with a social cause does not moderate intention to purchase from the consumers\u2019 standpoint.The paper provides an interpretation of authentic perception in digital CRM advertising and proposes a composite model of the mechanism of this effect on consumers\u2019 response.In DCRM advertising, increasing the perception of donation magnitude is a key driver to advertising success, and the level of association with a social cause is not a significant factor in segmenting and targeting consumers.","published_in":"Westminster Papers in Communication and Culture; Vol 15, No 2: Advertising for the Human Good; 24\u201343 ; 1744-6716 ; 1744-6708","year":"2020-07-31","subject_orig":"digital cause-related advertising; banner ad; ad authenticity; cause-involvement; donation amount; social cause","subject":"digital cause-related advertising; banner ad; ad authenticity; cause-involvement; donation amount; social cause","authors":"Ndasi, Wilson; Akcay, Ediz Edip","link":"https:\/\/www.westminsterpapers.org\/jms\/article\/view\/344","oa_state":"1","url":"ea6caebaa51f091685ce0dfe2eea204f3482a9999a2ee63c1599a76372cf8bb1","relevance":61},{"id":"91a27cf83dedb9f3407b25581325b0dfbd4f513ddf7cea9824dff7169eefaf1f","relation":"http:\/\/ejournal.kemenparekraf.go.id\/index.php\/jki\/article\/view\/149\/38; http:\/\/ejournal.kemenparekraf.go.id\/index.php\/jki\/article\/view\/149","identifier":"http:\/\/ejournal.kemenparekraf.go.id\/index.php\/jki\/article\/view\/149","title":"Upaya Meningkatkan Angka Kunjungan Museum Melalui Social Media Marketing \u2013 Studi Pendahuluan","paper_abstract":"Digital marketing, termasuk social media marketing, memegang peran penting dalam memaparkan banyak hal. Museum di Yogyakarta sudah banyak melakukan promosi melalui media sosial dan mengikuti tren, antara lain Museum Sonobudoyo dan Museum Sandi. Berbagai tantangan ditemui dalam mengembangkan media sosial di museum, misalnya kondisi nyata museum yang belum dapat melakukan banyak inovasi dan regulasi yang mendasari. Kedua museum (Museum Sonobudoyo milik Pemerintah Daerah Yogyakarta dan Museum Sandi adalah milik Badan Sandi Negara Jakarta) dipilih berdasarkan purposive random sampling, yaitu berdasarkan keaktifan dalam update media sosial selama 6 bulan terakhir terhitung dari Oktober 2019 \u2013 Maret 2020. Studi kualitatif dan kuantitatif diadakan untuk menilai persepsi dan opini masyarakat terhadap museum serta mencari tahu apa yang sebaiknya ditingkatkan oleh pihak museum sehingga masyarakat semakin tergerak untuk datang ke museum. Hasil studi ini diharapkan akan menjadi panduan museum untuk memperbaiki diri dan beradaptasi dengan situasi dan trend wisata yang ada di masyarakat berdasarkan disrupsi teknologi yang ada saat ini.","published_in":"Jurnal Kepariwisataan Indonesia : Jurnal Penelitian dan Pengembangan Kepariwisataan Indonesia; Vol 14 No 1 (2020): Jurnal Kepariwisataan Indonesia: Jurnal Penelitian dan Pengembangan Kepariwisataan Indonesia; 1-8 ; 2685-9076 ; 1907-9419","year":"2020-08-02","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Cornellia, Ayu Helena; Hermawan, Hary","link":"http:\/\/ejournal.kemenparekraf.go.id\/index.php\/jki\/article\/view\/149","oa_state":"1","url":"91a27cf83dedb9f3407b25581325b0dfbd4f513ddf7cea9824dff7169eefaf1f","relevance":60},{"id":"5d87706b02464ca890cb9b5efe0eed02135d1d36b0886a15597ba7e8588dce2b","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1151053; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/akusosbil\/issue\/54924\/482305; doi:10.32709\/akusosbil.482305","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/akusosbil\/issue\/54924\/482305; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.32709\/akusosbil.482305","title":"G\u00fcncel Pazarlama Yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131n Sa\u011fl\u0131k Hizmetlerinde Uygulanabilirli\u011fi ; The Application of Contemporary Marketing Approaches in the Health Services","paper_abstract":"Sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetlerinin kendine \u00f6zg\u00fc \u00f6zellikleri nedeniyle sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetlerinde pazarlama faaliyetleri di\u011fer hizmet sekt\u00f6rlerinden farkl\u0131la\u015fmaktad\u0131r. Sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmeti pazarlamas\u0131; sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmeti sunucular\u0131n\u0131n say\u0131s\u0131n\u0131n artmas\u0131, artan t\u0131bbi maliyetler ve t\u0131bbi odaklar\u0131n de\u011fi\u015fmesi gibi zorluklarla rekabet\u00e7i bir \u015fekilde nas\u0131l ba\u015fa \u00e7\u0131k\u0131labilece\u011fine dair bir anlay\u0131\u015f sa\u011flamaktad\u0131r. Sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetleri pazarlamas\u0131na y\u00f6nelik ele\u015ftiriler olmakla birlikte, her t\u00fcrl\u00fc hizmette oldu\u011fu gibi sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetlerinde de memnuniyeti yaratma ve sadakat olu\u015fturmada hizmet pazarlamas\u0131n\u0131n temel ilkeleri ve y\u00f6nleri katk\u0131 sa\u011flayabilmektedir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada g\u00fcncel pazarlama yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131ndan n\u00f6ropazarlama, viral pazarlama, gerilla pazarlama ve dijital pazarlama stratejilerine yer verilmektedir. Ayr\u0131ca \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada g\u00fcncel pazarlama yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131n\u0131n sa\u011fl\u0131kta uygulanabilirli\u011fi \u00f6rnekler \u00fczerinden tart\u0131\u015f\u0131lmaktad\u0131r. Hastal\u0131klar\u0131n erken te\u015fhisinde ve sa\u011fl\u0131\u011f\u0131n geli\u015ftirilmesi hizmetlerinde bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada bahsedilen g\u00fcncel pazarlama yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131ndan daha fazla yararlan\u0131labilece\u011fi s\u00f6ylenebilir. ; Marketing activities in the health services are different from other service sectors due to the unique characteristics of health services. Health care marketing provides an understanding of how to cope with the challenges of increasing number of health care providers, increasing medical costs and changing medical focus in a competitive way. Although there are criticisms about health care marketing, the basic principles and aspects of service marketing can contribute to creating satisfaction and loyalty in health services as in every kind of service. In this study, neuromarketing, viral marketing, guerilla marketing and digital marketing strategies are included in the current marketing approaches. In addition, the applicability of current marketing approaches in health is discussed through examples. It can be said that the current marketing approaches mentioned in this study can be used more in the early diagnosis of diseases and health promotion services.","published_in":"Volume: 22, Issue: 2 432-443 ; 1302-1265 ; 2149-4894 ; Afyon Kocatepe \u00dcniversitesi Sosyal Bilimler Dergisi","year":"2020-06-29T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"G\u00fcncel pazarlama yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131,sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetleri pazarlamas\u0131,sa\u011fl\u0131k kurumlar\u0131; Current marketing approaches,health care marketing,health care organizations","subject":"G\u00fcncel pazarlama yakla\u015f\u0131mlar\u0131,sa\u011fl\u0131k hizmetleri pazarlamas\u0131,sa\u011fl\u0131k kurumlar\u0131; Current marketing approaches,health care marketing,health care organizations","authors":"\u015eANTA\u015e, G\u00fclcan; \u015eANTA\u015e, Fatih","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/akusosbil\/issue\/54924\/482305","oa_state":"2","url":"5d87706b02464ca890cb9b5efe0eed02135d1d36b0886a15597ba7e8588dce2b","relevance":59},{"id":"ecce02072e6683899c83725a5f4e1f822e6475763e59d28bdce8e5817a533ef8","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528735; (Revista) ISSN 2236-269X","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528735","title":"A bibliographical analysis in the literature of value co-creation in private higher education between the years 2006 to 2016","paper_abstract":"The present research aims to present a bibliographical analysis of scientific publications on the theme \"value co-creation in private higher education\", carried out from 2006 to 2016. Methodologically, this article was carried out through a bibliographical survey, with the objective of selecting the publications made in scientific journals in the pre-stipulated period. Form 54 publications were selected. It was observed that in the year 2016 there were the highest number of publications (10), already years of 2006, 2007 and 2013 were the ones with the lowest number of publications (2). Also, it was identified that the authors that obtained the most prominence in the research were Robert F. Lusch and Stephen L. Vargo, where they obtained (5) publications each. In relation to the most published journals on the subject were Journal of Business Research and Journal of Service Management, with (3) publications each. In this context, it was possible to note that the words that were the most successful in high repetition were: value co-creation, logic dominant of service, value, service. The relevance of this research comes from the moment that value co-creation is seen as an important tool for marketing administration allowing for constant improvements through the exchange of experiences between teachers and students in the classroom environment. Thus, in private higher education, student satisfaction and value creation are the result of individual or joint actions (institution, teacher and student).","published_in":"Independent Journal of Management & Production, ISSN 2236-269X, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 4, 2020, pags. 1323-1341","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Value Co-creation; Private Higher Education; Classroom","subject":"Value Co-creation; Private Higher Education; Classroom","authors":"da Silva, Maicon; Alves da Silva, Luis Carlos; R\u00e9gio Brambilla, Fl\u00e1vio","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528735","oa_state":"2","url":"ecce02072e6683899c83725a5f4e1f822e6475763e59d28bdce8e5817a533ef8","relevance":58},{"id":"d090e70a05994f093ec86ca4c173a44d27422679daf1fb7fea873695dbe06657","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528739; (Revista) ISSN 2236-269X","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528739","title":"Factors determining the marketing strategies of construction firms: construction professionals' perspective","paper_abstract":"Construction firms are not dedicated to the comprehensive adoption of marketing concepts and strategy, and thus do not enjoy the benefits of profit maximization, client satisfaction and loyalty and improved overall organizational performance. The purpose of this paper is, to assess the perception of construction professionals regarding the factors influencing the choice of marketing strategies adopted by their construction firms. A questionnaire survey approach was used in the study. The questionnaires were administered to construction professionals within the study area, Frequency, Percentile, Mean item score and Kruskal-Wallis test were used to analyses the data collected. The study found that employees' competence, technical knowledge of the firm, macroeconomic environment, and innovation are the major factors that influence the choice of marketing strategy. It was concluded that a firm's employee's knowledge and competencies and technological innovation plays a critical role in the adoption of suitable marketing strategies in the construction industry. In addition, there is agreement among construction professionals regarding the factors influencing the choice of marketing strategies adopted by their firms. This study adds to the body of knowledge existing on marketing and marketing strategies in construction organizations in Nigeria.","published_in":"Independent Journal of Management & Production, ISSN 2236-269X, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 3, 2020, pags. 1070-1095","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Construction firms; Construction Industry; Construction professionals; Factors; Marketing strategies; Nigeria","subject":"Construction firms; Construction Industry; Construction professionals; Factors; Marketing strategies; Nigeria","authors":"Awodele, Imoleayo Abraham; Adegboyega, Adesoji Anthony; Sofolahan, Onyinye; Adamu, Abdullahi; Saidu, Kenneth John","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528739","oa_state":"2","url":"d090e70a05994f093ec86ca4c173a44d27422679daf1fb7fea873695dbe06657","relevance":57},{"id":"432d44b68e2bf8ebfdfabdffd3cc1f1391f628165d5cda8c925517142ea2b209","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7533977; (Revista) ISSN 1889-7304","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7533977","title":"Evolving Social Insights from E-Listening to E-Seeing: The L\u2019Or\u00e9al Case","paper_abstract":"Purpose: Show how L\u2019Or\u00e9al Spain evolved from a classic social listening practice, to image driven insights by the usage of AI tools; the first step to correctly understand the vast amount of personal information, interests and desires that millions of consumers share every day in social networks. Design \/ Methodology \/ Approach: Hybrid approach, combining AI to quickly categorize, filter and run a preliminary analysis on images, with a manual coding of specific elements about the beauty industry. This procedure achieved two significant goals: \u2022 First-hand learnings that could be directly used by marketing teams, \u2022 A deep coded beauty image database that could be used to train AI algorithms in the future for a more powerful, automatized tool. Results: There are seven main tribes within the makeup universe in Spain, based on their techniques and products used. Furthermore, its evolution was also traced, and measured within customers, influencers and brands, to detect where a \u2018sweet spot\u2019 was taking place: a rising trend that was growing fast among consumers and influencers, but where brands were not yet present. Limitations \/ Implications: The main limitations of the study are two. On the one hand, the representativeness of Instagram for the Spanish beauty consumer. It was necessary to weight the different segments of the sample to reach the right, balanced conclusions. And on the other, AI algorithms capacity to code and filter images. At a certain stage, it was necessary to introduce human help to validate and perform a deeper coding. Contribution: Setting the first milestone on social image insights for the beauty industry, advancing from a purely text-based insight practice to a much richer information based on the looks that consumers share every day. ; Objetivo: Mostrar la evoluci\u00f3n de L\u2019Or\u00e9al Espa\u00f1a desde un modelo tradicional de escucha social basado en texto, al an\u00e1lisis de im\u00e1genes a trav\u00e9s de herramientas de Inteligencia Artificial (IA); el primer paso para entender la ingente cantidad de informaci\u00f3n personal, intereses y deseos que millones de consumidores comparten cada d\u00eda en redes sociales. Dise\u00f1o\/metodolog\u00eda\/enfoque: Enfoque h\u00edbrido, combinando IA para la r\u00e1pida categorizaci\u00f3n, filtrado y an\u00e1lisis de im\u00e1genes, junto con una categorizaci\u00f3n manual de caracter\u00edsticas espec\u00edficas sobre la belleza. Esta metodolog\u00eda permiti\u00f3 alcanzar dos metas significativas: \u2022 Aprendizajes preliminares para los equipos de marketing, de aplicaci\u00f3n inmediata \u2022 Base de datos espec\u00edfica en belleza con informaci\u00f3n muy detallada, para \u00abentrenar\u00bb futuros algoritmos de IA y crear herramientas m\u00e1s potentes y automatizadas. Resultados: Existen siete principales tribus en el universo del maquillaje en Espa\u00f1a, bas\u00e1ndonos en las t\u00e9cnicas y productos que utilizar. Tambi\u00e9n se midi\u00f3 su evoluci\u00f3n en grupos independientes de consumidores, influencers y marcas, para detectar las mejores oportunidades de inversi\u00f3n y tendencias en auge. Implicaciones\/limitaciones: Las principales limitaciones del estudio son dos. Por un lado, la representatividad de Instagram sobre la consumidora de belleza en Espa\u00f1a. Es necesario ponderar las diferentes celdas de la muestra para alcanzar las conclusiones correctas y balanceadas. Y por otro lado, la capacidad de los algoritmos de IA para codificar y filtrar im\u00e1genes. En un determinado punto, es necesaria la interacci\u00f3n humana para validar y codificar en mayor profundidad los resultados preliminares. Originalidad\/contribuci\u00f3n: Interpretaci\u00f3n de im\u00e1genes en redes sociales para la industria de la belleza, avanzando desde el an\u00e1lisis de textos a una informaci\u00f3n mucho m\u00e1s rica y basada en im\u00e1genes que las consumidoras comparten en redes sociales.","published_in":"aDResearch: Revista Internacional de Investigaci\u00f3n en Comunicaci\u00f3n, ISSN 1889-7304, N\u00ba. 23 (julio-diciembre), 2020, pags. 8-29","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Social listening; e-seeing; artificial intelligence; machine learning; facial recognition; Escucha social; lectura por imagen; inteligencia artificial; aprendizaje autom\u00e1tico; reconocimiento facial","subject":"Social listening; e-seeing; artificial intelligence; machine learning; facial recognition; Escucha social; lectura por imagen; inteligencia artificial; aprendizaje autom\u00e1tico; reconocimiento facial","authors":"Yag\u00fcez, Estefan\u00eda; Rodr\u00edguez, Alberto","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7533977","oa_state":"2","url":"432d44b68e2bf8ebfdfabdffd3cc1f1391f628165d5cda8c925517142ea2b209","relevance":56},{"id":"896a8dcf68f459e1516228df94475840d9b610e8bee81bf1552571a283d7d1dc","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1049956; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jyasar\/issue\/53734\/630537","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jyasar\/issue\/53734\/630537","title":"An Investigation of Post-Purchase Cognitive Dissonance and Its Determinants in Online Shopping ; \u00c7evrimi\u00e7i Al\u0131\u015fveri\u015fte Sat\u0131n Alma Sonras\u0131 Bili\u015fsel Uyumsuzluk ve Buna Etki Eden Fakt\u00f6rlerin \u0130ncelenmesi","paper_abstract":"In our globalized world, it can be observed that consumers often do their online shopping due to reference group effects and\/or their hedonic consumption tendencies. Cognitive dissonance experienced occasionally right after an online shopping experience and the factors leading to cognitive dissonance have been investigated in this study by means of a face to face survey applied to 358 online shopper participants in the city of \u0130stanbul between 5-28 June 2019. Frequency, factor, reliability and correlation analyses have been carried out on SPSS program. LISREL structural equation modelling has been utilized in order to test the significance and reliability of the model. Goodness of Fit index, t-values and standardized solution values have been analysed and it has been revealed that the reference group effect and hedonic consumption tendencies variables actually have a significant effect upon the variables Impulse Buying and Cognitive Dissonance. The fact that the research participants consist only of \u0130stanbul residents is a basic limitation of the research. It is assumed that this research will contribute to the e-commerce companies and their customers. ; K\u00fcreselle\u015fen d\u00fcnyam\u0131zda t\u00fcketicilerin \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i al\u0131\u015fveri\u015flerinis\u0131kl\u0131kla Referans Gruplar\u0131 ve Hedonik T\u00fcketim E\u011filimlerinin etkisiyle yapmaktaolduklar\u0131 g\u00f6r\u00fclmektedir. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f yapan t\u00fcketicilerinyapt\u0131klar\u0131 al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f sonras\u0131nda zaman zaman ya\u015fad\u0131klar\u0131 bili\u015fsel uyumsuzluk vebuna etki eden fakt\u00f6rlerin incelenmesi amac\u0131yla 5-28 Haziran 2019 tarihleriaras\u0131nda, \u0130stanbul ilinde ya\u015fayan ve \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f yapan 358 kat\u0131l\u0131mc\u0131yay\u00f6nelik y\u00fcz y\u00fcze anket uygulanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. SPSS program\u0131 ile Frekans Analizi, Fakt\u00f6rAnalizi, G\u00fcvenilirlik Analizi ve Korelasyon Analizi yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Modelinanlaml\u0131l\u0131k ve g\u00fcvenilirli\u011fini test etmek i\u00e7in ise LISREL yap\u0131sal e\u015fitlik modelikullan\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, analiz sonucunda uyum iyili\u011fi indeksleri, t de\u011ferleri vestandardize edilmi\u015f \u00e7\u00f6z\u00fcm de\u011ferleri incelenmi\u015f ve Referans Grup Etkisi veHedonik T\u00fcketim E\u011filimi ba\u011f\u0131ms\u0131z de\u011fi\u015fkenlerinin D\u00fcrt\u00fcsel Sat\u0131n Alma veBili\u015fsel Uyumsuzluk ba\u011f\u0131ml\u0131 de\u011fi\u015fkenleri \u00fczerinde anlaml\u0131 etkisi oldu\u011fu tespitedilmi\u015ftir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rman\u0131n yaln\u0131zca \u0130stanbul ilinde ya\u015fayan ki\u015filer ileger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015f olmas\u0131 k\u0131s\u0131t\u0131n\u0131 olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n e-ticaretsitelerinden hizmet sunan i\u015fletmelere ve al\u0131\u015fveri\u015f yapan t\u00fcketicilere katk\u0131sa\u011flayaca\u011f\u0131 de\u011ferlendirilmektedir.","published_in":"Volume: 15, Issue: 307-315 ; 1305-970X ; Journal of Ya\u015far University","year":"2020-03-31T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Marketing Communications,Consumer Behaviour,Digital Marketing; Pazarlama \u0130leti\u015fimi,T\u00fcketici Davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131,Dijital Pazarlama","subject":"Marketing Communications,Consumer Behaviour,Digital Marketing; Pazarlama \u0130leti\u015fimi,T\u00fcketici Davran\u0131\u015flar\u0131,Dijital Pazarlama","authors":"KOCAMAZ, \u0130lke; KARADEN\u0130Z, Mustafa","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jyasar\/issue\/53734\/630537","oa_state":"2","url":"896a8dcf68f459e1516228df94475840d9b610e8bee81bf1552571a283d7d1dc","relevance":55},{"id":"3bd5da16f30785cd0e4d7e221ae9f697a45a371195681aa3cf771523a546b20a","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1173861; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/kayusosder\/issue\/55597\/738163","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/kayusosder\/issue\/55597\/738163","title":"THE EFFECT OF BRAND EQUITY IN DIGITAL MARKETING ON INTERMEDIARY SATISFACTION IN THE INSURANCE INDUSTRY ; D\u0130J\u0130TAL PAZARLAMADA MARKA DENKL\u0130\u011e\u0130N\u0130N S\u0130GORTA SEKT\u00d6R\u00dcNDE ARACI MEMNUN\u0130YET\u0130 \u00dcZER\u0130NE ETK\u0130S\u0130","paper_abstract":"Although financial institutions are in a leading position in digital transformation, especially thanks to banks, it is observed that the same situation does not apply to insurance companies. The insurance industry still relies heavily on intermediaries and their effectiveness. Therefore, there are different concerns about how digital marketing applications implemented in the industry will have an impact on the satisfaction of intermediaries. Considering the customer portfolios that the intermediaries have strong relationships with, intermediary satisfaction becomes one of the basic criteria for success in the sector. On the other hand, digital marketing practices in the sector are mostly related to personal accident, vehicle, health, life, etc. for individual customers. It is observed that the same trend has not yet matured in the products for corporate customers. Hence, it is a matter of curiosity how digital marketing will contribute to the brand equity of the companies, especially how it will affect the relations with intermediaries. From this point of view, the subject of this study is to determine the effect of brand equity -formed by the contribution of digital marketing applications- on intermediary satisfaction in the transportation insurance industry. Within the scope of the research, the data obtained from 243 insurance intermediaries were analyzed, and the relationships between the insurance companies\u2019 brand equity, commission rates offered to intermediaries and intermediary satisfaction variables were examined. As a result of the research, it has been revealed that brand equity in digital marketing has a positive effect on intermediary satisfaction in the transportation insurance industry. Another important result is that this determined effect of brand equity does not differ according to the intermediary commission rates applied by insurance companies. ; Finans kurumlar\u0131 \u00f6zellikle bankalar sayesinde dijital d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcmde \u00f6nc\u00fc bir konumda olsalar da ayn\u0131 durumun sigorta \u015firketleri i\u00e7in ge\u00e7erli olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6zlenmektedir. Sigorta sekt\u00f6r\u00fc halen a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 olarak arac\u0131lar ve onlar\u0131n etkinli\u011fine dayanmaktad\u0131r. Bu nedenle, sekt\u00f6rde hayata ge\u00e7irilen dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n arac\u0131lar\u0131n memnuniyeti \u00fczerinde nas\u0131l etkiler olu\u015fturaca\u011f\u0131na dair farkl\u0131 \u00e7ekinceler bulunmaktad\u0131r. Arac\u0131lar\u0131n g\u00fc\u00e7l\u00fc ili\u015fkilere sahip olduklar\u0131 m\u00fc\u015fteri portf\u00f6yleri d\u00fc\u015f\u00fcn\u00fcld\u00fc\u011f\u00fcnde, arac\u0131 memnuniyeti sekt\u00f6rde ba\u015far\u0131 i\u00e7in en temel kriterlerden biri halini almaktad\u0131r. \u00d6te yandan, sekt\u00f6rde dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n daha ziyade bireysel m\u00fc\u015fterilere y\u00f6nelik ferdi kaza, ta\u015f\u0131t, sa\u011fl\u0131k, ya\u015fam vb. \u00fcr\u00fcn gam\u0131nda yo\u011funla\u015ft\u0131\u011f\u0131, kurumsal m\u00fc\u015fterilere y\u00f6nelik \u00fcr\u00fcnlerde ayn\u0131 e\u011filimin hen\u00fcz olgunla\u015fmad\u0131\u011f\u0131 g\u00f6zlenmektedir. Dolay\u0131s\u0131yla, dijital pazarlaman\u0131n i\u015fletmelerin marka denkli\u011fine ne gibi katk\u0131lar yapaca\u011f\u0131, \u00f6zellikle arac\u0131lar ile ili\u015fkileri nas\u0131l etkileyece\u011fi merak konusudur. Buradan hareketle, bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n konusu nakliyat sigortalar\u0131 alan\u0131nda dijital pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131n\u0131n katk\u0131s\u0131yla olu\u015fan marka denkli\u011finin arac\u0131 memnuniyeti \u00fczerindeki etkisini belirlemektir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma kapsam\u0131nda 243 sigorta arac\u0131s\u0131ndan elde edilen veri analiz edilerek sigorta i\u015fletmelerinin marka denkli\u011fi, arac\u0131lara sunulan komisyon oranlar\u0131 ve arac\u0131 memnuniyeti de\u011fi\u015fkenleri aras\u0131ndaki ili\u015fkiler incelenmi\u015ftir. Ara\u015ft\u0131rma sonucunda, dijital pazarlamada marka denkli\u011finin nakliyat sigortalar\u0131 sekt\u00f6r\u00fcnde arac\u0131 memnuniyeti \u00fczerinde olumlu etkiye sahip oldu\u011fu tespit edilmi\u015ftir. \u00d6nemli bir di\u011fer sonu\u00e7 ise marka denkli\u011finin tespit edilen bu etkisinin sigorta i\u015fletmelerinin uygulad\u0131klar\u0131 arac\u0131 komisyon oranlar\u0131na g\u00f6re farkl\u0131l\u0131k g\u00f6stermedi\u011fidir.","published_in":"Volume: 2, Issue: 1 29-47 ; 2687-5772 ; Kayseri \u00dcniversitesi Sosyal Bilimler Dergisi","year":"2020-06-30T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Brand Equity,Digital Marketing,Intermediary Satisfaction,Transportation Insurance Industry; dijital pazarlama,marka denkli\u011fi,arac\u0131 memnuniyeti,nakliyat sigortalar\u0131 sekt\u00f6r\u00fc","subject":"Brand Equity,Digital Marketing,Intermediary Satisfaction,Transportation Insurance Industry; dijital pazarlama,marka denkli\u011fi,arac\u0131 memnuniyeti,nakliyat sigortalar\u0131 sekt\u00f6r\u00fc","authors":"AYDIN, Samet; K\u0130RAZLI, Tahir","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/kayusosder\/issue\/55597\/738163","oa_state":"2","url":"3bd5da16f30785cd0e4d7e221ae9f697a45a371195681aa3cf771523a546b20a","relevance":54},{"id":"85c1cc263fc7bcd62a9de14db6e23ee667ec265ebbcc8155f32682af8fd72076","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1097171; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ajit-e\/issue\/54250\/735304","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ajit-e\/issue\/54250\/735304","title":"Art\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Ger\u00e7eklik Teknolojisinin Pazarlamadaki Yeri ; Augmented Reality Technology in Marketing","paper_abstract":"Teknolojinin geli\u015fimi di\u011fer bir\u00e7ok alanda oldu\u011fu gibi pazarlama faaliyetlerinin de geli\u015fimine \u00f6nemli katk\u0131larda bulunmaktad\u0131r. Pazarlama alan\u0131nda yak\u0131n zamana kadar a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 olarak kullan\u0131lan geleneksel ileti\u015fim ara\u00e7lar\u0131, internet kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcm d\u00fcnyada yayg\u0131nla\u015fmas\u0131yla, yerlerini giderek dijital mecralara b\u0131rakmaktad\u0131r. Artt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ger\u00e7eklik a\u011f\u0131rl\u0131kl\u0131 olarak dijital ortamlarda m\u00fc\u015fteri deneyiminin yetersizli\u011fine \u00e7are olabilecek nitelikte yeni bir teknoloji olarak kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fman\u0131n amac\u0131, Artt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ger\u00e7eklik teknolojisinin pazarlamadaki yeri ve \u00f6nemi hakk\u0131nda bilgi vermektir. Bu do\u011frultuda, kapsaml\u0131 bir literat\u00fcr taramas\u0131 yap\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ve bu teknolojinin \u00e7e\u015fitli sekt\u00f6rlerdeki yenilik\u00e7i pazarlama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131na sa\u011flad\u0131\u011f\u0131 katk\u0131lardan, kullan\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 baz\u0131 pazarlama uygulamalar\u0131ndan ve bu teknolojiyle ilgili kar\u015f\u0131la\u015f\u0131labilecek olumsuzluklardan bahsedilmi\u015ftir. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmada ayr\u0131ca, pazarlamada art\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f ger\u00e7eklik konusunun ele al\u0131nd\u0131\u011f\u0131 literat\u00fcrdeki \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar \u00f6zet bir tablo halinde sunulmu\u015ftur. ; As in many other fields, the development of technology makes significant contributions to the development of marketing activities. Traditional communication tools, which have been used predominantly in the field of marketing until recently, are increasingly being replaced by digital media with the widespread use of internet throughout the world. Augmented reality is a new technology that can remedy the inadequacy of customer experience in digital environments. The aim of this study is to give information about the place and importance of augmented reality technology in marketing. In this respect, a comprehensive literature review has been conducted and the contributions of this technology to innovative marketing activities in various sectors, some marketing applications it has been used and the adversities related to this technology have been mentioned. In addition, the studies in the literature, which focus on augmented reality in marketing, are presented in a summary table.","published_in":"Volume: 10, Issue: 39 87-117 ; 1309-1581 ; AJIT-e: Bili\u015fim Teknolojileri Online Dergisi","year":"2020-01-02T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Artt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Ger\u00e7eklik,Pazarlama,Deneyimsel Pazarlama; Augmented Reality,Marketing,Experiential Marketing","subject":"Artt\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f Ger\u00e7eklik,Pazarlama,Deneyimsel Pazarlama; Augmented Reality,Marketing,Experiential Marketing","authors":"AYTEK\u0130N, P\u0131nar; YAKIN, Volkan; \u00c7EL\u0130K, Berke Han","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/ajit-e\/issue\/54250\/735304","oa_state":"2","url":"85c1cc263fc7bcd62a9de14db6e23ee667ec265ebbcc8155f32682af8fd72076","relevance":53},{"id":"0325a548765bb4653a991b778599bc7de87b7eae339bb8493a605443b0fc9d2e","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1212591; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jss\/issue\/55008\/731673; doi:10.21547\/jss.731673","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jss\/issue\/55008\/731673; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.21547\/jss.731673","title":"The New Trend of the Digital Age Social Media Impressors: The Effect of Vloggers on University Students' Purchasing Behavior ; Dijital \u00c7a\u011f\u0131n Yeni Trendi Sosyal Medya Etkileyicileri: Vloggerlar\u0131n \u00dcniversite \u00d6\u011frencilerinin Sat\u0131n Alma Davran\u0131\u015f\u0131 \u00dczerindeki Etkisi","paper_abstract":"Today, social network influencers play an important role in marketing by introducing products to their masses. Thanks to the wide marketing opportunities of social networks, especially young media consumers are increasingly using the content of online influencers. This research, which examines whether Vlogger's recommendations affect the purchasing intentions of young adults and aims to reveal the effect of vloggers' homophily attitude, social and physical attractiveness, reliability, expertise roles and money social relations on purchasing, was conducted by using data collection tool with 525 university students studying at G\u00fcm\u00fc\u015fhane University. Thirteen research questions were created in the study, and the answers given to the questionnaire were tested using the T test and Anova analysis. The results showed that most of the university youth in the sample follow the vlogger via Snapchat and take into account physical attraction, homophily attitude and money-social relations in their purchasing decisions. ; G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde sosyal a\u011f etkileyicileri, kitlelerine \u00fcr\u00fcn tan\u0131tarak pazarlamada \u00f6nemli bir rol oynamaktad\u0131r. Sosyal a\u011flar\u0131n geni\u015f pazarlama imkanlar\u0131 sayesinde, \u00f6zellikle gen\u00e7 medya t\u00fcketicileri giderek daha fazla \u00e7evrimi\u00e7i etkileyicilerin i\u00e7eriklerini kullan\u0131yor. Vlogger tavsiyelerinin gen\u00e7lerin sat\u0131n alma niyetleri \u00fczerinde etkili olup olmad\u0131\u011f\u0131n\u0131 inceleyen ve vloggerlar\u0131n homofil tutum, sosyal ve fiziksel \u00e7ekicilik, g\u00fcvenirlilik, uzmanl\u0131k rollerinin ve para sosyal ili\u015fkilerinin sat\u0131n alma \u00fczerindeki etkisini ortaya \u00e7\u0131karmay\u0131 ama\u00e7layan bu ara\u015ft\u0131rma, G\u00fcm\u00fc\u015fhane \u00dcniversitesi\u2019nde \u00f6\u011frenim g\u00f6ren 525 \u00fcniversite \u00f6\u011frencisiyle veri toplama arac\u0131 kullan\u0131larak ger\u00e7ekle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. \u00c7al\u0131\u015fmada on \u00fc\u00e7 tane ara\u015ft\u0131rma sorusu olu\u015fturulmu\u015f, bu ara\u015ft\u0131rma sorular\u0131ndan hareketle ankete verilen yan\u0131tlar T testi ve Anova analizleri ile test edilmi\u015ftir. Ula\u015f\u0131lan sonu\u00e7lar, \u00f6rneklem dahilindeki \u00fcniversiteli gen\u00e7lerin \u00e7o\u011funun Snapchat \u00fczerinden vlogger takip etti\u011fini ve sat\u0131n alma kararlar\u0131nda fiziksel \u00e7ekicilik, homofil tutum ve para-sosyal ili\u015fkileri dikkate ald\u0131klar\u0131n\u0131 g\u00f6stermi\u015ftir.","published_in":"Volume: 19, Issue: 3 1071-1098 ; 1303-0094 ; 2149-5459 ; Gaziantep University Journal of Social Sciences","year":"2020-07-01T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"Social Media,Vlogger,Snapchat,Digital Marketing,University Youth; Sosyal Medya,Vlogger,Snapchat,Dijital Pazarlama,\u00dcniversite Gen\u00e7leri","subject":"Social Media,Vlogger,Snapchat,Digital Marketing,University Youth; Sosyal Medya,Vlogger,Snapchat,Dijital Pazarlama,\u00dcniversite Gen\u00e7leri","authors":"TA\u015eDELEN, Birg\u00fcl","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/jss\/issue\/55008\/731673","oa_state":"2","url":"0325a548765bb4653a991b778599bc7de87b7eae339bb8493a605443b0fc9d2e","relevance":52},{"id":"9e17c0ac237ee3c09488b6d04e68f7dc320d82cf994109f779ec0652fefa060f","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/1175482; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/gbesbd\/issue\/55461\/673769","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/gbesbd\/issue\/55461\/673769","title":"Futbol ve League of Legends Ekonomilerinin Kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lmas\u0131 ; The Comparison of Football and League of Legends Economics","paper_abstract":"Futbol, kitle ileti\u015fim ara\u00e7lar\u0131n\u0131n da deste\u011fi ile ekonomik a\u00e7\u0131dan olduk\u00e7a kazan\u00e7l\u0131 bir pazarlama arac\u0131 haline getirilerek end\u00fcstriyelle\u015ftirilmi\u015ftir. Ayn\u0131 zamanda, geni\u015f kitlelerin yo\u011fun ilgisini \u00e7eken bir g\u00f6steri ve e\u011flence etkinli\u011fi olarak t\u00fcketim sekt\u00f6r\u00fcne d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcrken, di\u011fer yandan giri\u015fimciler i\u00e7in \u00f6nemli miktarlarda finans hareketlerinin ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 k\u00e2rl\u0131 bir ekonomik etkinlik alan\u0131 haline gelmi\u015ftir. Futbol, b\u00fcy\u00fck t\u00fcketici gruplar\u0131n\u0131n olu\u015fmas\u0131n\u0131 ve bu gruplar\u0131n bir araya gelmesini sa\u011flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, bir pazarlama arac\u0131 olarak kullan\u0131lmaya ba\u015flayarak, h\u0131zla b\u00fcy\u00fcyen t\u00fcketim toplumunun etkisi ile ticari bir boyut kazanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. D\u00f6n\u00fc\u015fen ve yeniden yap\u0131lanan futbolun k\u00fcreselle\u015fmesi-end\u00fcstriyelle\u015fmesi ve gelirlerin artmas\u0131 birbirine paralellik g\u00f6stermektedir. Yan\u0131 s\u0131ra, dijital teknolojilerde ya\u015fanan ola\u011fan\u00fcst\u00fc geli\u015fmeler her alan\u0131 oldu\u011fu gibi spor alan\u0131n\u0131 da etkileyerek birtak\u0131m yeni geli\u015fmelerin ortaya \u00e7\u0131kmas\u0131na neden olmu\u015ftur. Spor alan\u0131na ili\u015fkin ortaya \u00e7\u0131kan bu geli\u015fmelerden biri de g\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fcz\u00fcn en \u00f6nemli ger\u00e7ekliklerinden biri halini alan \u201celektronik spor\u201d olarak kar\u015f\u0131m\u0131za \u00e7\u0131kmaktad\u0131r. Sporun ve Esporun k\u00fcreselle\u015fmesi-end\u00fcstriyelle\u015fmesi ve dijitalle\u015fmesi ile birlikte t\u00fcm gelir ve gider kalemleri h\u0131zla artmaktad\u0131r. Bu ba\u011flamda, bu kuramsal \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada futbol ve League of Legends ekonomileri k\u0131sa, orta ve uzun vadeli olmak \u00fczere kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131larak incelenmeye \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Bu amac\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131lamak \u00fczere betimsel tarama y\u00f6ntemine ba\u015fvurulmu\u015ftur. Bu \u00e7er\u00e7evede, futbol ve League of Legends ekonomilerinin son d\u00f6rt y\u0131l\u0131 incelemeye al\u0131nm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. ; With the support of mass media, football has been industrialized by making it a highly profitable marketing instrument. At the same time, it has entered the consumption sector as an entertainment event that attracts the attention of a wide audience, on the other hand, it has become a profitable area with a significant amount of financial activity for entrepreneurs. Football has led to the formation of large groups of consumers and brought these groups together. Besides, being used as a marketing instrument, it has gained a commercial dimension with the impact of a rapidly growing consumer society. The globalization-industrialization of transformed and restructured football, and the increase of revenues show parallelism to each other. In addition, the extraordinary developments in digital technologies have affected the field of sports as well as every other field and caused some new developments to emerge. One of these developments in the field of sports is \u201celectronic sports\u201d which has become one of the most important realities of our time. With the globalization-industrialization and digitalization of sports and eSports, all income and expenditure items are increasing rapidly. In this context, in this theoretical study, the economies of football and League of Legends are tried to be analyzed by comparing them as short, medium and long term. In order to meet this aim, descriptive screening method was used. La investigaci\u00f3n es de tipo documental y de campo, los m\u00e9todos deductivo e inductivo para la recolecci\u00f3n de la informaci\u00f3n mediante entrevistas, encuestas digitales aplicadas en la validaci\u00f3n de marca y propuestas gr\u00e1ficas que responden a la carencia del posicionamiento de la Asociaci\u00f3n ASOALIENU en el mercado, como objeto de estudio la PEA de la ciudad de Riobamba con una muestra de 381 personas. Digital channels such as the website and social networks are the efficient means to position the brand with respect to the target audience, in order to inform, build loyalty and position the association through strategic planning. For the design the Bruce Archer methodology was applied with a structured, synthetic and functional result. \u0441\u0442\u0432\u043e\u0440\u0435\u043d\u043d\u044f \u0431\u0440\u0435\u043d\u0434\u0443. ; Realization of economic shocks and geopolitical risks changed the strategy of development of domestic banks, actualizing the task of developing new products aimed at ensuring the profitability and sustainability of the banking business. Digitalization of Ukraine's economy poses new challenges for banks to develop and promote new Internet services and digital marketing communications. Purpose. The main purpose of the study is to deepen the theoretical and methodological foundations and to monitor the risks of project financing in the current conditions of development of the national economy. Results. The article focuses on identifying problems in the use of marketing tools for banking innovations in the digitalization of Ukraine's economy. It is considered scientific views on the definition of \u201cdigital marketing\u201d. The systematization of scientific views on the definition of \u201cdigital marketing\u201d gave the author the opportunity to determine that he solves the following tasks: maintaining the brand image; support for bringing a new brand or product to market; raising awareness; sales promotion. The article analyzes the dynamics of digital advertising in Ukraine to deepen the understanding of the extent to which banks are ready to improve the marketing policy of banking communications. An analysis of the costs of marketing and advertising of leading banks in Internet banking has shown that their increase has allowed banks to get a positive return on assets. It is proved that the decision to improve the website of banks, first, should be based on a study of traffic, which testifies to its popularity among consumers of banking products. For modern banks, a promising area of activity for financial institutions is Internet banking and mobile banking in a smartphone. Conclusions. The author proposes to form the concept of marketing banking communications based on creating a brand to support the identity and image of banks. The brand is an integral part of the product. With the growth of dialogic business communications, a new, financial approach to the brand is formed. In determining the parameters of business processes, it is increasingly beginning to be seen as a specific corporate asset that requires design, development, and investment. 1; The journal of media innovations; 6; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5617\/jomi.7833; https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10660; URN:NBN:fi-fe202003128105","identifier":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10660","title":"Micromobilization through live streaming : the Elin Ersson case","paper_abstract":"Live streaming is a media innovation that enables individuals to communicate with thousands of social media users instantly. This article explores how live streaming is used to support micromobilization in the context of social activism. It focuses on the case of live streaming from an airplane by the Swedish activist Elin Ersson. This live stream aimed to prevent the deportation of an Afghani asylum-seeker from Sweden. A qualitative content analysis of both the live streamed video and the viewers\u2019 responses is undertaken. Two typologies for Social Behavior in live streamed micromobilization are developed, namely Digital Support Behavior (DSB) and Digital Rejection Behavior (DRB). Analyzing the content of the live stream and the viewers responses according to these typologies reveals that live streaming can support individualized micromobilization. ; fi=vertaisarvioitu|en=peerReviewed|","published_in":"","year":"2020-03-06","subject_orig":"live streaming; micromobilization; digital support behavior (DSB); digital rejection behavior (DRB); social network sites (SNS); Facebook; social media; opinions; media; attitudes; effects (results); interaction; communication; social support; Internet; influencing; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","subject":"live streaming; micromobilization; digital support behavior (DSB); digital rejection behavior (DRB); social network sites (SNS); Facebook; social media; opinions; media; attitudes; effects (results); interaction; communication; social support; Internet; influencing; fi=Viestint\u00e4tieteet|en=Communication Studies|","authors":"Khattab, Mona","link":"https:\/\/osuva.uwasa.fi\/handle\/10024\/10660","oa_state":"1","url":"dbc03ac72cc39c0d64c391e6f7c9cfa2f94adec30818396f8f96b4774ed48a79","relevance":48},{"id":"326d7ba8df12dd79ec1412f55cb0f6b07695bb0a09747209d5a22a3a4de9be0f","relation":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/download\/article-file\/942190; https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/50924\/624938; doi:10.26466\/opus.624938","identifier":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/50924\/624938; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.26466\/opus.624938","title":"Farkli Disiplinlerde End\u00fcstri 4.0 ; Industry 4.0 In Different Disciplines","paper_abstract":"Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada dijital d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm olarak adland\u0131r\u0131lan End\u00fcstri 4.0 kavram\u0131n\u0131nfarkl\u0131 disiplinlerdeki etkisi ve farkl\u0131 disiplinlerle olan ili\u015fkisi altm\u0131\u015fayak\u0131n yabanc\u0131 makale derlenerek a\u00e7\u0131klanmaya \u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Yeni \u00fcretimparadigmas\u0131 olan bu kavram ba\u015fta sadece \u00fcretim i\u015fletmeleri ve \u00fcretim y\u00f6ntemleriile ilgili olarak g\u00f6r\u00fcnse de sonralar\u0131 g\u00fcndelik hayat\u0131n b\u00fct\u00fcn a\u015famalar\u0131n\u0131kapsam\u0131\u015f ve ya\u015fam\u0131n ayr\u0131lmaz bir par\u00e7as\u0131 haline gelmeye ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Hukuk,\u00e7evre, sa\u011fl\u0131k, in\u015faat, e\u011fitim, muhasebe, reklam, e-ticaret, pazarlama,oyun-e\u011flence, internet, perakende ve hatta \u00fclke politikalar\u0131nda bile kendineyer bulan End\u00fcstri 4.0 kavram\u0131, bu alanlarda b\u00fcy\u00fck de\u011fi\u015fimler yaratm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r.Derleme yoluyla haz\u0131rlanan bu makalede, insan kaynaklar\u0131, pazarlama,finans\/yat\u0131r\u0131m, yal\u0131n \u00fcretim, i\u015fletme y\u00f6netimi ile gelecek stratejileria\u00e7\u0131s\u0131ndan ele al\u0131nan yeni dijital d\u00f6n\u00fc\u015f\u00fcm, yaratt\u0131\u011f\u0131 etkileri ve s\u00f6z\u00fc edilenalanlarla olan ili\u015fkisi yabanc\u0131 literat\u00fcr incelenerek ortaya konulmaya\u00e7al\u0131\u015f\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u0130leride yap\u0131lacak \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalarda bu makalede ele al\u0131nmayan e\u011fitim,hukuk, perakende ve \u00e7evre gibi alanlarda End\u00fcstri 4.0\u2019\u0131n etkileri ve ili\u015fkisiirdelenebilir. Kavramsal \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar ileride yap\u0131lacak uygulamal\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalarazemin haz\u0131rlamakta ve uygulamal\u0131 \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n temelini olu\u015fturmaktad\u0131r. ; In this study, it is aimed to explain the effect and its relationship ofIndustry 4.0 concept called digital transformation in different disciplines bycompiling nearly sixty foreign articles. Although this concept, which is thenew production paradigm, appears only in relation to production enterprises andproduction methods, it has been later covered all stages of daily life andbecame an integral part of life. Industry 4.0, which has a place in law,environment, health, construction, education, accounting, advertising,e-commerce, marketing, game-entertainment, internet, retail and even countrypolicies, has created great changes in these areas. In this article which isprepared in an eclectic way by examining international literature, the newdigital transformation, its effects and its relationship with the mentionedfields are discussed such as human resources, marketing, finance\/investment,lean production, business management and future strategies. In future studies,the effects and the relationship of Industry 4.0 in areas such as education,law, retail and environment which are not discussed in this article can beexamined. Conceptual studies provide the basis for future applied studies andform the basis of applied studies.","published_in":"Volume: 15, Issue: 21 756-789 ; 2528-9527 ; 2528-9535 ; OPUS Uluslararas\u0131 Toplum Ara\u015ft\u0131rmalar\u0131 Dergisi","year":"2020-01-31T00:00:00Z","subject_orig":"End\u00fcstri 4.0,\u0130nsan Kaynaklar\u0131,Pazarlama,Yal\u0131n \u00dcretim,Ar-ge,Finans ve yat\u0131r\u0131m; Industry 4.0,Human resources,Marketing,Lean manufacturing,R & D,Finance and investment","subject":"; 0,\u0130nsan Kaynaklar\u0131,Pazarlama,Yal\u0131n \u00dcretim,Ar-ge,Finans ve yat\u0131r\u0131m; ; 0,Human resources,Marketing,Lean manufacturing,R & D,Finance and investment","authors":"YILDIRIM, Y\u0131ld\u0131r\u0131m","link":"https:\/\/dergipark.org.tr\/tr\/pub\/opus\/issue\/50924\/624938","oa_state":"2","url":"326d7ba8df12dd79ec1412f55cb0f6b07695bb0a09747209d5a22a3a4de9be0f","relevance":47},{"id":"63b87017c9b159796397b9871c4de34c4c4e6de8aad6e2d620a829e021b56edf","relation":"http:\/\/www.revistas.udesc.br\/index.php\/modapalavra\/article\/view\/18135\/11540; http:\/\/www.revistas.udesc.br\/index.php\/modapalavra\/article\/view\/18135; doi:10.5965\/1982615x13292020203","identifier":"http:\/\/www.revistas.udesc.br\/index.php\/modapalavra\/article\/view\/18135; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.5965\/1982615x13292020203","title":"Luxury and technology: a phenomenological analysis of the Louis Vuitton designer handbags Canvas of the Future","paper_abstract":"To broaden their cultural influence, gain new consumers or retain current loyalty (target), luxury brand managers also diversify products and marketing strategies. An example of this is the launch of the Canvas of the Future bag, a Louis Vuitton brand product that boasts digital technology capabilities, integrating the idea of technological innovation with luxury brand and product concepts. Thus, we sought to describe and interpret the perception of Fashion experts about the product, conducting a descriptive-qualitative research, whose epistemological basis is Phenomenology. In summary, four research steps were considered and developed to: 1) explore; 2) collect; 3) relate information, and 4) raise propositions. Among the results of the study, we highlight considerations such as: pioneering, innovative, surreal and futuristic regarding the product, confirming the contemporary hybridism between the tradition of fashion and technological innovation, highlighting the revision and repositioning of the brand and the product of lux.","published_in":"ModaPalavra e-peri\u00f3dico; v. 13, n. 29 (2020): Moda, Design e Sentido; 203-228 ; 1982-615X ; 10.5965\/1982615x13292020","year":"2020-06-29","subject_orig":"luxury product.
