Fashion phenomenology","subject":"; ; Fashion phenomenology","authors":"Koerich, Guilherme Henrique; Trevisol, Nicole Pasini; de Souza, Richard Perassi Luiz","link":"http:\/\/www.revistas.udesc.br\/index.php\/modapalavra\/article\/view\/18135","oa_state":"1","url":"63b87017c9b159796397b9871c4de34c4c4e6de8aad6e2d620a829e021b56edf","relevance":46},{"id":"aeca7cffb6bd6788d216d07827a3b4d7c1261eb4af6034a61245751029f8b450","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504746; (Revista) ISSN 0186-1042","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504746","title":"Calidad de servicio y valor percibido como antecedentes de la satisfacci\u00f3n de los clientes de las empresas de telecomunicaciones en Colombia","paper_abstract":"Despite the different criticisms received by the Zeithaml, Parasuraman and Berry model, the SERVQUAL is valid and has shown that the service quality is a satisfaction\u2019s customer precedent. To the Colombia\u2019s telecommunications sector, where are few companies with a high imitation offers, to understand if their customers are satisfied, their service perceptions and the value their clients perceive, has become competitive factors. The present study proposes a model that explains how expectations (EXP), service quality (QS), and perceived value (VP) affect the satisfaction (SAT) construct of Colombia\u2019s fixed telecommunications companies. Empirical data was obtained from 324 users in the country\u2019s main cities by virtual questionnaire. The 5 suggested hypotheses were tested using structural equation models by PLS-SEM. The findings show the relevance of SERVQUAL to explain the service quality construct and its relationship with the satisfaction. Given the limited research on these constructs in this sector, this research is a contribution to the literature. ; A pesar de las diferentes cr\u00edticas que ha recibido el modelo SERVQUAL propuesto por Zeithaml, Parasuraman y Berry, este a\u00fan sigue vigente y ha permitido mostrar que la calidad de servicio es antecedente de la satisfacci\u00f3n de los clientes. Para el sector de las telecomunicaciones en Colombia, donde las empresas son pocas, pero con una alta imitaci\u00f3n de ofertas, el entender si sus clientes est\u00e1n satisfechos, c\u00f3mo perciben los servicios y qu\u00e9 valoran m\u00e1s de ellos, se ha vuelto en factores de competitividad. Es as\u00ed como el presente estudio, propone un modelo que explica c\u00f3mo influyen las expectativas (EXP), la calidad de servicio (QS), y el valor percibido (VP) en la satisfacci\u00f3n (SAT) de los clientes de las empresas de telecomunicaciones fijas en Colombia. Se obtuvieron datos de 324 usuarios en las principales ciudades del pa\u00eds, con un cuestionario virtual. Las 5 hip\u00f3tesis sugeridas se probaron utilizando modelos de ecuaciones estructurales por PLS-SEM. Los hallazgos evidencian la pertinencia del SERVQUAL para explicar la calidad de servicio y que la satisfacci\u00f3n est\u00e1 influenciada directamente por dicho constructo y el valor percibido. Esta investigaci\u00f3n es una contribuci\u00f3n de la literatura dada la poca investigaci\u00f3n sobre estos constructos en dicho sector y pa\u00eds.","published_in":"Contadur\u00eda y administraci\u00f3n, ISSN 0186-1042, Vol. 65, N\u00ba. 3, 2020","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Satisfacci\u00f3n; Valor percibido; Marketing; Telecomunicaciones; Satisfaction; Perceived value; Telecommunications","subject":"Satisfacci\u00f3n; Valor percibido; Marketing; Telecomunicaciones; Satisfaction; Perceived value; Telecommunications","authors":"Henao Colorado, Laura Cristina","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504746","oa_state":"2","url":"aeca7cffb6bd6788d216d07827a3b4d7c1261eb4af6034a61245751029f8b450","relevance":45},{"id":"c1e60747d4b9d26197979221af8fadd09c864bedb6e3a78dead0ca8041493e2b","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i1.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2015.v4.i1.01","title":"Editorial","paper_abstract":"El presente n\u00famero de Commons recoge una variedad de art\u00edculos. Cada uno de ellos se corresonde con una de las principales l\u00edneas editoriales que dan sentido a nuestro trabajo editorial. Y el elemento com\u00fan a todos ellos es el car\u00e1cter cr\u00edtico con el que se releen las diversas pr\u00e1cticas y an\u00e1lisis que se mueven en el amplio y fluido territorio de la comunicaci\u00f3n, la tecnolog\u00eda, la pol\u00edtica y la transformaci\u00f3n social. As\u00ed, el primero de ellos, Nuevas tecnolog\u00edas y cambio social: los yayoflautas se organizan en red para generar transformaciones sociales, remite a una de las redes m\u00e1s activas y originales que formaron parte del movimiento 15m. Los yayoflautas ejemplifican una ruptura respecto al imaginario dominante del \u201cmayor\u201d, concebido como alguien pol\u00edticamente conservador y tecnol\u00f3gicamente reservado respecto a las tendencias dominantes. En este art\u00edculo, firmado por Mari\u00e1n Alonso (Universidad de Sevilla) se rompen estos estereotipos, para explorar los modos en los que estos abuelos se apropian de la web social o participativa para impulsar sus acciones.","published_in":"Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital - COMMONS 2015 Vol. 4 N. 1","year":"2020-03-13T09:22:58Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, V\u00edctor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22593","oa_state":"1","url":"c1e60747d4b9d26197979221af8fadd09c864bedb6e3a78dead0ca8041493e2b","relevance":44},{"id":"f5264ac6fc141c11f6c1636d60e006da2352e5db29096dad42b8e21a309a3467","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2013.v2.i2.02","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2013.v2.i2.02","title":"Comunicaci\u00f3n, desarrollo y cambio social en Espa\u00f1a: Entre la institucionalizaci\u00f3n y la implosi\u00f3n del campo ; Communication, development and social change in Spain: between the institutionalization and the implosion of the field","paper_abstract":"El presente trabajo da cuenta del proceso de institucionalizaci\u00f3n de la Comunicaci\u00f3n para el Desarrollo y el Cambio Social (CDCS) en Espa\u00f1a en la primera d\u00e9cada del siglo XXI, despu\u00e9s de un periodo de olvido y de marginaci\u00f3n. La hip\u00f3tesis de partida es que el actual momento de expansi\u00f3n de la CDCS en el contexto espa\u00f1ol puede ser analizado como una implosi\u00f3n del campo, esto es, como una ruptura hacia dentro, debido a la inconsistencia y debilidad con la que se institucionaliz\u00f3. El enfoque metodol\u00f3gico es la revisi\u00f3n documental (Erlandson, 1993; MacDonald y Tipton, 1993; Mills, 1959;) de la literatura acad\u00e9mica y de los informes sobre el tema producidos en el contexto espa\u00f1ol entre 1980 y 2010. Asimismo, el art\u00edculo establece relaciones entre la construcci\u00f3n del campo de la CDCS en Espa\u00f1a y los procesos llevados a cabo a escala mundial, con el objetivo de establecer las continuidades y discontinuidades pertinentes. ; This paper wants to give an account of the process of institutionalization of Communication for Development and Social change (CDCS) in Spain in the first decade of the 21st century, after a long period of oblivion and marginalization. The initial hypothesis is that during the current expansion of the CDCS in the Spanish context, this boom can be analyzed as an implosion of this field, that is, as a break inwards, due to the inconsistency and the weakness with which it was built in the institutionalization phase. Methodologically, the work has been done from the perspective of the document review (Erlandson, 1993) MacDonald and Tipton, 1993; Mills, 1959) of the academic literature and reports produced in the Spanish context for the past 30 years. The article also establishes relations between the construction of the field of the CDCS in Spain and the processes carried out worldwide, with the aim of establishing relevant discontinuities and continuities.","published_in":"COMMONS - Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital Vol.2 n\u00ba2 pp. 39-64","year":"2020-03-23T09:05:20Z","subject_orig":"Comunicaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo; Comunicaci\u00f3n y Cambio Social; institucionalizaci\u00f3n; ONG; movimientos sociales; Communication and Development; Communication and Social Change; institutionalization; NGOs; social movements","subject":"Comunicaci\u00f3n y Desarrollo; Comunicaci\u00f3n y Cambio Social; institucionalizaci\u00f3n; ONG; movimientos sociales; Communication and Development; Communication and Social Change; institutionalization; NGOs; social movements","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, V\u00edctor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22636","oa_state":"1","url":"f5264ac6fc141c11f6c1636d60e006da2352e5db29096dad42b8e21a309a3467","relevance":43},{"id":"dac249f2c107e9563a3ab24c4f794d8beb60b7f0fd2c0737755b8ffb13c06e9d","relation":"2255-3401; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646; doi:10.25267\/COMMONS.2014.v3.i2.01","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.25267\/COMMONS.2014.v3.i2.01","title":"EDITORIAL Commons Vol.3 n\u00ba2","paper_abstract":"El t\u00e9rmino Comunicambio ha servido, en los \u00faltimos tiempos, para aglutinar a comunicadores y comunicadoras del contexto espa\u00f1ol interesados por un enfoque de la comunicaci\u00f3n que pone el \u00e9nfasis en el impulso de procesos de cambio social. El hashtag #Comunicambio en Twitter, el grupo con el mismo nombre en Facebook, las iniciativas de formaci\u00f3n de la CONGDE organizadas en los dos \u00faltimos a\u00f1os con este nombre o el pr\u00f3ximo congreso e-Comunicambio Social (Universidad Jaume I, Castell\u00f3n, 2015) son algunos de los acontecimientos que dan cuenta de este proceso de articulaci\u00f3n.","published_in":"COMMONS - Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital Vol.3 n\u00ba2 pp. 1-2","year":"2020-03-25T08:11:30Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, V\u00edctor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22646","oa_state":"1","url":"dac249f2c107e9563a3ab24c4f794d8beb60b7f0fd2c0737755b8ffb13c06e9d","relevance":42},{"id":"0153d0f8cda631098dc783c887fe4f680fd80c23cd001343313f991edb7202fe","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7524421; (Revista) ISSN 2316-932X","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7524421","title":"Marketing de relacionamento na gest\u00e3o do futebol: Identifica\u00e7\u00e3o e compara\u00e7\u00e3o das a\u00e7\u00f5es em quatro clubes brasileiros","paper_abstract":"Objective: The general objective intended in this study was to identify whether there are use of relationship marketing instruments and strategies in the management of the four largest Brazilian clubs in number of fans and to compare the actions between them. Method: It is a descriptive qualitative research in which, to achieve the objectives, secondary data such as documents and information available on the official websites of the clubs were used. From that, the data were interpreted trying to identify relationship marketing actions and their classification according to the literature. Originality\/Relevance: The new context of investments in sport requires greater professionalization, transparency and rationalization of the area's management. Thus, studying the functional areas of the administration concatenating with the sporting fact is of paramount importance for more efficient and effective management practices, hence the relevance of this article. Results: Among the results found, the supporter partner program stands out as a relationship marketing strategy used by the clubs studied. In addition, the contractual relationship model was the most used by clubs. Theoretical\/Methodological Contributions: The content of this paper provides support for scientific understanding of sports consumer behavior and especially about the management process of clubs related to sports and relationship marketing, helping in the development of new works in this area ; Objetivo: O objetivo geral pretendido nesse estudo foi identificar se h\u00e1 uso de instrumentos e estrat\u00e9gias do marketing de relacionamento na gest\u00e3o dos quatro maiores clubes brasileiros em n\u00famero de torcedor e comparar as a\u00e7\u00f5es entre esses. M\u00e9todo: \u00c9 uma pesquisa qualitativa descritiva em que, para atingir os objetivos, utilizou-se de dados secund\u00e1rios como documentos e informa\u00e7\u00f5es dispon\u00edveis nos sites oficiais dos clubes. A partir disso, os dados foram interpretados tentando identificar a\u00e7\u00f5es de marketing de relacionamento e sua classifica\u00e7\u00e3o conforme a literatura. Originalidade\/Relev\u00e2ncia: O novo contexto de investimentos no esporte exige maior profissionaliza\u00e7\u00e3o, transpar\u00eancia e racionaliza\u00e7\u00e3o da gest\u00e3o da \u00e1rea. Assim, estudar as \u00e1reas funcionais da administra\u00e7\u00e3o concatenando com o fato esportivo \u00e9 de suma import\u00e2ncia para pr\u00e1ticas mais eficientes e eficazes de gest\u00e3o, da\u00ed a relev\u00e2ncia do presente artigo. Resultados: Dentre os resultados encontrados, destaca-se o programa de s\u00f3cio torcedor como estrat\u00e9gia de marketing de relacionamento utilizado pelos clubes estudados. Al\u00e9m disso, o modelo de relacionamento contratual foi o mais utilizado pelos clubes. Contribui\u00e7\u00f5es Te\u00f3ricas\/Metodol\u00f3gicas: O conte\u00fado deste trabalho fornece subs\u00eddio para entendimento cient\u00edfico sobre o comportamento do consumidor esportivo e principalmente sobre o processo gerencial dos clubes relacionados ao marketing esportivo e de relacionamento, auxiliando no desenvolvimento de novos trabalhos nesta \u00e1rea. Contribui\u00e7\u00f5es Sociais: O esporte traz consigo aspectos intang\u00edveis, ou seja, o momento esportivo \u00e9 considerado \u00fanico e de dif\u00edcil precifica\u00e7\u00e3o. Dalam perkembangan UMKM di Indonesia, perlu inovasi dan strategi dalam pemasaran produk untuk mencapai keberhasilan dan kestabilan UMKM dalam menghadapi Revolusi Industri 4.0. Ashfa Madu Borobudur sebagai UMKM peternak lebah dan penghasil madu yang terletak di Desa Wisata Tanjungsari, Kecamatan Borobudur, Kabupaten Magelang, Provinsi Jawa Tengah. Ashfa Madu Borobudur belum sepenuhnya menjadi bagian dalam Branding Borobudur yang ditetapkan Pemerintah Pusat sebagai kawasan cagar budaya Internasional dan tingkat penjualan produk masih rata-rata. Pengabdian ini bertujuan agar penjualan produk madu meningkat dengan konsumen melakukan repeat order serta menjadi salah satu merek dan tujuan wisata yang dikenal sebagai penghasil madu dan peternak lebah di sekitar kawasan Borobudur. Beberapa potensi yang dimaksimalkan dalam strategi product branding seperti perancangan ulang logo, brosur, kemasan produk dan x-banner serta optimalisasi website Ashfa Madu Borobudur. Dengan implementasi strategi product branding oleh dosen dan mahasiswa KKN PPMT Universitas Muhammadiyah Magelang, kontribusi penjualan online meningkat menjadi sebanyak 28 %.Kata kunci: Borobudur; Branding; Digital Marketing; Madu; UMKM.AbstractMicro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) from 1997 until now stands firmly in Indonesia. In the development of MSMEs in Indonesia, it is necessary to innovate and strategy in marketing products to achieve the success and stability of MSMEs in the face of the Industrial Revolution 4.0. Ashfa Madu Borobudur as MSMEs beekeeper and honey producer located in Tanjungsari Tourism Village, Borobudur District. Ashfa Madu Borobudur has not yet fully become part of the Borobudur Branding that has been established by the Central Government as an international cultural heritage area and the level of product sales is still average. This dedication aims to increase the sale of honey products by consumers making repeat orders and becoming one of the brands and tourist destinations around the Borobudur area. Some of the potentials are maximized in product branding strategies such as redesigning logos, brochures, product packaging, and x-banners as well as optimizing the Ashfa Madu Borobudur website. With the implementation of the product branding strategy by lecturers and students of KKN PPMT University of Muhammadiyah Magelang, the contribution of online sales increased to as much as 28%.Keywords: Borobudur; Branding; Digital Marketing; Honey; Micro Small And Medium Enterprises.","published_in":"JURNAL PENGABDIAN KEPADA MASYARAKAT; Vol 26, No 3 (2020): JULI - SEPTEMBER; 154 - 161 ; 2502-7220 ; 0852-2715 ; 10.24114\/jpkm.v26i3","year":"2020-06-03","subject_orig":"borobudur; branding; honey; Micro Small and Medium Enterprises; quadruple helix","subject":"borobudur; branding; honey; Micro Small and Medium Enterprises; quadruple helix","authors":"Primadewi, Ardhin; Anwar, Tulkhah Mubasyir; Yustin, Yustin; Sani, Afan Hafara; Fauzi, Miftakhul","link":"https:\/\/jurnal.unimed.ac.id\/2012\/index.php\/jpkm\/article\/view\/17683","oa_state":"1","url":"1ac58ad2eeccc307550fca33715164cc3b98c069d8bf34c8697353642d7c601a","relevance":40},{"id":"ecd6fb64f05458592e7208359b052d176fee9c4e0a114533d82e984735cffda7","relation":"hal-02276381; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","identifier":"https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","title":"L'enrichissement de l'exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale par l'utilisation d'outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation","paper_abstract":"International audience ; This paper focuses on the use of interactive mediation tools during the museum visit. What are the dimensions of the museum visit experience? Is it specific to the nature of the interactive tool (audioguide, tablet, interactive kiosk, multi-user digital table) used during the visit ? First, a state of the art of the researches which focused on the influence of interactive mediation tools on the museum visit is presented. Second, the results from the qualitative method are analysed. On a managerial level, the goal is to help museum professionnals to choose interactive mediation tools in order to enrich the visit experience and broaden their audiences. ; La nature de l\u2019outil interactif utilis\u00e9 (audioguide, tablette tactile, borne interactive, table tactile multi-usagers) lors de la visite induit-elle une exp\u00e9rience mus\u00e9ale sp\u00e9cifique ? Tout d\u2019abord une synth\u00e8se de la revue de la litt\u00e9rature est pr\u00e9sent\u00e9e portant sur l\u2019influence des outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation sur l\u2019exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale. Puis, les r\u00e9sultats issus d\u2019une d\u00e9marche qualitative sont analys\u00e9s. La finalit\u00e9 manag\u00e9riale est d\u2019aider les professionnels dans leur processus de choix des outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation afin d\u2019enrichir l\u2019exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale v\u00e9cue par les publics, dans un objectif de leur \u00e9largissement et de leur diversification.","published_in":"ISSN: 0779-7389 ; D\u00e9cisions Marketing ; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381 ; D\u00e9cisions Marketing, Association Fran\u00e7aise du Marketing, 2020, pp.87-101","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Mus\u00e9e; M\u00e9thode qualitative; Marketing des arts et de la culture; Exp\u00e9rience; Comportement du consommateur; [SHS.GESTION]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Business administration; [SHS.ART]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Art and art history","subject":"Mus\u00e9e; M\u00e9thode qualitative; Marketing des arts et de la culture; Exp\u00e9rience; Comportement du consommateur;  ","authors":"Jarrier, Elodie; Bourgeon-Renault, Dominique","link":"https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","oa_state":"2","url":"ecd6fb64f05458592e7208359b052d176fee9c4e0a114533d82e984735cffda7","relevance":39},{"id":"547b20f1dc3af96eb5cb364ff461925e4f6b619a5a94d98464912c6683233df9","relation":"https:\/\/e-journal.iainsalatiga.ac.id\/index.php\/ijtihad\/article\/view\/3921\/pdf; https:\/\/e-journal.iainsalatiga.ac.id\/index.php\/ijtihad\/article\/view\/3921; doi:10.18326\/ijtihad.v20i1.23-40","identifier":"https:\/\/e-journal.iainsalatiga.ac.id\/index.php\/ijtihad\/article\/view\/3921; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.18326\/ijtihad.v20i1.23-40","title":"Waqf fundraising through money in the industrial revolution 4.0 era: A case study on Baitulmaal Munzalan Indonesia","paper_abstract":"Only a few institutions are professionals in managing waqf in West Kalimantan Province. Baitulmaal Munzalan Indonesia Foundation (BMI) is present as one solution for people who want to donate their fund\u2019s waqf through money in the industrial revolution 4.0 era. Having only been established for three years, BIM has managed to raise funds cash waqf of Rp. 2.9 billion. This paper aims to explain the strategies and constraints faced by BMI in collecting endowment funds through money in the digital age. By using the type of field research and data collection techniques through observation, interviews, and Focus Grup Discussion (FGD), there are two research results in this paper. First, the strategies used by BMI in developing cash waqf in the digital age are companies through social media (Facebook pages and Instagram) and tablig. Kampanye through social media is the most dominant strategy used by BMI and has enormous potential. Secondly, the obstacle felt by BMI in managing and developing cash waqf is negative perceptions from the community (external obstacle). Based on the results of this study, the authors argue that marketing through social media not only has positive implications for for-profit institutions but also non-profit institutions such as BMI in collecting and managing cash waqf in Indonesia.","published_in":"Ijtihad : Jurnal Wacana Hukum Islam dan Kemanusiaan; Vol 20, No 1 (2020); 23-40 ; 2477-8036 ; 1411-9544","year":"2020-06-10","subject_orig":"BMI; cash waqf; fundraising; industrial revolution 4.0","subject":"BMI; cash waqf; fundraising; industrial ; 0","authors":"Bustami, Bustami; Laksamana, Rio; Rofiqoh, Zuliana","link":"https:\/\/e-journal.iainsalatiga.ac.id\/index.php\/ijtihad\/article\/view\/3921","oa_state":"1","url":"547b20f1dc3af96eb5cb364ff461925e4f6b619a5a94d98464912c6683233df9","relevance":38},{"id":"c85cd78477b5c2eacc91821919fb3f9ef83ebd4c9303037f030ad1d3e22e9a2f","relation":"International Journal of Retail and Distribution Management; 48; 1; 2020; 92-108; 10.1108\/IJRDM-07-2018-0146; Emerald; non; oui; 0959-0552; https:\/\/basepub.dauphine.fr\/handle\/123456789\/20565","identifier":"https:\/\/basepub.dauphine.fr\/handle\/123456789\/20565","title":"How website browsing impacts expectations of store features","paper_abstract":"E-commerce has become a key component of brand retail strategies since the advent of omni-channel distributions. Many researchers have investigated the strategic role of e-commerce, and some recent articles show the importance of exploring the impact of this distribution model on consumer behaviour. However, there is no study focusing on how visits to a website create expectations of the shop. Relying on the expectancy-value theory and the omni-channel literature, the purpose of this paper is to fill this gap by focusing on how the digital channel can create expectations for the physical channel. ; non ; oui ; recherche ; International","published_in":"","year":"2020-01-31T13:31:31Z","subject_orig":"Retail; e-commerce; Omni-channel; Store atmospherics; Website atmospherics; 658.8; M.M3.M31; L.L1.L81; Circuits de distribution - Marketing direct - Commerce \u00e9lectronique","subject":"Retail; e-commerce; Omni-channel; Store atmospherics; Website atmospherics;; 8;; M3.M; L1.L Circuits de distribution - Marketing direct - Commerce \u00e9lectronique","authors":"Goudey, Alain; Loupiac, Philippine","link":"https:\/\/basepub.dauphine.fr\/handle\/123456789\/20565","oa_state":"2","url":"c85cd78477b5c2eacc91821919fb3f9ef83ebd4c9303037f030ad1d3e22e9a2f","relevance":37},{"id":"81fd8cbeba30b511da9f63429a8b139843a88a3ab748be0084bc8e3eeb8494d3","relation":"https:\/\/journal.ubm.ac.id\/index.php\/bricolage\/article\/view\/2067\/1692; https:\/\/journal.ubm.ac.id\/index.php\/bricolage\/article\/view\/2067; doi:10.30813\/bricolage.v6i01.2067","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.ubm.ac.id\/index.php\/bricolage\/article\/view\/2067; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.30813\/bricolage.v6i01.2067","title":"PERANCANGAN STRATEGI DIGITAL MARKETING COMMUNICATION BAGI INDUSTRI PERHOTELAN DALAM MENJAWAB TANTANGAN ERA POSMODERN","paper_abstract":"ABSTRACT The development of consumer culture in the era of technology has a direct impact on business competition in the hospitality sector. To be in a superior position in winning the competition, it requires the implementation of strategic planning. With the significant growth of internet users, the hotel industry must make good use of the situation, namely promoting digital marketing communication strategies. The purpose of this research is to design a digital marketing communication strategy for the Golden Tulip Legacy Hotel in Surabaya to overcome the postmodern era challenges. The research method is descriptive qualitative. The study is focused on the website and Instagram design, because it is the main access to information distribution of the Golden Tulip Legacy Surabaya. The informants in this study are selected speakers based on criteria that fit the purpose of the study. The method of data collection is done by observation, interviews, and documentation. The results of this study are the design of innovative digital marketing communication strategies that can be made with a management calendar, content formulation system, updated website features, optimized Instagram, and following the latest trends. Keywords; marketing strategy, digital marketing communication, website, Instagram ABSTRAK Perkembangan budaya konsumen di era teknologi berdampak langsung pada persaingan bisnis di dalam bidang perhotelan. Untuk berada di posisi yang unggul dalam memenangkan persaingan, diperlukan adanya implementasi dari perencanaan yang strategis. Dengan pertumbuhan pengguna internet yang signifikan, industri hotel harus memanfaatkan keadaan dengan baik, yakni melakukan promosi dengan strategi digital marketing communication. Tujuan dari penelitian ini adalah untuk merancang strategi digital marketing communication bagi Hotel Golden Tulip Legacy Surabaya agar dapat menjawab tantangan pada era postmodern. Jenis penelitian yang digunakan adalah kualitatif deskriptif yang berfokus pada website dan Instagram karena merupakan akses penyaluran informasi utama Golden Tulip Legacy Surabaya. Informan dalam penelitian ini adalah narasumber yang terpilih berdasarkan kriteria yang sesuai dengan tujuan penelitian. Metode pengumpulan data dilakukan dengan observasi, wawancara, dan dokumentasi. Hasil penelitian ini adalah perancangan strategi digital marketing communication yang inovatif dapat dibuat dengan kalender pengelolaan, sistem perumusan konten, pembaharuan fitur website, pengoptimalan Instagram, dan mengikuti tren terkini. Kata kunci; strategi pemasaran, komunikasi pemasaran digital, website, Instagram","published_in":"Bricolage : Jurnal Magister Ilmu Komunikasi; Vol 6, No 01 (2020): Accredited by Kemenristekdikti RI SK No. 36\/E\/KPT\/2019; 051-064 ; 2615-6423 ; 2502-0935","year":"2020-03-31","subject_orig":"marketing strategy; digital marketing communication; website; Instagram","subject":"marketing strategy; digital marketing communication; website; Instagram","authors":"Teguh, Monika; Ciawati, Selvy Tri","link":"https:\/\/journal.ubm.ac.id\/index.php\/bricolage\/article\/view\/2067","oa_state":"1","url":"81fd8cbeba30b511da9f63429a8b139843a88a3ab748be0084bc8e3eeb8494d3","relevance":36},{"id":"4736f27bef4ac854b9d7c3a8f6bf131890660d4b298701ef2324d0c60c1abcaa","relation":"https:\/\/p3m.sinus.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/e-jurnal_SINUS\/article\/view\/456\/pdf; https:\/\/p3m.sinus.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/e-jurnal_SINUS\/article\/view\/456; doi:10.30646\/sinus.v18i2.456","identifier":"https:\/\/p3m.sinus.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/e-jurnal_SINUS\/article\/view\/456; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.30646\/sinus.v18i2.456","title":"METODE KLASIFIKASI MUTU GREENBEAN KOPI ARABIKA LANANG DAN BIASA MENGGUNAKAN K-NEAREST NEIGHBOR BERDASARKAN BENTUK","paper_abstract":"During this time, the Greenbean coffee sorting process is still done manually which still has many shortcomings. Manually, this result is classified in inappropriate and inconsistent classification results due to human negligence. Grading in the processing and marketing sectors is important. Inappropriate grading opposes farmers simply because Lanang and ordinary Arabica coffee are the same. Hence, we need a consistent classification system. This research uses image processing to recognize Greenbean Arabica coffee. K-NN (K-Nearest Neighbor) method is used for a quality classification. This research will classify Arabica Greenbean coffee into 4 quality classes, namely intact Lanang Arabica, broken Lanang Arabica, intact ordinary Arabica, and ordinary broken Arabica. The search of trial process shows that K-NN classification feature is able to recognize Arabica coffee Greenbean into 4 classes with an accuracy value of 63.5%, very good at recognizing 90% of regular Arabica intact and 97% of whole Arabica intact. However, it is still weak in recognizing broken coffee Greenbean based on its type. The area feature is better in recognizing Arabica coffee Greenbean based on 4 classes with an accuracy of 69.8%. This research obtains 120 datasets from 80 tested data trains and 40 tested random data.","published_in":"Jurnal Ilmiah SINUS; Vol 18, No 2 (2020): Vol. 18, No. 2, Juli 2020; 1-8 ; 2548-4028 ; 1693-1173 ; 10.30646\/sinus.v18i2","year":"2020-07-06","subject_orig":"Digital image processing; k-nearest neighbor; classification of Greenbean Arabica","subject":"Digital image processing; k-nearest neighbor; classification of Greenbean Arabica","authors":"Ikhsan, Dedy; Utami, Ema; Wibowo, Ferry Wahyu","link":"https:\/\/p3m.sinus.ac.id\/jurnal\/index.php\/e-jurnal_SINUS\/article\/view\/456","oa_state":"1","url":"4736f27bef4ac854b9d7c3a8f6bf131890660d4b298701ef2324d0c60c1abcaa","relevance":35},{"id":"d1f9b0ca213e80e6c218126c24983d192221ec36e7c659815a4600fc363f8564","relation":"http:\/\/dx.doi.org\/10.3390\/sym12071105; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11536\/155208; doi:10.3390\/sym12071105; SYMMETRY-BASEL; WOS:000554126300001","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11536\/155208; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3390\/sym12071105","title":"A Photo Post Recommendation System Based on Topic Model for Improving Facebook Fan Page Engagement","paper_abstract":"Digital advertising on social media officially surpassed traditional advertising and became the largest marketing media in many countries. However, how to maximize the value of the overall marketing budget is one of the most concerning issues of all enterprises. The content of the Facebook photo post needs to be analyzed effectively so that the social media companies and managers can concentrate on handling their fan pages. This research aimed to use text mining techniques to find the audience accurately. Therefore, we built a topic model recommendation system (TMRS) to analyze Facebook posts by sorting the target posts according to the recommended scores. The TMRS includes six stages, such as data preprocessing, Chinese word segmentation, word refinement, TF-IDF word vector conversion, creating model via Latent Semantic Indexing (LSI), or Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA), and calculating the recommendation score. In addition to automatically selecting posts to create advertisements, this model is more effective in using marketing budgets and getting more engagements. Based on the recommendation results, it is verified that the TMRS can increase the engagement rate compared to the traditional engagement rate recommended method (ERRM). Ultimately, advertisers can have the chance to create ads for the post with potentially high engagements under a limited budget.","published_in":"","year":"2020-07-01","subject_orig":"Facebook advertising post; social media marketing; text mining; recommendation system; topic model; post engagement","subject":"Facebook advertising post; social media marketing; text mining; recommendation system; topic model; post engagement","authors":"Liao, Chia-Hung; Chen, Li-Xian; Yang, Jhih-Cheng; Yuan, Shyan-Ming","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/11536\/155208","oa_state":"2","url":"d1f9b0ca213e80e6c218126c24983d192221ec36e7c659815a4600fc363f8564","relevance":34},{"id":"efb816b3429bf39b2d672327618bc711885f3c4be20e65f058df4d0c92386087","relation":"https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325\/345; Cwalina W., Falkowski A., Newman B. URL: https:\/\/twitter.com\/gudkovd\/status\/1076033621662810113 (\u0434\u0430\u0442\u0430 \u043e\u0431\u0440\u0430\u0449\u0435\u043d\u0438\u044f 26.05.2019).; https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325; doi:10.32603\/2412-8562-2020-6-3-5-20","identifier":"https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.32603\/2412-8562-2020-6-3-5-20","title":"Storytelling of Political Leaders as an Instrument of Symbolic Politics ; \u0421\u0442\u043e\u0440\u0438\u0442\u0435\u043b\u043b\u0438\u043d\u0433 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u0438\u0445 \u043b\u0438\u0434\u0435\u0440\u043e\u0432 \u043a\u0430\u043a \u0438\u043d\u0441\u0442\u0440\u0443\u043c\u0435\u043d\u0442 \u0441\u0438\u043c\u0432\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0447\u0435\u0441\u043a\u043e\u0439 \u043f\u043e\u043b\u0438\u0442\u0438\u043a\u0438","paper_abstract":"Introduction. The article attempts to analyze the attempts of political leaders of various types to build political communications in the new social reality - on the Internet. The material of the study was taken from the storytelling of the three leaders in social networks during the first attempts to create elements of symbolic politics. In the process of analyzing this narration, we asked ourselves: - How much is the traditional image of a particular political leader related to his reflection on social networks? The relevance of the author's approach lies in the analysis of storytelling as a tool for the formation of symbolic politics and social reality. Political leaders moved into a virtual environment following their target audiences.Methodology and sources. The methodological basis of the work is verification on practical material of socio-philosophical concepts and models of political analysts, cultural scientists, sociologists (P. Shtompki, V.A. Yadova, O.Yu. Malinova, G.L. Tulchinsky and others). The article uses narratives obtained from open access social networks. To clarify the formation of social reality, a comparative analysis of the narratives of public leaders regarding the creation of a space of symbolic politics was carried out.Results and discussion. As a result of the study, theoretical models that describe the behavioral patterns of political leaders in the information society were verified. In the modern information society, the main focus is transferred to social networks, where the target audience of political figures spend their time. Political leaders follow their target audience in different ways by showing their presence on social networks, both quantitative and qualitative. As a result of the study, the distinctive features of storytelling of public politicians, the similarities and differences in the technologies for creating a full-fledged image of a leader in the mass consciousness of the target audience, the similarities and differences between the image of a political leader taking shape in traditional media and on the Internet are clarified.Conclusion. In 2018, we observe the phenomenon of the entry into the space of social networks of politicians with the aim of event formation of elements of symbolic politics. In the study of storytelling as a process of forming public communications, the roles of sources and actors are defined. In today's digital society, social networks play a critical role in the processes of generating social reality. The mechanisms for the formation of narratives may require additional research, but now we can determine their impact on the political, socio-cultural and business environment. ; Gerasimov V.; P. Tereshchenko A.; \u0421. \u0413\u0435\u0440\u0430\u0441\u0438\u043c\u043e\u0432 \u0412.; \u041f. \u0422\u0435\u0440\u0435\u0449\u0435\u043d\u043a\u043e \u0410.","link":"https:\/\/discourse.elpub.ru\/jour\/article\/view\/325","oa_state":"1","url":"efb816b3429bf39b2d672327618bc711885f3c4be20e65f058df4d0c92386087","relevance":33},{"id":"894535011528242dc79ea56c52f72e92607976ea3ea44b5c4e286de86ca2901a","relation":"info:eu-repo\/semantics\/altIdentifier\/doi\/10.1016\/j.intmar.2019.08.002; hal-02391063; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063\/document; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063\/file\/Busca_01.pdf; doi:10.1016\/j.intmar.2019.08.002","identifier":"https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063\/document; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063\/file\/Busca_01.pdf; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1016\/j.intmar.2019.08.002","title":"A Framework for Digital Marketing Research: Investigating the Four Cultural Eras of Digital Marketing","paper_abstract":"International audience ; The digital marketing discipline is facing growing fragmentation; the proliferation of different subareas of research impedes the accumulation of knowledge. This fragmentation seems logically tied to the inherent complexity of the Internet, itself resulting from 50 years of evolution. Thus, our aim is to provide an integrative framework for research in digital marketing derived from the historical analysis of the Internet. Using practice theory and institutional theory, we outline a new type of institutional work: imprinting work. We apply this framework to the analysis of historical secondary sources. We find four cultural repertoires on the Internet (collaborative systems, traditional market systems, co-creation systems, and prosumption market systems) and describe the dynamics of imprinting work leading to their creation, showing how new systems are created by appropriating and assimilating existing cultural repertoires. We contribute to the digital marketing literature by providing a cultural framework and a theory explaining the dynamics of the creation of four cultural repertoires. Moreover, we outline three paths of potential evolution of the digital landscape. Our framework may help managers make sense of their digital strategy and navigate the various Internet systems.","published_in":"ISSN: 1094-9968 ; EISSN: 1520-6653 ; Journal of Interactive Marketing ; https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063 ; Journal of Interactive Marketing, Elsevier, 2020, 49, pp.1-19. ⟨10.1016\/j.intmar.2019.08.002⟩","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Prospective; Cultural framework; Digital marketing; Historical method; Digital cultures; Institutional theory; Practice theory; JEL: M - Business Administration and Business Economics \u2022 Marketing \u2022 Accounting \u2022 Personnel Economics\/M.M3 - Marketing and Advertising\/M.M3.M31 - Marketing; [SHS.GESTION]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Business administration","subject":"Prospective; Cultural framework; Digital marketing; Historical method; Digital cultures; Institutional theory; Practice theory; JEL: M - Business Administration and Business Economics \u2022 Marketing \u2022 Accounting \u2022 Personnel Economics\/M.M3 - Marketing and Advertising\/M.M3.M- Marketing; ","authors":"Busca, Laurent; Bertrandias, Laurent","link":"https:\/\/hal.umontpellier.fr\/hal-02391063","oa_state":"1","url":"894535011528242dc79ea56c52f72e92607976ea3ea44b5c4e286de86ca2901a","relevance":32},{"id":"8f710049edd6d254738bf7938098ae8a51a4e5a27bfba054d9ddd148169eb9fa","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492; (Revista) ISSN 2477-9024","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492","title":"Propuesta de servicio de guarder\u00eda para peluquer\u00eda y Spa","paper_abstract":"The main objective of this research is to propose a childcare service in the Spa & Hairdressing salon in northern Guayaquil - Ecuador, since it was able to observe the Hairdressers & Spa lately they have suffered a decrease in the influx of customers, due to the competition that is increasingly strong and because people have less and less time to attend these places. A study was carried out to know the acceptance of a nursery in a hairdressing salon or Spa, through a descriptive investigation, among the results obtained was the demand for home beauty work because the mothers took care of time to attend the Spa, So the proposal of the marketing strategies to implement a nursery, will help the mothers to assist the companions of their sons or daughters, which ensures the permanence in the place. ; El principal objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n es proponer un servicio de guarder\u00eda en los Spa & Peluquer\u00eda del norte de Guayaquil \u2013 Ecuador, ya que se pudo observar que las Peluquer\u00edas & Spa \u00faltimamente han tenido un descenso de afluencia de clientes, por la competencia que cada vez es m\u00e1s fuerte y porque las personas cada vez tienen menos tiempo para poder asistir a estos lugares. Se realiz\u00f3 un estudio para conocer la aceptaci\u00f3n de una guarder\u00eda dentro de una peluquer\u00eda o Spa, a trav\u00e9s de una investigaci\u00f3n descriptiva, entre los resultados obtenidos fue que surgi\u00f3 la demanda de trabajos de belleza a domicilio porque las madres carec\u00edan de tiempo para asistir a los Spa, por lo que la propuesta de las estrategias de marketing para implementar una guarder\u00eda, va a ayudar a las madres de familia a asistir acompa\u00f1adas de sus hijos o hijas, lo que asegurar\u00e1 la permanencia en el lugar.","published_in":"INNOVA Research Journal, ISSN 2477-9024, null 5, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: (Enero - Abril, 2020)), pags. 138-149","year":"2020","subject_orig":"marketing strategies; differentiation; positioning; estrategias de marketing; diferenciaci\u00f3n; posicionamiento","subject":"marketing strategies; differentiation; positioning; estrategias de marketing; diferenciaci\u00f3n; posicionamiento","authors":"Torres Andrade, Jos\u00e9; Chedraui, Lorraine","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7475492","oa_state":"2","url":"8f710049edd6d254738bf7938098ae8a51a4e5a27bfba054d9ddd148169eb9fa","relevance":31},{"id":"2a5f4ecb8a0529723cf773e3889180a7ac99442b8a6b6c96b25acc4132f55d30","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117; (Revista) ISSN 2007-0934","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117","title":"Producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del mamey Alpoyeca, Guerrero: opini\u00f3n de productores","paper_abstract":"M\u00e9xico es el principal productor de mamey (Pouteria sapota) en el mundo; sin embargo, se percibe que la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del fruto es afectado por diversos factores biol\u00f3gicos, t\u00e9cnicos y socioecon\u00f3micos que impactan negativamente en el desarrollo de la cadena productiva. Para tener evidencia directa del caso, en 2017 se entrevist\u00f3 a productores de mamey del municipio de Alpoyeca, Guerrero, planteando como objetivo conocer y analizar su opini\u00f3n de la problem\u00e1tica para la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n. Se entrevistaron 50 productores de mamey que mediante un cuestionario se capt\u00f3 la informaci\u00f3n. Los factores que afectan la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n del mamey se agruparon en biol\u00f3gicos, t\u00e9cnicos y socioecon\u00f3micos. Los biol\u00f3gicos est\u00e1n relacionados con la presencia de plagas y enfermedades que afectan dr\u00e1sticamente la vida \u00fatil de las plantas y el fruto. Los problemas t\u00e9cnicos declarados fueron plantas avejentadas, manejo deficiente de la huerta que afecta la producci\u00f3n, sanidad y calidad del fruto. Los socioecon\u00f3micos tienen que ver con la falta de recursos econ\u00f3micos, bajo precio del producto, falta de apoyo institucional e intermediarismo. De esta manera, la producci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n es afectada por manejo deficiente de la huerta debido a desconocimiento t\u00e9cnico de los productores, por la escasa solvencia econ\u00f3mica, falta de mercado seguro y el no haber apoyo institucional, lo cual es agravado por la escasa organizaci\u00f3n de productores ; Mexico is the main producer of mamey (Pouteria sapota) in the world; however, it is perceived that the production and commercialization of the fruit is affected by various biological, technical and socioeconomic factors that negatively impact the development of the production chain. To have direct evidence of the case, in 2017, mamey producers from the municipality of Alpoyeca, Guerrero were interviewed, aiming to know and analyze their opinion of the problem for production and marketing. Fifty mamey producers were interviewed and the information was collected through a questionnaire. The factors that affect the production and commercialization of mamey were grouped into biological, technical and socioeconomic. Biologics are related to the presence of pests and diseases that drastically affect the useful life of plants and fruit. The declared technical problems were aging plants, poor management of the orchard that affects production, health and quality of the fruit. Socioeconomics have to do with the lack of economic resources, low product prices, lack of institutional support and intermediaries. In this way, production and marketing is affected by poor management of the garden due to technical ignorance of the producers, low economic solvency, lack of a secure market and the lack of institutional support, which is aggravated by the poor organization of producers","published_in":"Revista mexicana de ciencias agr\u00edcolas, ISSN 2007-0934, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 3, 2020, pags. 635-647","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Pouteria sapota; organizaci\u00f3n; percepciones; organization; perceptions","subject":"Pouteria sapota; organizaci\u00f3n; percepciones; organization; perceptions","authors":"Lainez Loyo, Eduardo; Olvera Hern\u00e1ndez, Jos\u00e9 Isabel; Guerrero Rodr\u00edguez, Juan de Dios; Aceves Ru\u00edz, Ernesto; \u00c1lvarez Calder\u00f3n, Norma Marcela; Andrade Navia, Juan Manuel","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7407117","oa_state":"2","url":"2a5f4ecb8a0529723cf773e3889180a7ac99442b8a6b6c96b25acc4132f55d30","relevance":30},{"id":"44a30c7b1295f7658fbb83a63cd3beaf0fc6ee634070d7195fa4b4b90ce2cbda","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504213; (Revista) ISSN 1576-3420","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504213","title":"Importancia de los estudios de opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica: su aplicaci\u00f3n y segmentaci\u00f3n del mercado en M\u00e9xico","paper_abstract":"The objective of this work includes the carrying out of a descriptive analysis of the industry of public opinion and market studies in Mexico, the main characteristics of the market from the perspective of supply and demand, as well as market segmentation by type of product. The implemented methodology consists of the application of in-depth interviews focused on various sectors, such as public servants, candidates in electoral elections, campaign advisers and strategists, academic experts, directors of areas of information management and research in the private sector, such as agency directors and independent consultants on market research and public opinion. The final result tries to offer a vision about the dimension, specialization and professionalization of this industry in constant growth in Mexico. They are presented to public opinion and market studies as an indispensable tool for information gathering, analysis and decision-making, which make it possible to measure the preferences of the plaintiffs in any field. In the same way that it shows, explains and analyzes what is the relationship and the degree of importance that emanate from them; Its importance lies in the fact that in recent years, they have come into force in various market segments, such as the electoral, public and private sectors, among others. ; O objetivo do presente trabalho inclui a realiza\u00e7\u00e3o de uma an\u00e1lise descritiva da ind\u00fastria dos estudos de opini\u00e3o p\u00fablica e de mercado no M\u00e9xico, as principais caracter\u00edsticas do mercado desde a perspetiva da oferta e a demanda, assim como a segmenta\u00e7\u00e3o do mercado por tipo de produto. A metodologia implementada consiste na aplica\u00e7\u00e3o de entrevistas a profundidade focadas aos v\u00e1rios setores, sendo eles: servidores p\u00fablicos, candidatos em elei\u00e7\u00f5es, assessores e estrategistas de campanha, especialistas acad\u00eamicos, diretores de \u00e1reas de gest\u00e3o de informa\u00e7\u00e3o e pesquisa no setor privado, tais como diretores de ag\u00eancias e consultores independentes em mat\u00e9ria de pesquisa de mercados e opini\u00e3o p\u00fablica. O resultado final tenta fornecer uma vis\u00e3o sobre a dimens\u00e3o, especializa\u00e7\u00e3o e profissionaliza\u00e7\u00e3o desta ind\u00fastria em constante auge no M\u00e9xico. Se apresentam os estudos de opini\u00e3o p\u00fablica e de mercado como uma ferramenta indispens\u00e1vel para a coleta de informa\u00e7\u00e3o, an\u00e1lise e tomada de decis\u00f5es, que permitem mensurar as prefer\u00eancias dos requerentes em qualquer \u00e2mbito. Da mesma forma que mostra, explica e analisa qual \u00e9 a rela\u00e7\u00e3o e o grau de import\u00e2ncia deles;a sua import\u00e2ncia se fundamenta em que nos \u00faltimos anos, entraram em vigor diversos segmentos do mercado, como o eleitoral, o p\u00fablico e o privado, entre outros. ; El objetivo del presente trabajo comprende la realizaci\u00f3n de un an\u00e1lisis descriptivo de la industria de los estudios de opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica y de mercado en M\u00e9xico, las principales caracter\u00edsticas del mercado desde la perspectiva de la oferta y la demanda, as\u00ed como la segmentaci\u00f3n del mercado por tipo de producto. La metodolog\u00eda implementada consiste en la aplicaci\u00f3n de entrevistas a profundidad enfocadas a diversos sectores, como son: servidores p\u00fablicos, candidatos en comicios electorales, asesores y estrategas de campa\u00f1a, expertos acad\u00e9micos, directores de \u00e1reas de gesti\u00f3n de informaci\u00f3n e investigaci\u00f3n en el sector privado, tales como directores de agencias y consultores independientes en materia de investigaci\u00f3n de mercados y opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica. El resultado final trata de ofrecer una visi\u00f3n acerca de la dimensi\u00f3n, especializaci\u00f3n y profesionalizaci\u00f3n de esta industria en constante auge en M\u00e9xico. Se presentan a los estudios de opini\u00f3n p\u00fablica y de mercado como una herramienta indispensable para la recolecci\u00f3n de informaci\u00f3n, an\u00e1lisis y toma de decisiones, que permiten medir las preferencias de los demandantes en cualquier \u00e1mbito. Del mismo modo que muestra, explica y analiza cu\u00e1l es la relaci\u00f3n y el grado de importancia que emanan de ellos; su importancia radica que en los \u00faltimos a\u00f1os, han cobrado vigencia en diversos segmentos del mercado, como lo son el electoral, el p\u00fablico y el privado, entre otros.","published_in":"Revista de la SEECI, ISSN 1576-3420, N\u00ba. 52, 2020, pags. 95-117","year":"2020","subject_orig":"opinion study; electoral preferences; market segmentation; electoral marketing; exit surveys; offer; demand; estudio de opini\u00f3n; preferencias electorales; segmentaci\u00f3n de mercado; mercadotecnia electoral; encuestas de salida; oferta; demanda; estudo de opini\u00e3o; prefer\u00eancias eleitorais; segmenta\u00e7\u00e3o de mercado; marketing eleitoral; sondagens","subject":"opinion study; electoral preferences; market segmentation; electoral marketing; exit surveys; offer; demand; estudio de opini\u00f3n; preferencias electorales; segmentaci\u00f3n de mercado; mercadotecnia electoral; encuestas de salida; oferta; demanda; estudo de opini\u00e3o; prefer\u00eancias eleitorais; segmenta\u00e7\u00e3o de mercado; marketing eleitoral; sondagens","authors":"Zarzosa Codocedo, Alejandra; Cota Ya\u00f1ez, Rosario; Rodr\u00edguez Cota, Ulises","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504213","oa_state":"2","url":"44a30c7b1295f7658fbb83a63cd3beaf0fc6ee634070d7195fa4b4b90ce2cbda","relevance":29},{"id":"61aa06a86c7645fa85a47d511c5305619105343a4a85f316817d5333334234a5","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504216; (Revista) ISSN 1576-3420","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504216","title":"Uso de redes sociales digitales como estrategia de mercadotecnia en pymes pirot\u00e9cnicas de Tultepec en el estado de M\u00e9xico","paper_abstract":"The use of digital social media (DSM) as a marketing strategy has become a fundamental practice for companies around the world. In Mexico, 99.8% of enterprises are small and medium-sized (SMEs) and, despite their importance, there is little literature on the use of DSM as a marketing strategy in Mexican SMEs. Also, the pyrotechnic industry of Tultepec, State of Mexico, produces 50% of the national pyrotechnics, employs up to 60% of the local population and is composed mainly of SMEs. Given the relevance of this production system, the objective of this piece of research is to determine the percentage of Tultepec pyrotechnics companies that use DSM as a marketing strategy, the main uses they are given and, in their absence, the reasons for not using them. To this end, questionnaires were applied to the owners of various companies in the pyrotechnics production chain (raw material stores, manufacturers and intermediaries) and it was found that only 15% of respondents use DSM as a marketing strategy and use them mainly to position the brand and reach larger audiences. Finally, it was found that the main reason for not using them is the insecurity and experiences related to crime. The results obtained show the need for a training strategy for business owners that leads to a safe and effective use of DSM as a marketing tool. ; O uso das redes sociais digitais (RSD) como estrat\u00e9gia de marketing se converteu numa pr\u00e1tica fundamental para as empresas do mundo inteiro. No M\u00e9xico, o 99.8% das empresas s\u00e3o de pequeno e m\u00e9dio porte (PME) e, apesar da sua import\u00e2ncia, existe pouca literatura sobre o uso de RSD como estrat\u00e9gia de marketing nas PME mexicanas. Da mesma forma, a ind\u00fastria pirot\u00e9cnica de Tultepec, Edo. do M\u00e9x., produz 50% da pirotecnia nacional, emprega at\u00e9 60% da popula\u00e7\u00e3o local e se comp\u00f5e principalmente por PME. Dada \u00e0 relev\u00e2ncia deste sistema produtivo, o objetivo da pesquisa \u00e9 determinar o grau de acolhimento das RSD como estrat\u00e9gia de marketing por parte das empresas pirot\u00e9cnicas de Tultepec, os principais usos que eles lhes d\u00e3o e, na sua falta, os motivos para n\u00e3o usa-as. Para isto, se aplicaram question\u00e1rios aos donos de diversas empresas da cadeia produtiva de pirotecnia (lojas de mat\u00e9rias-primas, fabricantes e intermedi\u00e1rios) e se descobriu que somente 15% dos entrevistados usam RSD como estrat\u00e9gia de marketing e as utilizam, principalmente para o posicionamento da marca e para conseguir maiores audi\u00eancias. Finalmente, se encontrou que a principal motiva\u00e7\u00e3o para n\u00e3o utiliz\u00e1-las \u00e9 a inseguran\u00e7a e experi\u00eancias relacionadas com a delinqu\u00eancia. Os resultados obtidos, mostram a necessidade de uma estrat\u00e9gia de capacita\u00e7\u00e3o para os empres\u00e1rios que leve ao uso seguro e eficaz das RSD como ferramenta de marketing. ; El uso de redes sociales digitales (RSD) como estrategia de mercadotecnia se ha convertido en una pr\u00e1ctica fundamental para las empresas de todo el mundo. En M\u00e9xico, el 99.8% de las empresas son de tama\u00f1o peque\u00f1o y mediano (pymes) y, pese a su importancia, existe poca literatura sobre el uso de RSD como estrategia de mercadotecnia en las pymes mexicanas. Asimismo, la industria pirot\u00e9cnica de Tultepec, Edo. de M\u00e9x., produce el 50% de la pirot\u00e9cnica nacional, emplea hasta el 60% de la poblaci\u00f3n local y se compone principalmente por pymes. Dada la relevancia de este sistema productivo, el objetivo de la investigaci\u00f3n es determinar el grado de adopci\u00f3n de RSD como estrategia de mercadotecnia por parte de las empresas pirot\u00e9cnicas de Tultepec, los principales usos que les dan y, en su ausencia, las razones para no utilizarlas. Para ello, se aplicaron cuestionarios a los due\u00f1os de diversas empresas del encadenamiento productivo de pirotecnia (tiendas de materias primas, fabricantes e intermediarios) y se encontr\u00f3 que s\u00f3lo el 15% de los encuestados utilizan RSD como estrategia de mercadotecnia y las utilizan, principalmente para el posicionamiento de la marca y alcanzar mayores audiencias. Finalmente, se encontr\u00f3 que la principal raz\u00f3n para no utilizarlas es la inseguridad y experiencias relacionadas con la delincuencia. Los resultados obtenidos, exhiben la necesidad de una estrategia de capacitaci\u00f3n para los empresarios que conduzca a un uso seguro y eficaz de RSD como herramienta de mercadotecnia.","published_in":"Revista de la SEECI, ISSN 1576-3420, N\u00ba. 52, 2020, pags. 73-93","year":"2020","subject_orig":"digital social media; uses; marketing; Mexico; pyrotechnics; smes; insecurity; redes sociales digitales; usos; mercadotecnia; M\u00e9xico; pirotecnia; pymes; inseguridad; redes sociais digitais; PME; inseguran\u00e7a","subject":"digital social media; uses; marketing; Mexico; pyrotechnics; smes; insecurity; redes sociales digitales; usos; mercadotecnia; M\u00e9xico; pirotecnia; pymes; inseguridad; redes sociais digitais; PME; inseguran\u00e7a","authors":"Villag\u00f3mez Manrique, Alan Roberto; Acosta Gonzaga, Elizabeth","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7504216","oa_state":"2","url":"61aa06a86c7645fa85a47d511c5305619105343a4a85f316817d5333334234a5","relevance":28},{"id":"5fa2c22e4948fc8bdf8b6e79cf5e3e66ffd9cd957770eb1eea121d42329cc7af","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528373; (Revista) ISSN 2256-1536","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528373","title":"La comunicaci\u00f3n de marketing en el comportamiento del consumidor para las organizaciones: revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de literatura","paper_abstract":"This article aims to gather information referred to Marketing communication in consumer behavior for organizations, is based on a systematic review of the literature and an analysis of trends, through the exploration of databases of EBSCOhost\u00ae, Scopus\u00ae and Web of Science\u00ae; These allowed to identify 71 articles. The software will be used as MAXQDA\u00ae which will use a qualitative analysis of the results; In the same way, VOSviewer\u00ae software was used to make frequency maps and keyword matches. Results were obtained that had that this theme is of great importance for organizations. Likewise, it is evident that Marketing communication is a key factor for the generation of value and also an important tool to promote competitiveness. ; Este art\u00edculo tiene como objetivo recopilar informaci\u00f3n referida a la comunicaci\u00f3n de Marketing en el comportamiento del consumidor para las organizaciones. Se sustenta en una revisi\u00f3n sistem\u00e1tica de la literatura y un an\u00e1lisis de tendencias, mediante la exploraci\u00f3n de bases de datos de EBSCOhost\u00ae, Scopus\u00ae y Web of Science\u00ae; esto permitio identificar 71 art\u00edculos. Se utilizaron Software como MAXQDA\u00ae, el cual permiti\u00f3 realizar un an\u00e1lisis cualitativo de los resultados; de igual modo se emple\u00f3 el Software VOSviewer\u00ae para la realizaci\u00f3n de mapas de frecuencias y de co-ocurrencias de las palabras clave. Se obtienen resultados que demuestran que esta tem\u00e1tica es de gran importancia para las organizaciones. As\u00ed mismo, se evidenci\u00f3 que la comunicaci\u00f3n de Marketing es un factor clave para la generaci\u00f3n de valor y adem\u00e1suna herramienta importante para promover la competitividad.","published_in":"Bolet\u00edn Redipe, ISSN 2256-1536, Vol. 9, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Training and political, alternative, intercultural and social education), pags. 174-183","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Communication; Commercialization; Consumer behavior; Management of brand; Advertising; Comunicaci\u00f3n; Comercializaci\u00f3n; Comportamiento del consumidor; Gesti\u00f3n de marca; Publicidad","subject":"Communication; Commercialization; Consumer behavior; Management of brand; Advertising; Comunicaci\u00f3n; Comercializaci\u00f3n; Comportamiento del consumidor; Gesti\u00f3n de marca; Publicidad","authors":"Virg\u00fcez, Jonathan F.; S\u00e1nchez Pineda, Diana Carolina; Rodr\u00edguez Suancha, Sergio Armando","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7528373","oa_state":"2","url":"5fa2c22e4948fc8bdf8b6e79cf5e3e66ffd9cd957770eb1eea121d42329cc7af","relevance":27},{"id":"83aea4837ce1c85524dbfa0f9aa2d70dd49c280ace640b2c7f6b08b2f653fb29","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554570; (Revista) ISSN 2255-2715","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554570","title":"Religion and companies: the keys for doing business in the Islam","paper_abstract":"The aim of this research has been to analyze empirically the internal demand and its future evolution, as well as whether and how the Spanish retailers are currently satisfying the needs of Muslim residents in Spain. There are numerous articles about the great market potential Halal as the result of growth of the Muslim population and the expected future growth of the population. These studies in Spain are based on the great potential of Spanish manufacturers to increase their sales through exports, finance and tourism. Once reviewed the existing bibliography, we have not found any research that covers our topic. It will bring managerial implications in the areas of innovation, production, distribution and marketing that will guide and orientate the decisions thatmanufactures, distributors, commercial managers or other operators can make in the retail market. This research has also identified an interesting opportunity in adapting retailer\u2019s assortment to a segment of the population that is increasingly concerned by Halal products in each act of consumption. The main retailers Mercadona, Carrefour, Dia and Auchan, should include products with the Halal Guarantee to identify products that satisfy the requirements of the Halal Guarantee Islamic Law. This paper has been organized as follows: First, we explain the retail market in Spain. Second, we extrapolate population and consumption to 2050. Later we explain the methodology and results. And, after summarizing the conclusions, we discuss the limitations. Lastly, we present future lines of research. ; El objetivo de esta investigaci\u00f3n ha sido analizar emp\u00edricamente la demanda interna y su evoluci\u00f3n futura, tanto como si, y de qu\u00e9 forma, los minoristas espa\u00f1oles satisfacen actualmente las necesidades de los residentes musulmanes en Espa\u00f1a. Hay numerosos art\u00edculos sobre el gran potencial del mercado Halal como resultado del crecimiento de la poblaci\u00f3n musulmana y el crecimiento futuro esperado de la poblaci\u00f3n. Estos estudios en Espa\u00f1a se basan en el gran potencial de los fabricantes espa\u00f1oles para aumentar sus ventas a trav\u00e9s de las exportaciones, las finanzas y el turismo. Una vez revisada la bibliograf\u00eda existente, no hemos encontrado ninguna investigaci\u00f3n que cubra nuestro idea. Sus conclusiones traer\u00e1n implicaciones administrativas en las \u00e1reas de innovaci\u00f3n, producci\u00f3n, distribuci\u00f3n y comercializaci\u00f3n que guiar\u00e1n y orientar\u00e1n las decisiones que los fabricantes, distribuidores, gerentes comerciales u otros operadores puedan tomar en el mercado minorista. Esta investigaci\u00f3n tambi\u00e9n ha identificado una oportunidad interesante para adaptar el surtido de minoristas a un segmento de la poblaci\u00f3n que est\u00e1 cada vez m\u00e1s preocupada por los productos Halal en cada acto de consumo. Los principales minoristas Mercadona, Carrefour, Dia y Auchan deben incluir productos con la Garant\u00eda Halal para identificar productos que cumplan con los requisitos de la Ley Isl\u00e1mica de Garant\u00eda Halal. Este documento se ha organizado de la siguiente manera: En primer lugar, explicamos el mercado minorista en Espa\u00f1a. En segundo lugar, extrapolamos la poblaci\u00f3n y el consumo a 2050. M\u00e1s adelante explicamos la metodolog\u00eda y los resultados. Y, luego de resumir las conclusiones, discutimos las limitaciones. Por \u00faltimo, presentamos futuras l\u00edneas de investigaci\u00f3n.","published_in":"Journal of the sociology and theory of religion, ISSN 2255-2715, N\u00ba. 9, 2020","year":"2020","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Castillo Puente, Angel Maria del; De Pablo Carrera, Alejandro","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554570","oa_state":"2","url":"83aea4837ce1c85524dbfa0f9aa2d70dd49c280ace640b2c7f6b08b2f653fb29","relevance":26},{"id":"bfe35724a1f92688e8f41a1dfc28c558750a43bfca8a1daa3489c2e8e8e325ea","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554345; (Revista) ISSN 2550-682X","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554345","title":"Gesti\u00f3n de marca en redes sociales como herramienta para posicionar peque\u00f1as y medianas empresas en Internet","paper_abstract":"Internet se ha convertido de a poco en el enlace m\u00e1s importante para que una persona interesada en un producto o servicio pueda contactar con una gran cantidad de ofertantes en diferentes partes del mundo. La presente investigaci\u00f3n propone una metodolog\u00eda que permite administrar cada uno de los contenidos que se suben a las redes sociales, la periodicidad y de forma significativamente importante los contenidos que deben crearse para cumplir las expectativas comerciales que persiguen las empresas. Siguiendo el modelo de marketing digital y los principios de dise\u00f1o gr\u00e1fico la metodolog\u00eda de dise\u00f1o y posicionamiento en Internet creada, permite posicionar en los primeros lugares de las principales redes sociales a una peque\u00f1a y mediana empresa (PYME) que sin contar con altos recursos econ\u00f3micos logra competir directamente con las grandes empresas. Siguiendo el m\u00e9todo cient\u00edfico y el dise\u00f1o cuasi experimental se logr\u00f3 determinar el proceso adecuado de desarrollo de la investigaci\u00f3n, con el grupo de estudio conformado por los usuarios de la PYME, los equipos de c\u00f3mputo, las herramientas digitales, las t\u00e9cnicas de observaci\u00f3n, entrevistas y encuestas, la metodolog\u00eda planteada facilita la creaci\u00f3n y posicionamiento del sitio web y las redes sociales de Imprenta Gutenberg ubicada en la ciudad de Riobamba logrando incrementar su presencia en Internet al aumentar en un 40% el n\u00famero de leads en las redes sociales de contacto (Facebook, Twitter e Instagram) y un posicionamiento del 100% en el sitio web, ubicando a la PYME en los primeros lugares de los resultados de b\u00fasqueda de uno de los navegadores m\u00e1s utilizados.","published_in":"Polo del Conocimiento: Revista cient\u00edfico - profesional, ISSN 2550-682X, Vol. 5, N\u00ba. 8, 2020, pags. 906-928","year":"2020","subject_orig":"PYME; posicionamiento; gesti\u00f3n de marca; redes sociales","subject":"PYME; posicionamiento; gesti\u00f3n de marca; redes sociales","authors":"Duque Vaca, Miguel \u00c1ngel; L\u00f3pez Chiriboga, Mar\u00eda Alexandra; Ramos Jim\u00e9nez, Rosa Bel\u00e9n; Isin Vilema, Manuel David","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7554345","oa_state":"2","url":"bfe35724a1f92688e8f41a1dfc28c558750a43bfca8a1daa3489c2e8e8e325ea","relevance":25},{"id":"c4d150d622086506b8a467584fa73b226b00d0705ad14208d6169ada37df8714","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7590698; (Revista) ISSN 0327-5841; (Revista) ISSN 1851-1732","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7590698","title":"Potencialidades para el turismo cultural: el caso de La Habana","paper_abstract":"Havana, Potentialities for Cultural Tourism Development. Nowadays, Havana has become one of the most visited city in the Caribbean Region, and receives more than a half of the annual tourism arrivals in Cuba. There is a public recognition of the huge potential of the cultural heritage that the city offers, as well as its importance for the needed touristic diversification of the country, although there is limited knowledge about the market and the sector, which justify the present research. The study aims at analysing the profile of tourists visiting Havana as a cultural destination, their motivation and evaluation of the destination as a cultural site. The comparative analysis of six sampling groups of different nationalities allows to elaborate useful recommendations for tourism managers, with the final aim of contributing to the efficient design of positioning and loyalty strategies of Havana and other several destinations in the Caribbean region. ; La Habana se ha posicionado como un destino l\u00edder en el Caribe, recibiendo actualmente m\u00e1s de la mitad del total de visitantes extranjeros que llegan a Cuba. La estrategia tur\u00edstica del pa\u00eds se ha sustentado hasta hoy en los atractivos de las playas y el clima, por su condici\u00f3n de isla caribe\u00f1a. A\u00fan cuando se reconoce al patrimonio cultural como un recurso diferenciador del destino y creador de valor, y se han puesto en pr\u00e1ctica iniciativas para su promoci\u00f3n, hay un limitado conocimiento sobre el sector y la demanda actual, lo que afecta al desarrollo de La Habana como destino cultural. Este trabajo tiene como prop\u00f3sito analizar el perfil de los turistas que visitan La Habana como destino cultural, su valoraci\u00f3n del destino, la fidelidad, y las preferencias respecto a \u00e9ste y otros destinos culturales. Se han encuestado a 1500 turistas de los seis pa\u00edses emisores principales de turismo a Cuba, lo que ha permitido identificar el potencial que ofrecen estos mercados para el dise\u00f1o de productos y experiencias culturales, as\u00ed como para distinguir las \u00e1reas que deben recibir los esfuerzos de marketing de cara a la fidelizaci\u00f3n de la demanda. El estudio ofrece recomendaciones \u00fatiles para contribuir a una gesti\u00f3n tur\u00edstica m\u00e1s sostenible de los recursos culturales en la regi\u00f3n caribe\u00f1a.","published_in":"Estudios y perspectivas en turismo, ISSN 1851-1732, Vol. 29, N\u00ba. 4, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Turismo y Desarrollo), pags. 1197-1214","year":"2020","subject_orig":"La Habana; destino cultural; preferencias; fidelidad; valoraci\u00f3n; Havana; cultural destination; tourist preferences; loyalty; tourist valuation","subject":"La Habana; destino cultural; preferencias; fidelidad; valoraci\u00f3n; Havana; cultural destination; tourist preferences; loyalty; tourist valuation","authors":"Cruz Sosa, Niurka; Lam Gonz\u00e1lez, Yen El\u00edzabeth","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7590698","oa_state":"2","url":"c4d150d622086506b8a467584fa73b226b00d0705ad14208d6169ada37df8714","relevance":24},{"id":"627001ee64466a3a672be0a144efdeb55a9c4d959e4aeab1c8ca444758df6e2e","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7597638; (Revista) ISSN 2173-1276","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7597638","title":"L\u2019agricultura com a motor de desenvolupament local de pego (alacant). Possibles alternatives","paper_abstract":"En aquest treball s\u2019ha estudiat l\u2019evoluci\u00f3 de l\u2019activitat agr\u00edcola en la localitat de Pego (Marina Alta) fins avui en dia i com ha afectat socioecon\u00f2micament en la configuraci\u00f3 del municipi. S\u2019ha centrat sobretot en els problemes globals i locals que provoquen una crisi del sector, aix\u00ed com el plantejament d\u2019una s\u00e8rie d\u2019alternatives per rendibilitzar l\u2019agricultura centrades a beneficiar la poblaci\u00f3 local. ; In this work there has been studied the evolution of the agricultural activity in Pego (Marina Alta) until today, and how it has affected socioeconomically in the configuration of the municipality. It has focused on global and local problems that cause a crisis in the sector, as well as the proposal of alternatives with the objective of making profitable agriculture focused on benefiting the local population. ; En este trabajo se ha estudiado la evoluci\u00f3n de la actividad agr\u00edcola en la localidad de Pego (Marina Alta) hasta el d\u00eda de hoy y como ha afectado socioecon\u00f3micamente en la configuraci\u00f3n del municipio. Se ha centrado en los problemas globales y locales que provocan una crisis del sector, as\u00ed como el planteamiento de alternativas con el objetivo de rentabilizar la agricultura centrado en beneficiar a la poblaci\u00f3n local.","published_in":"GeoGraphos: Revista Digital para Estudiantes de Geograf\u00eda y Ciencias Sociales, ISSN 2173-1276, Vol. 11, N\u00ba. 126, 2020, pags. 99-132","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Pego; crisi citr\u00edcola; canals curts de comercialitzaci\u00f3; producte local; globalitzaci\u00f3 de l\u2019agricultura; crisis citr\u00edcola; canales cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n; producto local; globalizaci\u00f3n de la agricultura; citrus crisis; short marketing channels; local product; globalization of agriculture","subject":"Pego; crisi citr\u00edcola; canals curts de comercialitzaci\u00f3; producte local; globalitzaci\u00f3 de l\u2019agricultura; crisis citr\u00edcola; canales cortos de comercializaci\u00f3n; producto local; globalizaci\u00f3n de la agricultura; citrus crisis; short marketing channels; local product; globalization of agriculture","authors":"Pons Sendra, Guillem","link":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7597638","oa_state":"2","url":"627001ee64466a3a672be0a144efdeb55a9c4d959e4aeab1c8ca444758df6e2e","relevance":23},{"id":"fd2736ae4c9bdc6171fba9f5a42949d019aff922095a3b0a5f4fd33070f9f958","relation":"http:\/\/dra.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/dra\/article\/view\/856\/945; http:\/\/dra.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/dra\/article\/view\/856\/946; http:\/\/dra.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/dra\/article\/view\/856\/947; Abella Grac\u00e9s, Silvia, Sophie Gorgemans, \u00c1ngel Mart\u00ednez S\u00e1n\u00adchez y Manuela P\u00e9rez P\u00e9rez. 2004. \u00abImplications of the Internet-an Analysis of the Arogonese Hospitality Industry\u00bb. Journal of Destination Marketing & Ma\u00adnagement 8: 326-336.; http:\/\/dra.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/dra\/article\/view\/856; doi:10.3989\/dra.2020.001a","identifier":"http:\/\/dra.revistas.csic.es\/index.php\/dra\/article\/view\/856; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.3989\/dra.2020.001a","title":"Tourism, an Object of Study for Social Anthropology ; Turismo, un objeto de estudio para la antropolog\u00eda social","paper_abstract":"At the margins are opportunities for innovation and growth for social anthropology. And tourism was, forty years ago, one of those interstitial apparitions that anthropologists and anthropologists faced in their field research. Contributing later to its epistemological constitution, today it is recognized as an object of study, dynamic, transversal and continuously suggestive. This process has led to the involvement of anthropology in the transfer of its contributions to the institutional and business spheres, as well as to the social sphere. The tourist encounter, the image and the cultural heritage, are three of the subfields that show an important potential for job development in the short term. The adaptation and methodological renewal to understand the tourist system opens the future to the construction of scenarios and, with it, to predictive action on socio-economic and socio-cultural situations. ; En los m\u00e1rgenes est\u00e1n las oportunidades de innovaci\u00f3n y crecimiento para la antropolog\u00eda social. Y el turismo fue, hace ya cuarenta a\u00f1os, una de esas apariciones intersticiales a los que antrop\u00f3logos y antrop\u00f3logas se enfrentaron en sus investigacio\u00adnes de campo. Contribuyendo posteriormente a su constituci\u00f3n epistemol\u00f3gica, hoy se encuentra reconocido como objeto de estudio, din\u00e1mico, transversal y continuamente sugerente. Este proceso ha llevado a la implicaci\u00f3n de la antropolog\u00eda en la trans\u00adferencia de sus aportaciones al \u00e1mbito institucional y empresarial, adem\u00e1s del social. El encuentro tur\u00edstico, la imagen y el patri\u00admonio cultural, son tres de los subcampos que manifiestan un importante potencial de desarrollo laboral a corto plazo. La adap\u00adtaci\u00f3n y renovaci\u00f3n metodol\u00f3gica para comprender el sistema tur\u00edstico abre el futuro a la construcci\u00f3n de escenarios y, con ello, a la actuaci\u00f3n predictiva sobre situaciones socioecon\u00f3micas y socioculturales.","published_in":"Disparidades.
