Measuring and Evaluating \u201cAlteratively\u201d Communication, Development and Social Change ; Hacia una Econom\u00eda Pol\u00edtica Cr\u00edtica del indicador. Medir y evaluar \u201calterativamente\u201d la comunicaci\u00f3n, el desarrollo y el cambio social.","paper_abstract":"Is a critical political economy of indicators necessary? We came to this conclusion some years ago after analysing the indicators used to measure the social uses of Internet (Mar\u00ed, 2012). We were able to check how, in the reference reports, social and political uses of Internet took a secondary place. At the same time, analysis, practises and visions of antiglobalistic social movements were absent or invisible. It seems as if indicators had acquired a life of their own in these traditional reports, breaking away from reality \u2013especially from the social and political dimensions of reality\u2013, but this autonomization process has not been accompanied by a liberation from the capitalistic teleology that guides it. Therefore, it was necessary \u2013such was our approach\u2013 to repair this system of absences in a double sense. Firstly, through a theoretical and conceptual work, aimed to define new indicators, more \u201csocial\u201d and \u201cpolitical\u201d, that allow us to overcome our current shortcomings when measuring the citizen and social needs of the Internet. Secondly, opening up ways to overcome the reductionism of indicators conceived under the dominant mercantilistic logic. ; \u00bfEs necesaria una Econom\u00eda Pol\u00edtica Cr\u00edtica del indicador? Hace unos a\u00f1os lleg\u00e1bamos a esta conclusi\u00f3n, tras analizar los indicadores utilizados para medir los usos sociales de Internet (Mar\u00ed, 2012). Pod\u00edamos comprobar c\u00f3mo, en los informes de referencia, los usos sociales y pol\u00edticos de Internet ocupaban un lugar secundario. Al mismo tiempo, en ellos estaban ausentes e invisibilizados los an\u00e1lisis, las pr\u00e1cticas y las visiones de los movimientos sociales altermundialistas. Pareciera como si en estos informes al uso los indicadores hubiesen cobrado vida propia, independiz\u00e1ndose de lo real \u2013 especialmente de la dimensi\u00f3n social y pol\u00edtica de la realidad\u2013 sin que este proceso de autonomizaci\u00f3n fuese acompa\u00f1ado de una liberaci\u00f3n de la teleolog\u00eda capitalista que los orienta. Se hac\u00eda necesario, por tanto \u2013este era nuestro planteamiento\u2013 recomponer este sistema de ausencias, en un doble sentido. En primer lugar, mediante un trabajo te\u00f3rico y conceptual, dirigido a definir nuevos indicadores, m\u00e1s \u201csociales\u201d y \u201cpol\u00edticos\u201d, que permitan superar las carencias actuales en la medici\u00f3n de los usos ciudadanos y sociales de Internet. En segundo lugar, abriendo v\u00edas para la superaci\u00f3n del reduccionismo de los indicadores concebidos bajo la l\u00f3gica mercantilista dominante.","published_in":"Revista de Comunicaci\u00f3n y Ciudadan\u00eda Digital - COMMONS 2017 Vol. 6 N. 1 pp. 1-10","year":"2020-03-09T11:49:04Z","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Mar\u00ed S\u00e1ez, V\u00edctor Manuel","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10498\/22542","oa_state":"1","url":"2d6328609a6131622dec92061a3166607a150dde233e0de00d87a8db657bc364","relevance":20},{"id":"b6fcde44fce137a0485cc4eb0ac5fa77530b6b2b04f0d25085a3549ddc28d218","relation":"http:\/\/jurnal.um-tapsel.ac.id\/index.php\/martabe\/article\/view\/1428\/pdf; http:\/\/jurnal.um-tapsel.ac.id\/index.php\/martabe\/article\/view\/1428; doi:10.31604\/jpm.v3i1.132-138","identifier":"http:\/\/jurnal.um-tapsel.ac.id\/index.php\/martabe\/article\/view\/1428; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.31604\/jpm.v3i1.132-138","title":"SOSIALISASI BIDAI (TIRAI) MELALUI INTERNET DAN DIGITAL MARKETING DALAM UPAYA MENINGKATKAN EKONOMI MASYARAKAT DESA RANTAU DURIAN 1 KECAMATAN LEMPUING JAYA KABUPATEN OGAN KOMERING ILIR (OKI)","paper_abstract":"Today, technology has an essential role in economic progress, especially for small and large scale entrepreneurs. The utilization of technology is crucial to support the efficiency and effectiveness of sales. Urban communities only felt the presence of this technology but not for those who live in rural areas. The approach taken uses socialization about the importance of the role of the internet and digital marketing for the craftsmen of Palm oil palm midrib artisans in Rantau Durian 1 Village, Lempuing Jaya District, OKI Regency, South Sumatra. The results of the socialization gave a positive impression to the craftsmen. They gave a fresh breeze of their sustainability in the business of the palm fronds themselves, and their income hopes were far better than before knowing internet marketing. So far, the traditional marketing system where the craftsmen sell directly to the market using trucks, then it takes a long time to sell all of their merchandise.","published_in":"Martabe : Jurnal Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat; Vol 3, No 1 (2020): Martabe : Jurnal Pengabdian Kepada Masyarakat; 132-138 ; 2598-1226 ; 2598-1218 ; 10.31604\/jpm.v3i1","year":"2020-04-15","subject_orig":"Internet; Digital Marketing; Socialization","subject":"Internet; Digital Marketing; Socialization","authors":"Batin, Mail Hilian; Ulfa, Maria; Putra, Raihan Taneta; Marindah, Marindah; Sari, Novika","link":"http:\/\/jurnal.um-tapsel.ac.id\/index.php\/martabe\/article\/view\/1428","oa_state":"1","url":"b6fcde44fce137a0485cc4eb0ac5fa77530b6b2b04f0d25085a3549ddc28d218","relevance":19},{"id":"1613b1e2fe7c6ce3fc53cedad18ee78680c9127e136c7724e38d363ef8fc3931","relation":"https:\/\/periodicos.ufpe.br\/revistas\/cbr\/article\/view\/244238\/35279; Aaker, J. Management Decision, v. 38, n. 9, p. 662-669.; https:\/\/periodicos.ufpe.br\/revistas\/cbr\/article\/view\/244238","identifier":"https:\/\/periodicos.ufpe.br\/revistas\/cbr\/article\/view\/244238","title":"Relacionando Fun\u00e7\u00f5es das Marcas e Fatores de Influ\u00eancia Internos dos Usu\u00e1rios: Estudo netnogr\u00e1fico em comunidades virtuais","paper_abstract":"Conhecer as influ\u00eancias que determinam as escolhas dos consumidores \u00e9 primordial para que os profissionais de marketing possam propor estrat\u00e9gias \u00e0s organiza\u00e7\u00f5es. Um dos recursos para essa compreens\u00e3o est\u00e1 no entendimento das comunidades virtuais, dada sua import\u00e2ncia na contemporaneidade. Assim, este trabalho objetiva compreender as fun\u00e7\u00f5es das marcas e os fatores de influ\u00eancia internos para os usu\u00e1rios de comunidades virtuais de tr\u00eas grandes marcas. Para tanto, realizou-se uma pesquisa mista por meio de netnografia. Os dados foram obtidos de forma arquivais e extra\u00eddos por meio de question\u00e1rios nas comunidades virtuais, sendo submetidos \u00e0 an\u00e1lise de conte\u00fado e estat\u00edstica descritiva. Os resultados evidenciam que o posicionamento adequado das marcas propicia a percep\u00e7\u00e3o das fun\u00e7\u00f5es exercidas para seus usu\u00e1rios. Infere-se que as organiza\u00e7\u00f5es devem conhecer como as fun\u00e7\u00f5es de suas marcas s\u00e3o desempenhadas e como os consumidores se comportam perante elas, para que possam elaborar estrat\u00e9gias mais assertivas e obter maior retorno.","published_in":"CBR - Consumer Behavior Review; v. 4, n. 2 (2020): maio-agosto; 146-161 ; 2526-7884","year":"2020-05-14","subject_orig":"Marketing; Marcas; Netnografia; Fun\u00e7\u00f5es da marca; Fatores internos dos consumidores; Comunidades virtuais","subject":"Marketing; Marcas; Netnografia; Fun\u00e7\u00f5es da marca; Fatores internos dos consumidores; Comunidades virtuais","authors":"Maciel, Alan C\u00e9sar Souza; Cardoso, Jana\u00edna Gularte; Sousa J\u00fanior, Jo\u00e3o Henriques de","link":"https:\/\/periodicos.ufpe.br\/revistas\/cbr\/article\/view\/244238","oa_state":"1","url":"1613b1e2fe7c6ce3fc53cedad18ee78680c9127e136c7724e38d363ef8fc3931","relevance":18},{"id":"17620322c3366aef7f7d3f93bb5cfadbfc017b2da5d74f0c04f8992fd53d5981","relation":"https:\/\/latrama.fcpolit.unr.edu.ar\/index.php\/trama\/article\/view\/724\/490; 2314-2634; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/2133\/17988; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.35305\/lt.v24i1.724","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/2133\/17988; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.35305\/lt.v24i1.724","title":"Los deportistas de \u00e9lite como embajadores de marca en Chile : an\u00e1lisis de la estrategia de comunicaci\u00f3n en redes sociales de las nuevas generaciones en deportes minoritarios","paper_abstract":"En este art\u00edculo se presentan los resultados de una investigaci\u00f3n cualitativa encaminada a conocer qu\u00e9 relevancia adquiere para los deportistas y anunciantes la gesti\u00f3n de redes sociales como plataformas de comunicaci\u00f3n estrat\u00e9gica. Se trata de ofrecer una descripci\u00f3n, lo m\u00e1s pr\u00f3xima a la realidad, del nivel de planificaci\u00f3n de la comunicaci\u00f3n digital de los deportistas de \u00e9lite de nacionalidad chilena de disciplinas menos masivas, especialmente cuando se convierten en embajadores de alguna marca. Se emple\u00f3 el m\u00e9todo Delphi para lo que se cont\u00f3 con la colaboraci\u00f3n de siete profesionales referentes del mundo deportivo de Chile con roles diferentes dentro de la industria del deporte (cuatro deportistas nacionales, sport manager, agente de marketing de Adidas Chile, periodista especializado) con el objetivo de aproximarse y definir, a trav\u00e9s de opiniones de expertos en la materia, la estrategia comunicativa imperante en este contexto de an\u00e1lisis. Entre las conclusiones se puede destacar que este perfil de deportista gestiona \u201cespont\u00e1neamente\u201d sus redes sociales sin una estrategia comunicativa (ni econ\u00f3mica) de base, sin contemplar la posibilidad de desarrollar a largo plazo su propia marca personal que les permita mantener una relaci\u00f3n de cobranding con los anunciantes que les patrocinan, interesados cada vez m\u00e1s en este tipo de relaci\u00f3n comercial. ; This paper shows the results of a qualitative research project aimed to know what importance the sportsmen and advertisers give to the management of social net works as strategic communication plat forms. There is the intention of offering a description, the most closed to reality, about the level of the communication media planning in the Chilean athletes from less massive disciplines, especially when they turn into brand ambassadors. We employed the Delphi Scientific method with seven referents of the sportive world of Chile with different professional vocations (four national athletes, sport manager, marketing agent of Adidas Chile, sportive journalist) to generate a discussion about the communicative strategy from diverse perspectives. The results indicate that the sportsmen manage spontaneously their social net works, without contemplating the possibility of developing their own personal brand that allow them to keep a cobranding relationship with advertisers that sponsor them, who are really interested in this type of commercial exchange. ; Fil: De Ferrari, Sebasti\u00e1n. Universidad de los Andes; Chile.","published_in":"","year":"2020-01","subject_orig":"Deportes; Marketing; Redes sociales; Marca personal; Patrocinio deportivo; Cobranding; Chile","subject":"Deportes; Marketing; Redes sociales; Marca personal; Patrocinio deportivo; Cobranding; Chile","authors":"De Ferrari, Sebasti\u00e1n; Feijoo, Beatriz; Guerrero, Juan Jos\u00e9","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/2133\/17988","oa_state":"1","url":"17620322c3366aef7f7d3f93bb5cfadbfc017b2da5d74f0c04f8992fd53d5981","relevance":17},{"id":"da399010d2ec7eddcc1c30d86e9c4ff3ac2ac24944bfbf16e02020fe3c99d087","relation":"http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/view\/1658\/1213; http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/view\/1658\/1216; http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/1658\/667; http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/downloadSuppFile\/1658\/668; http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/view\/1658","identifier":"http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/view\/1658","title":"Impacto de la publicidad radial en las audiencias millennials","paper_abstract":"Ecuador siempre ha tenido por h\u00e1bito escuchar la radio, existen 647 emisoras tanto en frecuencia AM y FM. Ambato por ser una ciudad comercial, la rivalidad entre empresas es intensa, cada una busca su notoriedad y muchas tratan a trav\u00e9s de los mensajes publicitarios llegar a sus audiencias meta, aumentar ventas y mejorar su posicionamiento. Con un mercado de 23 639 radioyentes de frecuencia FM, el 66 % conforman el grupo de la generaci\u00f3n millennial. La tecnolog\u00eda forma parte de su vida, migraron de la era anal\u00f3gica hacia la digital, lo que condujo a plantear como objetivo de investigaci\u00f3n determinar el impacto de la publicidad radial en las audiencias millenials. La medici\u00f3n del impacto de la publicidad se la hizo mediante la recordaci\u00f3n, en tres variables: alcance, frecuencia y afinidad. El m\u00e9todo de investigaci\u00f3n aplicado fue de car\u00e1cter mixto, con t\u00e9cnicas cuali-cuantitativas tales como la revisi\u00f3n bibliogr\u00e1fica- documental, encuesta y utilizaci\u00f3n de t\u00e9cnicas estad\u00edsticas para el procesamiento de la informaci\u00f3n, se expusieron ciertas marcas y anuncios de la localidad a estos grupos, para medir la recordaci\u00f3n en sus tres variables y se obtuvo la audiencia por nivel socio-econ\u00f3mico, audiencia por sexo, audiencia por g\u00e9nero musical preferido, y por bloques horarios. La radio es un buen medio para mantenerse informado, y puede ser aprovechada de mejor manera. La baja recordaci\u00f3n, estuvo determinada por marcas, productos o instituciones de d\u00e9bil posicionamiento, concluyendo que el dinero invertido en anuncios publicitarios radiales, son ineficientes cuando no pertenecen a un plan integrado de marketing.","published_in":"UNIANDES EPISTEME; Vol. 7, N\u00fam. 3 (2020): julio - septiembre (01\/07\/2020); 350-363 ; 1390-9150","year":"2020-07-07","subject_orig":"Millennials; radioyentes; impacto de la publicidad; eficacia","subject":"Millennials; radioyentes; impacto de la publicidad; eficacia","authors":"Ch\u00e1vez Y\u00e9pez, Howard Fabi\u00e1n; Escobar Almeida, Carlos Enrique","link":"http:\/\/45.238.216.13\/ojs\/index.php\/EPISTEME\/article\/view\/1658","oa_state":"1","url":"da399010d2ec7eddcc1c30d86e9c4ff3ac2ac24944bfbf16e02020fe3c99d087","relevance":16},{"id":"5173dd577b442eca72dbfbbef786b315b508193cd23be052be5ad716edbef4db","relation":"https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560\/320; https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560; doi:10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2.560","identifier":"https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2.560","title":"\u201cBATIK\u201d BUSINESS PRODUCTS AMONG BEFORE AND AFTER USING A DIGITAL MARKETING SYSTEM","paper_abstract":"The purpose of this research is to analyze which batik business groups experienced the highest increase in competitiveness and product sales results and how to increase competitiveness and product sales results among before and after using a digital marketing system at one of the batik entrepreneurs. This research uses a comparative approach by analyzing the increase in the highest competitiveness and product sales results and analyze the highest competitiveness and product sales results before and after using the Digital Marketing System. The approach taken by using a questionnaire in accordance with 24 indicator variables. The study was conducted on 4 (four) Batik Business Groups in Kediri City, including Wecono Asri, Dermo, Numansa and Galuh by involving the leaders of the Batik Business Group on the company's competitiveness and product sales before and after using a digital marketing system in March and July 2019. This research technique enabled the researcher to draw conclusions based on the characteristics of respondents regarding increasing company competitiveness and product sales results. The result of this research is Batik Numansa has a higher competitiveness and sales product increase compared to Batik Wecono Asri, Dermo and Galuh. The increase in competitiveness and sales product of Batik Numansa after using a digital marketing system is higher than before using a digital marketing system Keywords : Competitiveness, Sales Result, Batik, Bussiness Product, Digital Marketing System","published_in":"SEIKO : Journal of Management & Business; Vol 3, No 2 (2020): January-Juny; 101-113 ; 2598-831X ; 2598-8301 ; 10.37531\/sejaman.v3i2","year":"2020-04-12","subject_orig":"","subject":"","authors":"Ambarwati, Diana; Nadhiroh, Umi","link":"https:\/\/journal.stieamkop.ac.id\/index.php\/seiko\/article\/view\/560","oa_state":"1","url":"5173dd577b442eca72dbfbbef786b315b508193cd23be052be5ad716edbef4db","relevance":15},{"id":"6cc4f755c3c969fc31c0703d7e69837e16fe98771fdbb1daaaec3f37885bd76f","relation":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7511955; (Revista) ISSN 1794-7154","identifier":"https:\/\/dialnet.unirioja.es\/servlet\/oaiart?codigo=7511955","title":"La gesti\u00f3n de mercadeo en los empresarios del caribe colombiano 1900-1950: un an\u00e1lisis historiogr\u00e1fico","paper_abstract":"The objective of this article is to describe the characteristics of the marketing management applied by the entrepreneurs of the Colombian Caribbean in the period 1900-1950. The implemented research methodology used exclusively secondary sources of information consisting of the life stories of entrepreneurs Daniel Lemaitre, Diego Mart\u00ednez Camargo, the V\u00e9lez Dan\u00edes brothers, Jos\u00e9 Vicente Mogoll\u00f3n, the Pombo brothers, Evaristo Obreg\u00f3n, Rafael del Castillo, and the Rom\u00e1n family. Each of these cases (entrepreneurs) constituted a unit of analysis; information processing was carried out through a triangulation of methods: bibliographic records, thematic analysis matrices and lexicometric tables (text mining), which sought to identify dimensions of the marketing variable as product, price, promotion, and distribution. We can conclude from the fndings that the marketing management applied by the entrepreneurs studied emphasized sales management, pricing, and distribution, which fts into the periods of identifcation and functionalist of marketing development (1900 - 1945). ; El objetivo de este art\u00edculo es describir las caracter\u00edsticas de la gesti\u00f3n de mercadeo que aplicaron los empresarios del caribe colombiano en el periodo 1900-1950. La metodolog\u00eda de la investigaci\u00f3n que se implement\u00f3 utiliz\u00f3 en su totalidad fuentes de informaci\u00f3n secundarias consistentes en las historias de vida de los empresarios Daniel Lemaitre, Diego Mart\u00ednez Camargo, los hermanos V\u00e9lez Dan\u00edes, Jos\u00e9 Vicente Mogoll\u00f3n, los hermanos Pombo, Evaristo Obreg\u00f3n, Rafael del Castillo y la familia Rom\u00e1n. Cada uno de estos casos (empresario) constituy\u00f3 una unidad de an\u00e1lisis; el procesamiento de la informaci\u00f3n se efectu\u00f3 a trav\u00e9s de una triangulaci\u00f3n de m\u00e9todos: fchas bibliogr\u00e1fcas, matrices de an\u00e1lisis tem\u00e1tico y tablas lexicom\u00e9tricas (miner\u00eda de textos). Con estos se pretend\u00eda identifcar dimensiones de la variable mercadeo como producto, precio, promoci\u00f3n y distribuci\u00f3n. Los hallazgos indicaron que Daniel Lemaitre se enfoc\u00f3 en la gerencia de marcas, la propaganda, las ventas, y los empaques; Diego Mart\u00ednez Camargo se centr\u00f3 en el desarrollo de productos, la segmentaci\u00f3n de mercados, la gerencia de ventas, y la fjaci\u00f3n de precios; los V\u00e9lez Dan\u00edes hicieron \u00e9nfasis en la gesti\u00f3n de ventas; J.V. Mogoll\u00f3n enfatiz\u00f3 la fjaci\u00f3n de precios, la gesti\u00f3n de productos, y la distribuci\u00f3n; los Pombo se centraron en la gesti\u00f3n de ventas y la promoci\u00f3n; Evaristo Obreg\u00f3n se enfoc\u00f3 en la gesti\u00f3n de ventas, y Rafael del Castillo y Manuel Rom\u00e1n se concentraron en la gerencia de ventas. En conclusi\u00f3n, la gesti\u00f3n de mercadeo que aplicaron los empresarios estudiados dio \u00e9nfasis a la gerencia de ventas, la fjaci\u00f3n de precios y la distribuci\u00f3n, lo cual encaja en los periodos de identifcaci\u00f3n y funcionalista (1900 - 1950) del desarrollo del marketing.","published_in":"Saber, ciencia y libertad, ISSN 1794-7154, Vol. 15, N\u00ba. 1, 2020 (Ejemplar dedicado a: Revista Saber, Ciencia y Libertad), pags. 95-104","year":"2020","subject_orig":"An\u00e1lisis historiogr\u00e1fico; The role of real time marketing on brands: \u201cgame of thrones\u201d example","paper_abstract":"21. y\u00fczy\u0131l, insanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n teknoloji bak\u0131m\u0131ndan en b\u00fcy\u00fck ad\u0131mlar\u0131 att\u0131\u011f\u0131, teknoloji kullan\u0131m\u0131n\u0131n toplumsal tabana yay\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131 bir y\u00fczy\u0131l olmu\u015ftur. \u00dclkeler ve bloklar aras\u0131 m\u00fccadelenin ya\u015fand\u0131\u011f\u0131 d\u00f6nemde geli\u015ftirilen ileti\u015fim teknolojileri, zaman i\u00e7erisinde t\u00fcm insanl\u0131\u011f\u0131n kullan\u0131m\u0131na sunulmu\u015f, b\u00f6ylelikle insanlar ve kurumlar aras\u0131 mesafeler k\u0131salm\u0131\u015f, gezegenimiz k\u00fcresel bir k\u00f6y h\u00fcviyeti kazanm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. Art\u0131k bir\u00e7ok teknolojik yenilik, insanlar\u0131n marka ve \u00fcr\u00fcnlerle ileti\u015fimini kolayla\u015ft\u0131rmak ad\u0131na yap\u0131lmaya ba\u015flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. G\u00fcn\u00fcm\u00fczde milyarlarca kullan\u0131c\u0131ya sahip olan sosyal medya mecralar\u0131n\u0131n t\u00fcketici lehine g\u00fcnden g\u00fcne geli\u015fmesi ve onlar\u0131n hayat\u0131nda giderek daha \u00e7ok yer kaplamas\u0131yla i\u00e7erik \u00fcretiminin \u00f6nemi artm\u0131\u015f, \u00fcretici ve hizmet sa\u011flay\u0131c\u0131lar benzerlerinden ayr\u0131l\u0131p \u00f6ne \u00e7\u0131kman\u0131n yollar\u0131n\u0131 aramaya ba\u015flam\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Bu kapsamda, dijital pazarlama stratejilerinden biri olan ger\u00e7ek zamanl\u0131 pazarlama, hedef kitleye ula\u015fabilmekte daha ni\u015f bir y\u00f6ntem olarak fark edilmi\u015f, \u00fcr\u00fcn ya da hizmeti g\u00fcndemle ba\u011fda\u015ft\u0131ran i\u00e7eriklerle t\u00fcketici ilgisinin anl\u0131k olarak \u00e7ekilmesine f\u0131rsat sa\u011flam\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. \u00dcstelik markalar, sosyal medya hedeflemeleri sayesinde \u00fcrettikleri ger\u00e7ek zamanl\u0131 i\u00e7erikleri, \u00fcr\u00fcn ya da hizmetleriyle ilgili en do\u011fru hedef kitleye ula\u015ft\u0131rm\u0131\u015flard\u0131r. Literat\u00fcre bak\u0131ld\u0131\u011f\u0131nda ger\u00e7ek zamanl\u0131 pazarlama ve olu\u015fturulan i\u00e7erikler konusunda detayl\u0131 kaynaklar olduk\u00e7a az say\u0131dad\u0131r. Bu \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmada, markalar\u0131n Twitter mecras\u0131 ile t\u00fcketicilerle kurduklar\u0131 ileti\u015fimler ara\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015f, ger\u00e7ek zamanl\u0131 pazarlaman\u0131n markalar \u00fczerindeki rol\u00fc \u201cGame of Thrones\u201d dizisi \u00fczerinden incelenmi\u015f ve markalar\u0131n ger\u00e7ek zamanl\u0131 pazarlama \u00e7al\u0131\u015fmalar\u0131n\u0131n etkile\u015fim oranlar\u0131 kar\u015f\u0131la\u015ft\u0131r\u0131lm\u0131\u015ft\u0131r. ; 21st. century has been a century in which humanity took the biggest steps in terms of technology. Communication technologies developed at a term of struggle between countries and central powers has been came into service for whole humanity in time. By this way, the distances got shorter between organizations and society and the planet has gained a new identity as a global village. The technological innovations make easier the communication between people and brands and products and almost wares today. Manufacturers or service providers began to look for ways to become different from the similar ones because of the social media channels with millions of users which is going in consumers favor. So, content production became increasingly important in consumers lives. In this context, real-time marketing which is one of the digital marketing communication tools, is discovered as a helpful method to attract the consumers insantly. Furthermore, brands have took the opportunity about being able to communications for reaching the people interested in their products with real-time contents which are made by themselves. In this study, the brands\u2019 communication with their consumers via Twitter during the Game of Thrones series through real time marketing activities is concerned. Then, the effects of real-time marketing on consumers is examined by content analysis method within the rank of \u201cThe Highest Performance of Social Media\u201d which is identified by BoomSocial on April, the brands\u2019 which are partaking inside of the category of fast moving consumer goods. ISSN 1352-2752","identifier":"http:\/\/repository.uwl.ac.uk\/id\/eprint\/7001\/; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1108\/qmr-04-2020-0052; http:\/\/repository.uwl.ac.uk\/id\/eprint\/7001\/1\/Izadi_Zadeh_Darjezi_etal_QMR_2020_The_evaluation_of_the_impact_of_innovation_management_capability_to_organisational_performance.pdf","title":"The evaluation of the impact of innovation management capability to organisational performance","paper_abstract":"Purpose \u2013 Taking into consideration today\u2019s business climate of short product life cycles, corporate goals must focus on innovation by the changing needs of consumers. Thus, the main objective of this study is to investigate the impact of innovation management capability (IMC) on organisational performance. Based on resource-advantage theory, this study analyses to what extent intellectual and emotional assets influence marketing management capability which loads to organisation\u2019s performance Design\/methodology\/approach - To understand research objectives, data was collected via 35 in-depth interviews with managers and academics from various multi-national companies and new empirical insights were offered. Findings - By focussing on a holistic approach, the research recognised the existing links among concepts of intellectual and emotional assets (digital technology, knowledge and competence, reputation), personality, IMC, types of innovation and specific business performance. Thus, findings reach a broader view of the role played by innovation in the current scenario, by investigating whether the IMC is related to other constructs in the eyes of managers and academics from various multi-national companies. Research limitations\/implications \u2013 The focus on SMEs limits the generalisation of this study. To scrutinise the relations documented in this study, future research should collect in other country settings and different sector. The study contributes to the sustainability literature by developing a conceptual model that explains the development and role of innovation management in a market context with its associated sustainability management outcomes. Results are relevant for both SMEs and policymakers. Clear need to investigate further how organisations can benefit from such capabilities for greater growth is identified. Originality\/value \u2013 The paper has the merit to develop a comprehensive understanding of personality, intellectual and emotional assets on IMC and performance.","published_in":"","year":"2020-07-13","subject_orig":"Business operations","subject":"Business operations","authors":"Izadi. Tamb\u00e9m foi realizada uma an\u00e1lise bibliom\u00e9trica de artigos publicados na base de dados SciELO e que continham os termos \u201ccomportamento do consumidor\u201d, \u201ccomportamento do consumidor digital\u201d, \u201ccomportamento do consumidor virtual\u201d, \u201ccomportamento do consumidor on-line\u201d e \u201ccomportamento do consumidor web\u201d, destacando a evolu\u00e7\u00e3o das publica\u00e7\u00f5es do tipo artigo por ano, l\u00edngua, e peri\u00f3dicos. Ap\u00f3s quatro etapas para refinamentos dos resultados, foram selecionados 9 artigos, sendo 8 publicados em portugu\u00eas e somente um em l\u00edngua espanhola, entre os anos de 1999 e 2018. Deste total, 2 foram publicados na Revista de Administra\u00e7\u00e3o Contempor\u00e2nea e 2, na RAM - Revista de Administra\u00e7\u00e3o Mackenzie. O entendimento sobre o que influencia o comportamento do consumidor visa melhorar o desenvolvimento de estrat\u00e9gias de promo\u00e7\u00e3o de um produto ou um servi\u00e7o e orientar adequadamente as ofertas para o mercado, assim como auxiliar os profissionais de marketing a buscarem resultados mais assertivos e que considerem os desejos e as necessidades do consumidor.","published_in":"Qualitas Revista Eletr\u00f4nica; v. 19, n. 2 (2018): v. 19, n. 2 (2018): QUALITAS_v. 19_n\u00ba_2_Maio\/Agosto. 2018; 72-90 ; 1677-4280 ; 10.18391\/req.v19i2","year":"2020-05-15","subject_orig":"Administra\u00e7\u00e3o; Comportamento do consumidor. H., Broekhuis, M., de Leeuw, S., Hirche, C., Rooderkerk, R. P., Sousa, R., Zhu, S. X. (2019). Challenges at the marketing\u2013operations interface in omni-channel retail environments. Journal of Business Research; 0148-2963; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10400.14\/29259; doi:10.1016\/j.jbusres.2019.11.034","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10400.14\/29259; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1016\/j.jbusres.2019.11.034","title":"Challenges at the marketing\u2013operations interface in omni-channel retail environments","paper_abstract":"To compete in today\u2019s omni-channel business context, it is essential for firms to co-ordinate their activities across channels and across different stages of the customer journey and the product flow. This requires firms to adopt an integrative approach, addressing each omni-channel design decision from a dual demand-side (marketing) and supply-side (operations) perspective. However, both in practice and in academic research, such an integrative approach is still in an immature stage. In this article, a framework is developed with the following key decision areas: (i) assortment & inventory, (ii) distribution & delivery and (iii) returns. These affect both the customer journey and the product flow. As a consequence of the resulting interdependencies between the firm\u2019s functions, addressing the issues that arise in the three decision areas requires an integrated marketing and operations perspective. For each of the areas, the key decisions that affect or involve both the customer journey and product flow are identified first. Next, for each decision, the marketing and operational goals and the tensions that arise when these goals are not perfectly aligned are described. The opportunities for relieving these tensions are also discussed and possible directions for future research aimed at addressing these tensions and opportunities are presented. ; info:eu-repo\/semantics\/acceptedVersion","published_in":"","year":"2020-01-15T13:12:51Z","subject_orig":"Marketing\u2013operations interface; Customer journey; Product flow; Omni-channel; Digital business models; Assortment planning; Inventory control; Distribution; Delivery; Product returns","subject":"Marketing\u2013operations interface; Customer journey; Product flow; Omni-channel; Digital business models; Assortment planning; Inventory control; Distribution; Delivery; Product returns","authors":"Bijmolt, Tammo H. By allowing players to actively engage with the history of the Second World War, this body of commercial digital entertainment games can significantly co-configure how this war is understood, especially in light of the blurring distinction between formal and informal historical learning. This article presents an interpretative content analysis of the marketing \u2018paratexts\u2019 of a corpus of digital entertainment games about the Second World War that are shared through online game stores and online game community platforms. This is done to provide insight into how digital entertainment games and their online community platforms can function as sites for informal historical learning, both in relation to the history of the Second World War and the central goals of formal history education.","published_in":"Infancia y Aprendizaje","year":"2020-07-31","subject_orig":"digital entertainment games; informal learning; paratext; popular historical culture; Second World War","subject":"digital entertainment games; informal learning; paratext; popular historical culture; Second World War","authors":"Heede, P.J.B. (2020). Understanding peer-to-peer, two-sided digital marketplaces: pricing lessons from Airbnb in Barcelona. Sustainability, 12 (3), 5229- doi:10.3390\/su12135229; 2071-1050; http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10609\/117647","identifier":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10609\/117647","title":"Understanding peer-to-peer, two-sided digital marketplaces: pricing lessons from Airbnb in Barcelona","paper_abstract":"Peer-to-peer, two-sided digital marketplaces are reshaping the way in which consumers exchange products and interact with brand value propositions, particularly in the travel and tourism industry. Within the dynamics of these marketplaces, pricing approaches are of the utmost importance; yet, in contrast to conventional digital marketplaces, prices are set by non-professional vendors who are also consumers. We contribute to research on the topic by examining pricing within a single peer-to-peer, two-sided marketing platform: Airbnb. We use a large dataset covering accommodation listed by non-professional hosts in Barcelona, Spain. We identify a range of intrinsic and extrinsic attributes of the value propositions of Airbnb peer-to-peer accommodation, which enables us to explain differences in price levels. The paper offers evidence that higher accommodation prices are best explained by guests\u00bf preference for the intrinsic functional qualities of the value proposition; and that the systematic interaction of valence and volume of online reviews can produce a crucial impact on pricing.","published_in":"","year":"2020-06-27","subject_orig":"digital marketplace; Airbnb; consumer; pricing; peer-to-peer; consumidor; tarificaci\u00f3n; mercado digital; tarifaci\u00f3; mercat digital; Consumer behavior; Consumidors -- Conducta; Consumidores -- Conducta","subject":"digital marketplace; Airbnb; consumer; pricing; peer-to-peer; consumidor; tarificaci\u00f3n; mercado digital; tarifaci\u00f3; mercat digital; Consumer behavior; Consumidors; Conducta; Consumidores; Conducta","authors":"Llad\u00f3s Masllorens, Josep; Meseguer Artola, Antoni; Rodr\u00edguez Ardura, Inma","link":"http:\/\/hdl.handle.net\/10609\/117647","oa_state":"1","url":"23879789876861ab6d8ccc9002e3f6a8fcae099de5ddcdde1f5ebb88e4d64007","relevance":8},{"id":"d71515457bcdf0a519a7657f76755596f8af3c9fafd5ec79d650267b172b8bba","relation":"http:\/\/www.ehu.eus\/ojs\/index.php\/Zer\/article\/view\/21454\/19566; American Psychological Association (2007). Shenzhen, China: Association for Computing Machinery. https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1145\/3297156.3297270; http:\/\/www.ehu.eus\/ojs\/index.php\/Zer\/article\/view\/21454","identifier":"http:\/\/www.ehu.eus\/ojs\/index.php\/Zer\/article\/view\/21454","title":"Sentimental analysis in Instagram: polarity and subjectivity of children\u2019s accounts ; An\u00e1lisis de sentimiento en Instagram: polaridad y subjetividad de cuentas infantiles ; Sentimenduen analisia Instagramen: haurren kontuen polaritatea eta subjektibotasuna","paper_abstract":"Instagram has become an integral part of the daily lives of children and young people, creating a kind of family album. In this context, we analyzed the polarity and subjectivity of 772 text posts in children\u2019s accounts managed by parents on the platform through natural language processing with machine learning and content analysis. The results revealed a prominent positivity and subjectivity in the lexical field of four accounts in Spanish and four in English, with the repeated use of the adjectives happy, new, super, etc. In short, the children\u2019s accounts express a tendency towards bucolic and festive upbringing. ; Instagram se ha convertido en parte integral de la vida cotidiana de ni\u00f1os y j\u00f3venes, gestando una suerte de \u00e1lbum familiar. En este escenario, analizamos la polaridad y subjetividad de 772 entradas de texto de cuentas infantiles gestionadas por padres en la plataforma mediante procesamiento del lenguaje natural con machine learning y an\u00e1lisis de contenido. Los resultados revelaron una prominente positividad y subjetividad en el campo l\u00e9xico de cuatro cuentas en espa\u00f1ol y cuatro en ingl\u00e9s, con el reiterado empleo de los adjetivos feliz, nuevo, s\u00faper, etc. En suma, las cuentas infantiles expresan una tendencia de buc\u00f3lica y festiva crianza. ; Instagram haur eta gazteen eguneroko bizitzaren parte bihurtu da, eta nolabaiteko familia albuma sortzen dute. Testuinguru horretan, plataforman gurasoek kudeatutako haurren kontuetako 772 testu sarreraren polaritatea eta subjektibotasuna aztertu ditugu, hizkuntza naturalaren prozesamenduaren bitartez, machine learning delakoaren eta eduki analisiaren bitartez. Emaitzek erakutsi zuten positibotasun eta subjektibotasun nabaria zegoela gaztelaniazko lau kontutako eta ingelesezko lau kontutako lexikoaren eremuan, eta behin eta berriz erabiltzen zituztela hainbat adjektibo, hala nola: zoriontsu, berria, superra. Laburbilduz, haurren kontuek heziera bukoliko eta alaien joera adierazten dute.","published_in":"ZER - Journal of Communication Studies; Vol. 25, N\u00fam. 48 (2020) ; ZER: Revista de Estudios de Comunicaci\u00f3n = Komunikazio Ikasketen Aldizkaria; Vol. 25, N\u00fam. 48 (2020) ; Zer - Komunikazio Ikasketen Aldizkaria; Vol. 25, N\u00fam. 48 (2020) ; 1989-631X ; 1137-1102","year":"2020-05-29","subject_orig":"Instagram; childhood; analysis of sentiments; polarity; subjectivity; happiness; infancia; an\u00e1lisis de sentimientos; polaridad; subjetividad; felicidad; haurtzaroa; sentimenduen analisia; polaritatea; subjektibotasuna; zoriontasuna","subject":"Instagram; childhood; analysis of sentiments; polarity; subjectivity; happiness; infancia; an\u00e1lisis de sentimientos; polaridad; subjetividad; felicidad; haurtzaroa; sentimenduen analisia; polaritatea; subjektibotasuna; zoriontasuna","authors":"Vizcaino-Verdu, Arantxa; Aguaded, Ignacio","link":"http:\/\/www.ehu.eus\/ojs\/index.php\/Zer\/article\/view\/21454","oa_state":"1","url":"d71515457bcdf0a519a7657f76755596f8af3c9fafd5ec79d650267b172b8bba","relevance":7},{"id":"d0010dc9c7b1be4b20f4292b519f4430af3210ccbc032c961aa9d919c030fa01","relation":"https:\/\/reicomunicar.org\/index.php\/reicomunicar\/article\/view\/4\/44; https:\/\/reicomunicar.org\/index.php\/reicomunicar\/article\/view\/4\/45; https:\/\/reicomunicar.org\/index.php\/reicomunicar\/article\/view\/4; doi:10.46296\/rc.v3i6.0015","identifier":"https:\/\/reicomunicar.org\/index.php\/reicomunicar\/article\/view\/4; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.46296\/rc.v3i6.0015","title":"Digital consumer profile and acceptance of the offer in pandemic: Investigation article ; Perfil del consumidor digital y aceptaci\u00f3n de oferta en pandemia: Art\u00edculo de investigaci\u00f3n","paper_abstract":"In this article we analyze the profile of the digital consumer and the acceptance of the offer in the pandemic. We collected information from different sources where the majority were surveys carried out on citizens of different countries and according to these observed data that the consumer during the pandemic has become more digital when shopping online as a consequence of the isolation that we are involved in, this leads to new needs and apart it is a faster and safer way. We also have a change in the acceptance of the offer where certain products were demanded more than others, such as despair, cleaning the home, bread yeast, weights, etc. Keywords: pandemic, digital, offer, isolation. ; En el presente art\u00edculo se analiza el perfil del consumidor digital y la aceptaci\u00f3n de la oferta en la pandemia. Rec\u00edprocamente se recolecta informaci\u00f3n de diferentes fuentes, la mayor\u00eda corresponden a encuestas realizadas a ciudadanos de diferentes pa\u00edses y de acuerdo con estos datos, se evidencia que el consumidor durante la pandemia se ha integrado cada vez m\u00e1s a \u00e1mbitos digitales al hacer compras en l\u00ednea a consecuencia del aislamiento que estamos llevando de esto conduce a nuevas necesidades y aparte es una forma m\u00e1s r\u00e1pida y segura. Tambi\u00e9n tenemos un cambio en la aceptaci\u00f3n de la oferta donde ciertos productos se demandaron m\u00e1s que otros, como lo son la despensa, limpieza del hogar, levaduras de pan, pesas, etc. Palabras Claves: pandemia, digital, oferta, aislamiento. ABSTRACT In this article we analyze the profile of the digital consumer and the acceptance of the offer in the pandemic. We collected information from different sources where the majority were surveys carried out on citizens of different countries and according to these observed data that the consumer during the pandemic has become more digital when shopping online as a consequence of the isolation that we are involved in, this leads to new needs and apart it is a faster and safer way. We also have a change in the acceptance of the offer where certain products were demanded more than others, such as despair, cleaning the home, bread yeast, weights, etc. Keywords: pandemic, digital, offer, isolation. Questionnaire is used to collect data of independent variables and data collected is analyzed using SMARTPLS 3.0 program. Population of the study is taken from instructors of Wisma Bahasa. Based in Yogyakarta, areas of operation of the institution include Yogyakarta itself, Jakarta, Papua and recently Bali. Data collection is conducted through the use of digital questionnaire Google Form distributed to 48 subjects. Statistical analysis using PLS-SEM employs Path Analysis method comprising of 2 phases, namely outer model and inner model. Outer model consists of validity and reliability testing, and inner model focuses on hypothesis testing. The result of the study shows that while Perceived Organizational Support and Organizational Commitment affects Turnover Intention negatively, or in other words suppresive the intention, Internal Marketing does not. In the case of Wisma Bahasa, it appears that Turnover Intention remains to exist despite the institutions effort to promote Internal Marketing.","published_in":"Journal of Research in Business, Economics, and Education; Vol. 2 No. 2 (2020): April; 440-451 ; 2686-6056","year":"2020-04-29","subject_orig":"Perceived Organizational Support; internal marketing; organizational commitment; turnover intention","subject":"Perceived Organizational Support; doi:10.1108\/JSOCM-07-2019-0115","identifier":"https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02404941; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02404941\/document; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02404941\/file\/Using%20digital%20devices%20to%20help%20people%20lose%20weight%20a%20systematic%20review%20AAM.pdf; https:\/\/doi.org\/10.1108\/JSOCM-07-2019-0115","title":"Using digital devices to help people lose weight: a systematic review","paper_abstract":"The full text of the article may therefore become visible within your personal website, institutional repository (IR), subject repository, SCN signed up to the Voluntary STM Sharing Principles as soon as the final version has been published in the journal. ; International audience ; When fighting the burden of overweight and obesity, diet remains a powerful preventive factor. The aim of this study is to stimulate more efficient interventions on diet change by synthesising knowledge of previous weight loss programs based on the use of digital devices. Following the preferred reporting items for systematic reviews and meta-analyses approach, a systematic literature review through five databases was undertaken focused on the assessment of studies oriented towards diet change that incorporating digital devices including computers, tablets, mobile phones, portable and non-portable tracking devices. Fifteen empirical studies (2004 to 2018) were identified and examined for efficacy, and presence of theory and behaviour change techniques. Digital devices supporting weight loss programs have evolved rapidly over the last 15 years, from reminders using the short message system to self-quantification through mobile applications. Nine studies show a significant difference between conditions, in favour or one (or more) intervention arm. The remaining studies failed to find a significance between conditions but were using a comparison with an active intervention, potentially indicating equivalent efficacy. A low level of theory use and use of behavioural techniques was evident. The literature review is limited to studies that have scientifically evaluated the (potential) weight loss associated with the weight loss intervention. This review could be put into perspective with other complementary research, in particular, qualitative research aimed at exploring participants' motivtions to use (or not) digital devices to lose weight.Few previous reviews have examined the extent of the efficiency in digital diet change programs. The review shows that in general, digital interventions can support weight loss for adults, however more studies are required to provide a strong evidence base for efficacy. Given their low cost and the size of the overweight population, public health policies could integrate these devices more strongly in their efforts to combat obesity. A theory-driven social marketing perspective could enhance development, ensuring interventions are effective and valued by users.","published_in":"ISSN: 2042-6763 ; Journal of social marketing ; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02404941 ; Journal of social marketing, Emerald Publishing Limited, 2020, 10 (3), pp.289-319. ⟨10.1108\/JSOCM-07-2019-0115⟩","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Public health; Obesity; Programme; Social marketing; Systematic Litterature Review; Digital intervention; [SHS.GESTION]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Business administration","subject":"Public health; Obesity; Programme; Social marketing; Systematic Litterature Review; Digital intervention; ","authors":"Besson, Madeleine; Gurviez, Patricia; Carins, Julia","link":"https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02404941","oa_state":"1","url":"b953a76471d85c45efa6b9492ba92f8e168998986d3964c08da226786f643f92","relevance":4},{"id":"81b1893f00437c12663708b8bba6b0e87af00312518ffd2f40d3844fc3d3eb94","relation":"hal-02276381; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","identifier":"https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","title":"L'enrichissement de l'exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale par l'utilisation d'outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation","paper_abstract":"International audience ; This paper focuses on the use of interactive mediation tools during the museum visit. What are the dimensions of the museum visit experience? Is it specific to the nature of the interactive tool (audioguide, tablet, interactive kiosk, multi-user digital table) used during the visit ? First, a state of the art of the researches which focused on the influence of interactive mediation tools on the museum visit is presented. Second, the results from the qualitative method are analysed. On a managerial level, the goal is to help museum professionnals to choose interactive mediation tools in order to enrich the visit experience and broaden their audiences. ; La nature de l\u2019outil interactif utilis\u00e9 (audioguide, tablette tactile, borne interactive, table tactile multi-usagers) lors de la visite induit-elle une exp\u00e9rience mus\u00e9ale sp\u00e9cifique ? Tout d\u2019abord une synth\u00e8se de la revue de la litt\u00e9rature est pr\u00e9sent\u00e9e portant sur l\u2019influence des outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation sur l\u2019exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale. Puis, les r\u00e9sultats issus d\u2019une d\u00e9marche qualitative sont analys\u00e9s. La finalit\u00e9 manag\u00e9riale est d\u2019aider les professionnels dans leur processus de choix des outils interactifs de m\u00e9diation afin d\u2019enrichir l\u2019exp\u00e9rience de visite mus\u00e9ale v\u00e9cue par les publics, dans un objectif de leur \u00e9largissement et de leur diversification.","published_in":"ISSN: 0779-7389 ; D\u00e9cisions Marketing ; https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381 ; D\u00e9cisions Marketing, Association Fran\u00e7aise du Marketing, 2020, pp.87-101","year":"2020","subject_orig":"Mus\u00e9e; M\u00e9thode qualitative; Marketing des arts et de la culture; Exp\u00e9rience; Comportement du consommateur; [SHS.GESTION]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Business administration; [SHS.ART]Humanities and Social Sciences\/Art and art history","subject":"Mus\u00e9e; M\u00e9thode qualitative; Marketing des arts et de la culture; Exp\u00e9rience; Comportement du consommateur;  ","authors":"Jarrier, Elodie; Bourgeon-Renault, Dominique","link":"https:\/\/hal-univ-bourgogne.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02276381","oa_state":"2","url":"81b1893f00437c12663708b8bba6b0e87af00312518ffd2f40d3844fc3d3eb94","relevance":3},{"id":"e56762a03e02cc4efe015531bd416da12f0ff56f6d93b4441b3f7ed9c0ae6a0f","relation":"hal-02872485; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485\/document; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485\/file\/Design.pdf","identifier":"https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485\/document; https:\/\/hal.archives-ouvertes.fr\/hal-02872485\/file\/Design.pdf","title":"Designing Co-Creation Platforms: The Case of Configurators Toolkits","paper_abstract":"International audience ; With the emergence of new digital tools, and in a value co-creation perspective, companies are using internet tools and platforms in order to support interaction and design the attributes of the product. As it is assumed that the implementation and operatio-nalization of co-creation platforms remains unexplored, the paper investigated the reasons why co-creation leads to reframing the development processes with the implications for learning processes. Results will detail the way development and learning loops occurred. Four main observations are proposed: a-Co-creation requires including new actors in the systems, resulting in organizational change b-Development processes are separated in two parts. c-The issue of product coherence and image is central to the elaboration of the interactive dispositions with the clients. d-The Design of co-creation platforms is not based on co-creation principles. Discussion follows on the way co-creation transforms existing \u00ab learning while innovating \u00bb frames. ; Dans une recherche constante d'am\u00e9lioration de valeur, les entreprises ont adopt\u00e9 une approche en co-cr\u00e9ation, s'appuyant sur les outils digitaux permettant l'interaction avec les clients et la co-construction des attributs de l'offre. En l'absence de travaux portant sur la cr\u00e9ation et la mise en oeuvre de ces outils, l'article explore la fa\u00e7on dont les logiques de co-creation am\u00e8nent \u00e0 transformer les processus habituels de d\u00e9velop-pement de nouvelles offres. Il s'attache \u00e9galement \u00e0 comprendre les implications de ces changements sur le processus d'apprentissage organisationnel, habituellement associ\u00e9 \u00e0 la cr\u00e9ation de nouveaux produits. Quatre principaux constats \u00e9mergent de l'\u00e9tude ex-ploratoire: a-L'adoption de logiques de co-cr\u00e9ation entraine l'implication de nouveaux acteurs dans les processus de d\u00e9veloppement, ceci amenant un changement organisa-tionnel notable ; b-L'\u00e9tude des process de d\u00e9veloppement fait appara\u00eetre deux phases tr\u00e8s diff\u00e9renci\u00e9es ; c-L'adoption d'une logique de co-cr\u00e9ation fait \u00e9merger la recherche d'une forte coh\u00e9rence des produits et de leur image ; d-La cr\u00e9ation de plateformes informatiques destin\u00e9es \u00e0 la co-cr\u00e9ation n'est pas bas\u00e9e sur l'adoption des principes de co-cr\u00e9ation. La fa\u00e7on dont les principes de co-cr\u00e9ation transforment les logiques d'ap-prentissage est alors discut\u00e9e et les voies de recherche futures sont propos\u00e9es.","published_in":"Management & Sciences Sociales ;
